messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting we ol i tok orait long en em ol tingting bilong Aristotle long sains (science), wantaim saikoloji (psychology).
English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
Tok Pisin: Long ol nupela de bilong em, dispela 'show' i save kamap long redio bilong intanet TogiNet Radio, dispela em i wanpela websait we i save gat ol toktok bilong redio long en.
English: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'binary number' em i ken i gat tupela velu (value), dispela em i 0 o 1, na ol dispela namba em ol i save kolim olsem ol 'binary digit' - o 'bits' long toktok bilong komputa.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Tok Pisin: 'Great Pyramid' long Giza em i wanpela bilong ol 'seven wonders' we i sanap yet long tude.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: "Nau mipela i gat wanpela rat we i no gat sik suga moa na em i gat 4-pela mun," dispela man i tok.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
Tok Pisin: Dispela woa em bai i stap 40-pela yia na pait i kamap tru tru, long ol ami (army) we i makim ol kantri, long ol ples bilong pait long Africa i go long Asia, long Afghanistan, Cuba na planti narapela ples.
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stap kol moa long ol ples we i raunim ol long san na long nait ol i hot moa long ol ples we i raunim ol.
English: Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol samting i gat wanwan eria bilong stadi bilong ol yet, na i lukluk long ol rot bilong givim ol ansa long ol problem we i save kamap long olgeta de.
English: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol risets i kamap long 'Twentieth century' i bin soim olsem i gat tupela 'pool' bilong 'genetic variation': wanpela em i hait na wanpela em i stap ples klia.
English: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
Tok Pisin: Taim yumi skelim olgeta samting, yumi mas no ken kirap nogut sapos ol tumbuna bilong ol i stretim ol "problem bilong 'protein'" bilong ol long wankain we olsem ol 'chimps' long 'savanna' i save mekim long tude.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dr. Ehud Ur, em i wanpela profesa bilong marasin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, long Nova Scotia na em i siaman sains na klinik seksen bilong Canadian Diabetes Association i givim tok lukaut olsem dispela risets i nupela yet.
predictions: Dokta Ehud Ur, profesa bilong medisin long Dalhousie University

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
Tok Pisin: Tok ples Italian em ol lain i save wok insait long steit (state) i save yusim tu long toktok long olgeta de na ol i save yusim Latin long mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) bilong lotu.
English: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
Tok Pisin: Long ol Springboks, em i pinis bilong 5-pela gem we ol i lus i kam inap nau.
English: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela 'feral' pikinini em ol lain i tok olsem ol animal long bus i lukautim ol; sampela em ol lain i tok olsem ol i stap ol yet long bus.
English: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sport' we planti manmeri i save long en em 'football', 'basketball', 'volleyball', 'water-polo', 'fencing', 'rugby', 'cycling', 'ice hockey', 'roller hockey' na 'F1 motor racing'.
English: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
Tok Pisin: Em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela samting we i save pulim ol turis i go long South Africa na ol i save lukim em olsem impoten samting insait long South African National Parks (SANParks).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Wankain olsem ol narapela saveman, em i gat tupela tingting sapos ol i ken oraitim sik suga, em i tok olsem ol dispela samting we ol i painimaut long en, em i no bilong ol manmeri husat i gat Type 1 bilong sik suga.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Large areas further north are quite sparsely populated and some is nearly uninhabited wilderness.
Tok Pisin: Ol bikpela eria longwe long not em i no gat planti manmeri na sampela ples we i no gat manmeri long en.
English: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
Tok Pisin: Long ol ples we i hot long Middle East, haus em i no impoten.
English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
Tok Pisin: Sapos kantri we yu bai go long en em ol lain i tok save long sampela samting we yu mas lukaut long en, sampela senis bai kamap long 'travel health insurance' o 'trip cancellation insurance' bilong yu.
English: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
Tok Pisin: Bipo, i no olgeta Sámi i bin stap insait long wok bilong lukautim planti lain 'reindeer', tasol ol i stap long painim pis, painim abus na kain olsem, planti bilong ol i save gat 'reindeer' bilong karim kago.
English: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'German pastry' em ol i gutpela tru, na long Bavaria, ol i gat gutpela teist na i gat kainkain, wankain olsem ol dispela bilong ol lain i stap saut, ol Austria.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long Mande, nambawan sekreteri bilong Nobel Commitee for Literature long Swedish Academy, i tokaut long pablik long redio progrem bilong Sveriges Radio long Sweden olsem, ol i bin no inap long toktok wantaim Bob Dylan long 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature we em bin winim, na ol i no wok long traim long toktok wantaim em.
predictions: Monde, Sara Danius, sekrateri bilong Nobel Komiti bil

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i min olsem yu ken lukim siti we i gat histori bilong en long sampela de taim yu kam bek long nait na slip long sip.
English: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
Tok Pisin: Polis i tok ol i saspek olsem wanpela soldia bilong Daesh (ISIL) i kamapim dispela hevi.
English: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
Tok Pisin: Ol atoriti i ting olsem dispela i soim olsem ol dispela kontena we i holim 'uranium' long dispela senta i mas bruk na i wok long lik (leak).
English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, lukaut long ol smel we i save pulim ol bea na ol narapela animal, olsem na no ken karim o kukim kaikai we i gat strongpela smel na mekim kem i stap klin.
English: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu ringim sampela lain we i stap tausen 'mile' longwe, yu wok long yusim wanpela 'satellite'.

English: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

label: Danius i tok, "Nau yet, mipela i no wok long mekim wanpela samting. Mi bin ring na salim ol i-meil long man i save wok wantaim em na mi bin kisim ol gutpela bekim na dispela em i inap."

English: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
Tok Pisin: Ol Wagonways em ol i bin bildim long England taim bipo long '16th Century'.
English: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
Tok Pisin: Planti dai i save kamap bikos ol manmeri i pilim tait long traim long swim i kam bek agensim 'current', na dispela em i hat long mekim.
English: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wokabaut long tupela lek em ol i painim long fosil (fossil) bilong ol Australopithecus we i bin stap 4.2-3.9 milien yia i go pinis, tasol ol Sahelanthropus i bin wokabaut long tupela lek long kain taim olsem seven milien yia i go pinis.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol pikinini em ol i save kolim ol olsem "'feral" o wel pikinini. Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.
English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
Tok Pisin: NextGen em i wanpela sistem we FAA i tok olsem em bai larim ol balus long flai long ol sotpela rot na seivim (save) planti milien galen (gallon) bilong 'fuel' long olgeta yia na daunim mak bilong 'carbon' we i save go long 'air'.
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Tok Pisin: Wankain, taim yu gat wanpela Schengen visa, yu no nid long aplai long ol visa long wanwan bilong ol Schengen memba kantri, na dispela seivim taim, mani na pepawok.
English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim i go pinis long dispela wik, wanpela helikopta (helicopter) i 'crash' na i kilim tripela lain na narapela tripela i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong ol.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
Tok Pisin:'}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti manmeri i stap laip yet husat i bin stap long dispela taim, na planti lain moa husat i gat ol lain we ol laikim i bin dai o ol i bin wok go na dai long hap, ol Jew na ol lain i no Jew wantaim.
English: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save long mak bilong spit i stap daunbilo moa long ol narapela seksen — planti taim em i 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — na pasin bilong bihainim ol gut em i moa impoten long sakim tok.
English: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
Tok Pisin: Ol i painimaut olsem Sun i save ol wankain bikpela tingting olsem ol narapela sta: Dispela ektiviti bilong olgeta sta long sistem em ol i painimaut olsem 'luminosity' na 'rotation' bilong ol i save mekim ol i tanim tanim, na i no gat narapela samting gen.
English: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
Tok Pisin: Apia em ol i bin kamapim em long 1850s na em i bin nambawan kapitol bilong Samoa stat long 1959 i kam inap nau.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.

predictions: Siminoff i tok ol sales i go up long 2013

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Amazon em namba wan wara we namel bilong em i bikpela tru long Earth, na mak bilong namel bilong en em i sikspela 'mile'.
English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol planti 'fruit pastry', na i gat ol epol we ol i wokim 'pastry' long en i save stap long olgeta taim bilong yia, na ol 'cherry pastry' na 'plum pastry' em ol i save mekim long taim bilong sama (summer).
English: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok olsem, i luk olsem draiva bilong dispela kar we i bamim dispela man bilong kisim foto bai i no inap long kisim ol sas.
English: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
Tok Pisin: Robin Uthappa i mekim nambawan sko (score) we i winim olgeta bikpela sko bilong dispela 'inning', em i mekim 70-pela 'runs' long 41-pela bal tasol taim em i paitim bal long mak bilong 11-pela foa na 2-pela siks.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
Tok Pisin: Traim long swim i go long wanpela hap we 'current' i no pulim bek gen o, bihainim mak bilong yu long swim na saposl i gat lain i lukim yu, yu ken tingting long wet long ol lain i ken seivim (save) yu.
English: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.
Tok Pisin: Cuomo, husat i gat 53 krismas, i statim wok bilong em olsem gavana long stat bilong dispela yia na i sainim wanpela 'bill' long mun i go pinis we i mekim lo i tok orait long man i maritim man yet na meri i maritim meri yet.
English: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri i save kukim kaikai autsait long sait bilong haus; ol stoa em ol tebol we i op na i lukluk i go long rot. Ol i save yusim ol ston long bildim ol haus.
English: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
Tok Pisin: Tude planti Sámi i mekim ol wok bilong tude. Wok bilong givim sevis long turis em i save wanpela impoten rot bilong kisim mani long ol Sápmi, long Sámi eria.
English: For example, each year students from Bennet School in North Carolina design a website about their trip to the State Capital, each year the website gets remodeled, but old versions are kept online to serve as a scrapbook.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, long wanwan yia ol sumatin long Bennet School long North Carolina i save disainim wanpela websait long raun bilong ol i go long State Capital, na long wanwan yia dispela websait i kisim nupela stail, tasol ol olpela 'version' i save stap yet 'online' olsem wanpela 'scrapebook'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
Tok Pisin: Cyanuric acid na melamine em ol i bin painim ol insait long ol 'sample' bilong pispis bilong ol 'pes' we i bin dai taim ol i kaikai dispela kaikai bilong animal we i posin insait long em.
English: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
Tok Pisin: Siti bilong Casablanca long tude em ol man Berber we i save painim pis i kamapim long '10th century' BCE, na ol Phoenicians, Romans, na Merenid i bin yusim olsem wanpela impoten port we ol i kolim Anfa.
English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em planti lain i save mekim, tasol em i kamapim 'wear' long plang wil bilong ol 'wagon'.
English: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
Tok Pisin: Narapela opsen (option) bilong 'biorhythm-based' em bai yu dringim planti wara (kain olsem wara o ti, wanpela 'diuretic') bipo long yu slip, dispela bai fosim yu long kirap na i go pispis.
English: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, em i no gat atoriti long senisim ol 'tax law' na ol 'tariff' namel long ol 'state'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Examples include control, planning and scheduling, the ability to answer customer diagnoses and questions, as well as handwriting recognition, voice and face.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel em kontrolim samting, plenim na makim taim bilong samting, save bilong ansarim ol kwesten bilong kastoma, na luksave long 'handwriting', vois na pes.
English: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
Tok Pisin: "'Thermal behavior' bilong ol i no stap wankain olsem ol bikpela hul bilong ston long Earth we i save i gat wanpela kain tempritsa (temperature), tasol ol i stap wankain olsem tempritsa bilong ol dip hol i stap long graun," Glen Cushing bilong United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team na bilong Northern Arizona University we i stap long Flagstaff, Arizona i tok.
English: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'cruise' i go long Saint Petersburg i save givim taim long raun long taun. Ol pasindia bilong 'cruise' i no nid long karim visa (lukim ol 'terms').
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Tok Pisin: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.

English: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
Tok Pisin: Wankain olsem mun i save i gat wanpela fos we i save pulim graun i go long em, na kamapim ol tait, Milky Way tu i save i gat wanpela fos we i save pulim Sagittarius 'galaxy' i kam long em.
English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'pride' bilong ol laion i save ekt long wankain we olsem ol 'pack' bilong ol wulf o dok, ol dispela animal we i wankain long ol laion (tasol i no ol narapela bikpela pusi) long pasin, na tu ol i save kamapim bikpela birua long ol narapela animal we ol i save kaikai.
English: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
Tok Pisin: Gol em ol i ken mekim i go kama kainkain seip (shape). Na ol i ken rolim em na kamapim ol liklik liklik seip (shape).

English: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.

Tok Pisin: I save i gat etinpela 'medal' tasol bilong winim long wanwan de, sampela kantri i no bin winim wanpela 'medal' na go long 'medal podium' long kisim.
English: You can also have alloys that include small amounts of non-metallic elements like carbon.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken i gat ol 'alloy' we i gat ol liklik mak bilong ol elemen (element) we i no metel (metal) kain olsem 'carbon' insait long ol.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

Tok Pisin: Long 1956 Slania i muv i go long Sweden, tripela yia bihain em i stat wok long Swedish Post Office na kamap olsem 'chief engraver' bilong ol.

English: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse
Tok Pisin: Maski planti bilong ol kaiki bilong ol em mipela i ken save, ol Rom i gat ol kaikai we yumi i no save long en o ol save yusim long taim bilong bikpela bung kaikai, wanpela em wel pik, 'peacock', 'snail', na wanpela kain rat ol i kolim 'dormouse'.
English: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong serim wanpela 'field trip' long komputa em i wanpela gutpela we tu long tingting lon wanpela raun na serim ol samting i bin kamap wantaim klas bilong bihaintaim.
English: The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived.
Tok Pisin: 25-pela Dunlop broadies em ol i stap yet na ol i olpela kopi tru bilong dispela dokumen. Dispela namba wan dokumen we ol i raitim long han em i bagarap.
English: Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
Tok Pisin: Bikos i no gat bekim i kamap long dispela 'tactic', Germany i ting olsem wankain samting bai i kamap long ol 'submarine' bilong em.
English: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
Tok Pisin: Ol i makim ol long 'category' bilong Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing na Original Screenplay.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Planti bikpela televisen skrin (screen) em ol i bin putim long ol wanwan ples long Roma bai ol manmeri i ken lukim dispela funerel.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'case' we ol i saspekim H5N1 long Croatia na Denmark em ol i no painimaut yet olsem ol i tru tru, o nogat.
English: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i impoten we bilong luksave long wanem em ol 'verb' na wanem em ol 'object'.
English: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'coalition' na soldia bilong Afghanistan i muv i go long dispela eria long kisim dispela hap na ol i salim ol narapela balus bilong ol 'coalition' long helpim ol long mekim dispela.
English: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
Tok Pisin: Sekim 'label' long ol 'first aid instruction' bilong dipela posin.
English: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
Tok Pisin: Tasol maket bilong salim 'laptop' i go long pablik' bai i gat kainkain prodak na i senis olgeta bihain long ASUS i kisim 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award we Executive Yuan bilong Republic of China i givim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long planti narapela siti bilong Italy na long olgeta hap bilong graun, bikpela moa long Poland, ol i mekim ol wankain 'setup', na planti manmeri i lukim dispela funerel (funeral).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
Tok Pisin: Dispela Report i stat wantaim wanpela askim long i mas i gat 'open debate' na wanbel long wanpela tingting i kamap long polisi bilong United States i go long Middle East.
English: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
Tok Pisin: 'Light pollution' i no bin wanpela problem long mak we em i stap long en tude, ol i save stap long ol siti o long ol skul, na i isi long go long en na i no olsem ol dispela we ol i bildim long tude.
English: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bom i stap long kar na i pairap long bikpela ofis bilong ol polis long Gaziantep, long Turkey aste moning na i kilim tupela polis ofisa na kamapim bagarap long bodi bilong moa long twentipela narapela manmeri.
English: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean.
Tok Pisin: Long hap not bilong rijen em Sahel i raunim, na long hap na hap wes Atlantic Ocean i raunim.
English: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
Tok Pisin: "'Thermal behavior' bilong ol i no stap wankain olsem ol bikpela hul bilong ston long Earth we i save i gat wanpela kain tempritsa (temperature), tasol ol i stap wankain olsem tempritsa bilong ol dip hol i stap long graun," Glen Cushing bilong United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team na bilong Northern Arizona University we i stap long Flagstaff, Arizona i tok.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol lain i save stadi long histori i tok agensim ol polisi bilong FBI we i putim ol 'risos' long ol 'case' we i isi long stretim, bikpela moa em long sait bilong ol kar we ol lain i bin stilim, long wanem ol i laik mekim mak bilong FBI long stretim ol 'case' i go antap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
Tok Pisin: Scotturb Bus 403 i save ron olgeta taim i go long Sintra, na stop long Cabo da Roca.
English: In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars.
Tok Pisin: Insait long dispela 'transport shuttle' olgeta lain i konek wantaim, na ol i sapotim wanpela 'transport system' we ol 'private car' i kamapim.
English: The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says.
Tok Pisin: Long taim bilong winta (winter) ples i ken kol nogut tru: ol tempritsa (temperature) i no save go daun aninit long mak we ais i save kamap, tasol i win na wara i stap long win i save bung wantaim long mekim ples i pilim kol moa long wanem samting 'thermometer' i tok.
English: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long resis we i kamap long Trinde, Carpanedo i pilai wanpis insait long tupela narapela resis long dispela Championships.
English: But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur.
Tok Pisin: Tasol i gat planti samting long ol pisin we i luk wankain olsem ol dainaso yet.

English: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Congress i stat long givim mani long 'obscenity initiative' long taim em i mekim bajet bilong em long 2005 na tok olsem FBI i mas givim 10-pela wokmanmeri bilong stretim ol 'case' bilong 'adult pornography'.
predictions: Kongres i bin stat givim mani long dispela 'obscenity initiative

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
Tok Pisin: Ol plen bilong givim ol dispela sut marasin i go long ol eria we i gat histori bilong planti lain pik i sik long dispela yia i no bin kamap bikos i no gat inap mani na ol i no ting olsem em i wanpela bikpela samting taim ol i skelim em wantaim ol narapela sik.
English: Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri i mas luksave olsem pasin bilong narapela kalsa i ken mekim na samting we ol i ting olsem haresmen (harassment) i ken kamap na planti taim ol lain ken bihaim yu, holim han bilong yu na kain olsem.
English: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
Tok Pisin: Ol i makim Gosling na Stone long 'category' bilong Best Actor na Best Actress.
English: Two popular content theories are Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory and Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
Tok Pisin: Tupela 'content theory' we planti lain i save long en em Hierarchy of Needs Theory na Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
English: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i laspela geim (game) bilong ol All Blacks, husat i bin winim pinis dispela 'trophy' long tupela wik i go pinis.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Robin Uthappa i mekim nambawan sko (score) we i winim olgeta bikpela sko bilong dispela 'inning', em i mekim 70-pela 'runs' long 41-pela bal tasol taim em i paitim bal long mak bilong 11-pela foa na 2-pela siks.
predictions: Robin Uthappa i mekim heviest score bilong innings, 70 ran long 41 bol tasol long taim i putim

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela trupela “'invisible team'” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) em i wanpela narakain samting i stap insait long ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa.
English: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.
Tok Pisin: Ol polisi bilong kenselim (cancel) ol samting i no wankain, tasol stat long pinis bilong Mas planti bilong ol polisi bilong kenselim ol samting we i kamap long koronavaires i no surik i go long Julai 2020, taim ol i bin makim Olympics long kamap.
English: The AI ​​system is now often used in the fields of economics, medicine, engineering and the military, as has been built in several home computer and video game software applications.
Tok Pisin: Nau ol i save yusim dispela AI sistem insait long ol eria bilong 'economics', 'medecine', 'engineering' na 'military', na ol i bin yusim em long bildim sampela komputa bilong haus na 'video game software applications'.
English: The amount of inner peace a person possesses correlates oppositely to the amount of tension in one’s body and spirit.
Tok Pisin: Mak bilong bel isi i stap insait long wanpela man i gat koneksen (connection) tasol em i oposit (opposite) long mak bilong hevi we i stap insait long bodi na spirit bilong wanpela man.
English: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i lukim Foster Care System olsem wanpela ples we i seif long ol dispela pikinini.

Tok Pisin:"}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.
Tok Pisin: Ol i raitim ol dispela hap tok long baksait bilong Declaration of Independence pepa "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". Dispela hap tok i stap long aninit bilong dispela dokumen, na em i stap 'upside down'.
English: One can only wonder what the keyboard will become when something newer comes along.
Tok Pisin: Yumi ken tingting long wanem samting bai i kamap long ol kibod (keyboard) taim wanpela nupela samting i kamap.
English: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
Tok Pisin: Ol stretim bek gen ol 'economic link' namel long dispela tupela hap bilong Moldova maski ol toktok bilong politiks i no kamap gut.
English: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sport' we planti manmeri i save long en em 'football', 'basketball', 'volleyball', 'water-polo', 'fencing', 'rugby', 'cycling', 'ice hockey', 'roller hockey' na 'F1 motor racing'.
English: While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage.
Tok Pisin: Taim no gat man i save long husat i raitim ol dispela hap tok, ol i save olsem taim em i nupela yet, dispela bikpela 'parchment' dokumen (sais bilong en, em 29¾ 'inches' na 24½ 'inches') em ol i bin rolim bai em i ken stap long storej (storage).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

predictions: Tasol, arapela kapten i go aut na India i mekim

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
Tok Pisin: Europe em i wanpela kontinen (continent) we i liklik, tasol em i gat planti indipenden kantri. Planti taim, long raun i go long planti kantri em bai min olsem yu bai go insait long planti 'visa application' na 'passport control' moa long wanpela taim.
English: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
Tok Pisin: Dispela taim we ol samting i kamap em ol i save kolim olsem High Middle Ages dispela taim insait long histori bilong Europe long 11th, 12th na '13th century' (AD 1000–1300).
English: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela em ol i salim i go long George Washington long Julai 6, na em i ritim long ol soldia bilong em long New York long Julai 9. Wanpela kopi i kamap long London long Ogas 10.
English: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save yusim wanpela jaient 'rocket' we longpela bilong em i winim 100 'feet' long putim wanpela 'telescope' long 'space'.
English: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.
Tok Pisin: Sampela ol animal, kain olsem ol elefen na 'giraffe', i save laik long kam klostu long ol kar na ol stendet ikwipmen (equipment) bai mekim yu i ken lukim ol gut.

Tok Pisin:"}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
Tok Pisin: Ol tingting i stap long dispela tok save em ol i raitim hariap, i no gat planti infomesen na ol i mekim ol samting i kamap olsem i no gat planti samting i stap insait long en sapos yu skelim wantaim ol infomesen i stap long narapela hap.
English: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island.
Tok Pisin: Stat bilong Taiwan i kamap long '15th century' taim ol 'sailor' bilong Europe i abrusim em na i rekodim nem bilong em olsem Ilha Formosa, o naispela ailan.
English: An up-bow usually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'up-bow' em i save kamapim wanpela saun we i 'soft' moa, na wanpela 'down-bow' em i wanpela saun we i strong moa na i gat moa fos.
English: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
Tok Pisin: Stesin bilong dispela websait kolim dispela 'show' olsem "wanpela redio drama we i bihainim ol stail bilong bipo tasol i gat nupela na narapela kain kleva (clever) stail long em!"
English: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem oll 'comet' i bin kisim wanpela sampela samting we i kamapim wara graun wantaim ol narapela 'organic matter' we i ken kamapim ol 'protein' na sapotim laip.

English: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
Tok Pisin:'}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.
Tok Pisin: Ol siti bilong Harappa na Mohenjo-daro i gat wanpela toilet we i yusim wara long klostu olgeta haus, naol i join i go long wanpela narapela kain 'sewage system'.
English: It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
Tok Pisin: Em i gutpela long wanpela long baim wanpela Wild Card, we i save givim tok orait long i go insait long ol park insait long South Africa o olgeta South African National Parks.
English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
Tok Pisin: As tingting bilong sains (science) em long painimaut wanem we dispela graun i wok taim ol yusim ol 'scientific method'. Dispela metod (method) i save stiaim planti bilong ol 'scientific research'.
English: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
Tok Pisin: Long sampela eria boilim wara long wanpela minit em i inap, long ol narapela eria yu bai nid long boilim wara long sampela minit.
English: Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes "journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."
Tok Pisin: Professor Pamela Ferguson bilong University of Dundee i tok olsem "ol jenelis (journalist) i ken putim ol yet long birua sapos ol i pablisim ol foto na kain samting olsem bilong ol saspek."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Bihain long wanpela wik we ol lus i kamap long 'midterm election', Bush i toktok long wanpela lain manmeri na i tokim ol long 'expansion' we bai i kamap long 'trade' long Asia.

Tok Pisin: 'Subistence agriculture' em i agrikalsa (agriculture) we ol lain i mekim long kamapim kaikai long mak bilong famili bilong ol.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.

English: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.

English: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.

label: Taim Federal Government i kam na i kisim ol mani bilong Mersey haus sik long Devonport, long Tasmania, gavman bilong dispela 'state' na ol sampela MP bilong gavman i tok strong olsem dispela pasim em i trik bilong redi long ileksen we bai kamap long Novemba.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
Tok Pisin: Long hap not na i stap long ples we isi long go long en em dispela ol i kolim Sintra we i gat histori na i nais tru na planti ol lain long narapela kantri i save long en taim ol ritim toktok bilong Lord Byron long ol naispela samting i stap long em.
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Tok Pisin: Wankain, taim yu gat wanpela Schengen visa, yu no nid long aplai long ol visa long wanwan bilong ol Schengen memba kantri, na dispela seivim taim, mani na pepawok.
English: These couples may choose to make an adoption plan for their baby.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela kain marit i ken mekim disisen long putim bebi bilong ol i go long 'adoption'.
English: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
Tok Pisin: 'Subsistence agriculture' em i wanpela sistem we i no yusim planti samting, i no yusim marasin, i yusim sit we ol i kisim long kaikai we i gro long dispela rijen na ol i bungim dispela ol pasin wantaim pasin bilong mekim 'crop rotation' o ol narapela isipela teknik (technique) bilong mekim kaikai i kamap planti.
English: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri i save kukim kaikai autsait long sait bilong haus; ol stoa em ol tebol we i op na i lukluk i go long rot. Ol i save yusim ol ston long bildim ol haus.

English: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Tasol Prime Minister John Howard i bin tok olsem dispela pasim em i wanpela rot tasol bilong banisim ol bilding na masin bilong dispela haus sik bai gavman bilong Tasmania i no ken mekim level bilong haus sik i go daun, olsem na em i givim dispela narapela AUD$45 milien.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain we i save kisim foto long kamera i kisim ples bilong wanpela bikmeri long wanem em i laik go long toilet. Ol i sutim Mendoza long gan na em i dai.
English: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
Tok Pisin: Ol weda (weather) nogut bilong wanwan rijen o sisen em ol 'blizzard', 'snowstorm', 'ice storm', na 'dust storm'.
English: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
Tok Pisin: Risalt bilong 'plotting analysis' em ol bai i postim long wanpela pablik websait.
English: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
Tok Pisin: USA Gymnastics na USOC i gat wankain as tingting — mekim geim bilong 'gymnastics', na ol narapela, i kamap seif olgeta bai ol 'athletes' i ken bihainim ol driman bilong ol long wanpela seif, positif na gutpela envairomen we i mekim ol i pilim olsem ol i inap long mekim samting.
English: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
Tok Pisin: Em i is long lukim olsem graun i senis tru bikos long ol nupela save bilong sains (science) na teknoloji (technology), na ol problem i wok long kamap bikpela bikos long planti manmeri na laipstail bilong manmeri long i gat ol kainkain bikpela samting.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Laspela nius bilong dispela i mekim ripot olsem, level bilong ol 'sea readings' i soim olsem wanpela tsunami i bin kamap. Tru tru i bin i gat sampela ektiviti bilong tsunami we ol i bin rekodim klostu long Pago Pago na Niue.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, namel long wanwan 'dynasty' i gat taim we ol provins i stap ol yet. Wanpela bilong ol dispela taim we planti lain i save long en em taim bilong Three Kingdom we i stap long 60-pela yia namel long Han na Jin Dynasty.
English: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'travel agent' i save givim ol offer' we i gat brekfas (breakfast), kar bilong kisim yu i go i kam long eapot o bungim tu ol prais bilong balus tiket na prais bilong hotel.
English: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
Tok Pisin: Sampela 'atom' i gat 'unstable nuclei' na dispela em i min olsem ol i save bruk taim yu tasim liklik o i no tasim.
English: Virtual teams are held to the same standards of excellence as conventional teams, but there are subtle differences.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i ken i gat ol wankain stendet bilong mekim gut wok wankain olsem ol tim we i save wok wantaim long ofis, tasol i gat sampela liklik samting i narakain.
English: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.
Tok Pisin: No gat wanpela pikinini i mas stap insait long wanpela envairomen we i no gutpela long ol, i no lukautim ol, na i givim save long ol, tasol ol i save stap insait long kain envairomen olsem.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long Tonga, no gat ripot bilong bikpela bagarap i kamap long ol samting o long ol manmeri, tasol i no gat pawa bilong lait, na dispela i mekim na ol atoriti long Tonga i no bin kisim tok lukaut bilong tsunami we PTWC i bin salim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
Tok Pisin: Ancient China i gat wanpela narakain we bilong soim ol kainkain time; wanwan 'stage' bilong China o wanwan famili we i holim pawa em i wanpela 'dynasty'.
English: During the struggle for independence organised by the Mau movement, a peaceful gathering in the town resulted in the killing of the paramount chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
Tok Pisin: Long pait bilong kisim indipendens (independence) we Mau muvmen (movement) i bin oganaisim, wanpela bung i bin kamap long taun na namel long dispela ''paramount chief' Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III i bin dai.
English: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
Tok Pisin: Ol i karim dispela man biling kisim foto i go long Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, we em i stap i go na em i dai.
English: Two popular content theories are Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory and Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
Tok Pisin: Tupela 'content theory' we planti lain i save long en em Hierarchy of Needs Theory na Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
English: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.
Tok Pisin: Dispela plen bilong ol em i wok gut, ol i stopim impoten saplai (supply) i go long militeri (military) na ol manmeri, maski dispela 'blokade' i brukim intanesinel lo we i bin kamap aninit long ol agrimen bilong tupela 'century' i go pinis.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

label: Olgeta fotinpela skul long Hawaii we i stap long nambis o i stap klostu long nambis i bin pas long Trinde, maski ol i bin rausim dispela tok lukaut.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.
Tok Pisin: Neurobiological infomesen i givim evidens (evidence) long wanpela 'theoretical approach' long investigesen bilong 'cognition'. Olsem na em i mekim eria bilong risets i kamap liklik moa na mekim em i kamap long 'exact'.
English: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
Tok Pisin: Bos bilong 'shuttle' progrem bilong NASA N. Wayne Hale Jr. i tok olsem ol 'foam' i bin pundaun "bihain long taim we mipela i wok long tingting planti long en."
English: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim wanpela 'reservation' bilong yu sapos yu nidim taim long tingting long 'offer' o kisim ol narapela dokumen long go long dispela ples (eksampel, 'visa').
English: Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space.
Tok Pisin: Long olgeta yia, planti visita i save kisim bagarap long bodi bikos ol i no i stap longwe gut. Ol dispela animal i bikpela, wel, na i ken kamapim birua, olsem na givim ol spes bilong ol.
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'curry' em i wanpela kaikai we i yusim ol 'herb' na 'spice', wantaim ol abus o kumu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
Tok Pisin: Namba wan, planti ol 'rider' i save werim ol 'riding boots' we i gat wanpela 'heel' na wanpela 'sole' we i 'smooth' na longpela.
English: People now write messages on computer screens, never having to come close to a sharpener.
Tok Pisin: Nau ol manmeri i save raitim ol tok save long ol komputa skrin (computer screen), na ol i no kam klostu long wanpela sapena (sharpener).
English: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
Tok Pisin: South Africa i bin winim All Blacks (New Zealand) long 'rugby union' long Tri Nations geim (game) long Royal Bafokeng Stadium long Rustenburg, South Africa.
English: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
Tok Pisin: Maski Winfrey i wok long krai long taim ol i tok gutbai long em, em i tokaut klia long ol lain i save laik long lukim em olsem em bai i kam bek.
English: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
Tok Pisin: Sampela ripot i tok olsem namba bilong ol lain i dai em i et, na ripot i kam long ol ofis i tok olsem 30-pela lain i kisim bagarap; tasol tru tru namba em ol i no save yet.

Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Mausman bilong Bush Gordon Johndroe i tok olsem 'pledge' bilong North Korea em i "wanpela bikpela samting we i kontribut i go long as tingting bilong kisim 'verifiable denuclearization' bilong 'peninsula' bilong Korea."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east.
Tok Pisin: Pastaim dispela dres i bihainim stail bilong Byzantine kalsa bilong is.
English: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
Tok Pisin: Long sampela eria boilim wara long wanpela minit em i inap, long ol narapela eria yu bai nid long boilim wara long sampela minit.
English: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'safari' we planti lain i save yusim em i toktok long travel long graun long lukim ol narakain animal bilong Africa, planti bilong ol em ol animal bilong 'savanna'.
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.
English: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
Tok Pisin: Bipo em i bin wanpela siti ol i kolim Smyrna, nau em i kamap olsem siti bilong tude, em i divelop pinis, na planti wok bisnis i save kamap long en, em i stap raunim wanpela basis na ol maunten i raunim em.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela namba ten bikpela win na ren we ol i kolim long dispela Hurricane sisen (season) em, Subtropical Storm Jerry, na em i wok long stat long kamap long Atlantic Ocean long tude.
predictions: Tenpela nem bilong ston bilong Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, i mekim long Atlantic Ocean tude.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save insait long Metro em ol i save mekim long tok ples Catalan tasol, tasol ol samting we ol i no plen long mekim em wanpela 'automatic' sistem i save mekim dispela tok save long ol kainkain tok ples olsem Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.
English: Machu Picchu consist of three main structures, namely Intihuatana, the Temple of the Sun, and the Room of the Three Windows.
Tok Pisin: Machu Picchu i gat tripela bikpela straksa (structure), nem bilong ol em Intihuatana, Temple of the Sun, na Room of the Three Windows.
English: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain long Babylon i bildim wanpela namba wan tempel long wanwan god bilong ol we ol i save mekim olsem dispela em i haus bilong dispela god.
English: Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri: Em i gutpela olsem ol meri i we i go long hap i mas tok olsem ol i marit, maski ol i no marit tru tru.
English: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
Tok Pisin: Long ol liklik ailan na ol raunwara, yu bai no inap nidim wanpela 'yatch'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
Tok Pisin: Ol ripot i bin kam pas i tok olsem ol i salim dispela balus i go bek long Afghanistan bipo long ol i tok nogat long em long pundaun long Ürümqi.
English: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
Tok Pisin: I bin no gat ol bikpela bus insait long graun bilong ol Canaan, olsem na plang em i ekspensif (expensive) tumas.
English: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War.
Tok Pisin: Infomesen we ol i mekim i go pablik, i bin toktok long ol kros i kamap long ol boda, we Palestine i bin laikim ol boda we i bin stap bipo long 1967 Mideast War.
English: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.
Tok Pisin: Long September 17, 1939, ol difens (defence) bilong ol Poland em i bruk, na wanpela samting tasol bilong mekim em long go bek na bung gen long 'bridgehead' bilong Romania.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'city-states' em ol samting we i save kamapim wanpela kantri. Insait long wanpela 'civilizational culture' em ol lain i save givim save bilong ol i go long sampela 'generation', wanpela kain 'footprint' bilong kalsa we i save stap na rot bilong givim save long ol narapela.
English: Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'biological clock' em ol samting we i save mentenim ol yet na i save kamap ol 'electric currents' na ol i save kontinu (continue) long ron maski ol samting long autsait we i save mekim ol i ron i no stap.
English: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'satellite' em wanpela 'rocket' i bin salim i go long 'space'. Ol saintis i yusim ol 'telescope' long 'space' bikos 'atmosphere' bilong Earth i save tanim sampela bilong ol lait bilong yumi na hau yumi lukim ol samting.
English: During the struggle for independence organised by the Mau movement, a peaceful gathering in the town resulted in the killing of the paramount chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
Tok Pisin: Long pait bilong kisim indipendens (independence) we Mau muvmen (movement) i bin oganaisim, wanpela bung i bin kamap long taun na namel long dispela ''paramount chief' Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III i bin dai.
English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu no save long draiv long ol rot autsait long siti, yu mas strongim yu yet: i gat ol ples we i sut i go daun o i kam antap, i gat ol liklik rot we i no gat spes long ron, na ol sap kona.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ninth Ward, we tait wara i bin kamap long mak kain olsem 20 'feet' long taim bilong Hurricane Katrina, em nau yet mak bilong em i stap long lek na 'levee' we i stap klostu em wara i karamapim em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.

Tok Pisin: 'Pronunciation' em i tok ples Italian bikos planti bilong ol wod em ol i save kolim olsem hau ol i raitim.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'handicraft' em ol i kolim ol olsem ol 'antique', maski ol i no gat bikpela krismas wankain olsem ol narapela samting we fektori (factory) i mekim planti long wanpela taim.
English: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long wanpela oganaisesen i ken i gat ol nupela na narapela kain we bilong mekim samting, ol lida i mas kamapim wanpela kalsa bilong kamapim ol nupela na narapela kain samting na tu, i mas i gat pasin bilong serim save na lainim samting wantaim.

Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong gavman bilong narapela kantri long luksave long ol dispela dokumen em i narakain narakain tu.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Ol i fosim ol long baim takis i go long 'colonial regime' bilong U.S long givim mani i go long ol 'expenditure' na 'interest' long ol 'bond' we ol yusim aninit long nem bilong gavman bilong Philipines insait long ol benk (bank) bilong Wall Street.

Tok Pisin: Saltwater Crocodiles i no save stap long solwara olgeta taim, nambawan ples bilong ol long i stap em long ol maus wara we i stap long hap not long Rockhampton.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain bilding we i karamapim skai bilong Hong Kong em ol i bin tok olsem em i wankain olsem wanpela 'bar chart' we i sain sain na dispela sains sain em ol wara bilong Victoria i kamapim.
English: Its renown for being an epicenter of luxury began in about 400 A.D. and lasted up until about 1100 A.D.
Tok Pisin: Planti lain manmeri i save long em bikos em i asples bilong gutpela laipstail na em i bin stat long 400 A.D na pinis long kain taim olsem 1100 A.D.
English: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
Tok Pisin: Long 1966 Sundarban em i bin stap olsem ples bilong ol animal, na ol i estimetim olsem i gat 400 Royal Bengal taiga na kain olsem 30,000 'spotted deer' long dispela eria.
English: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
Tok Pisin: . Ol saintis i tok olsem kala bilong gras bilong dispela animas em i 'chestnut-brown' long antap wantaim wanpela 'pale' o 'carotenoid-colored' long aninit sait.
English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save insait long Metro em ol i save mekim long tok ples Catalan tasol, tasol ol samting we ol i no plen long mekim em wanpela 'automatic' sistem i save mekim dispela tok save long ol kainkain tok ples olsem Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: "Em [Wales] i giamanim mipela long stat bilong olgeta samting. Pastaim, em i ekt olsem em i wok long mekim dispela bikos em i laik bihainim lo. Bihain, em i ekt olsem em i wok long putim yau na harim mipela, i go inap long taim em i mekim 'deletion'."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
Tok Pisin: South Africa i bin winim All Blacks (New Zealand) long 'rugby union' long Tri Nations geim (game) long Royal Bafokeng Stadium long Rustenburg, South Africa.
English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim 'oxygen' we yumi ol manmeri i save pulim win long en, na ol i save kisim 'carbon dioxide' we yumi ol manmeri i save rausim i kam autsait long bodi bilong yumi (dispela em, taim win we yumi i pulim i go insait i kam autsait).
English: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'outbreak' i mekim na gavman bilong India i mekim ol dispela samting kain olsem salim ol lain bilong holimpasim pik i go long ol eria we planti pik i sik na i stap, na givim tausen moskito keten (curtain) na spreyim (spray) ol 'pesticide'.
English: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, taim ol nupela rot bilong rait i kamap, pensil (pencil) i kisim wanpela posisen we i daunbilo na i no gat planti i yusim em.
English: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i no save bilong wanem na ol mobail fon sevis i strong moa long hia na i no strong long planti ol narapela hap bilong dispela rot, kain olsem Pennsylvania Wilds.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela karis, ol i ron i go bek long Paris taim ol bikpela lain manmeri i belhat na i raunim ol na i wok long singaut na mekim ol kainkain toktok bilong pretim King na Queen.
English: MS is a disease that affects the central nervous system, which is made up of the brain, the spinal cord and the optic nerve.

Tok Pisin: Ol liklik ailan long solwara na nambawan bikpela raunwara i inap long wanpela 'yatch' o liklik bot o 'kayak' we i ken givim ol narapela we bilong kisim amamas.
English: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately.
Tok Pisin: Oliver Sacks, insait long pepa we em i raitim The President's Speech, em i soim hau olsem manmeri i no inap long klia gut long mining bilong toktok bikos ol i gat sampela bagarap i kamap long brein (brain) bilong ol tasol ol i klia stret sapos man em i tok tru.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Although AI has a strong connotation of science fiction, AI forms a very important branch of computer science, dealing with behavior, learning and intelligent adaptation in a machine.

English: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela geim (game) bilong 'series' bai kamap long Ellis Park long Johannesburg long wik i kam, taim ol Sprinboks i pilai agensim ol Australia.
English: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta moning. ol manmeri i save lusim liklik kantri taun taim ol i kalap long kar long go long ol ples bilong ol long wok na ol i save abrus ol narapela lain we ples bilong ol long wok i stap long ples we ol i lusim nau tasol na i kam.
English: If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu bin lukim muvi National Treasure, yu bai ting olsem ol i raitim wanpela 'treasure map' long baksait bilong Declaration of Independence pepa.
English: At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
Tok Pisin: Long ol 'extreme' bilong dispela 'poll', 29 pesen (percent) bilong ol dispela sevei (survey) i bilip olsem Australia i mas kamap wanpela 'republic' hariap, taim 31 pesen i bilip olsem Australia i mas no ken kamap wanpela 'republic'.
English: All the ships were sunk, except for one British cruiser. Nearly 200 American and German lives were lost.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta sip em ol i bin sinlk, tasol wanpela 'British cruiser' i no sink. Klostu 200-pela laip bilong ol America na Germany i bin lus.
