messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP).
Tok Pisin: Karensi (currancy) bilong Falkland em Falkland pound (FKP) we velu bilong em i wankain olsem wanpela British pound (GBP).
English: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
Tok Pisin: Maus bilong em i gat moa long 70-pela tit we i sap olsem resa, wantaim wanpela narapela lain tit we i stap long ruf bilong maus. Dispela em i min olsem wanem samting em i bungim bai i no inap long ranawe.
English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim 'oxygen' we yumi ol manmeri i save pulim win long en, na ol i save kisim 'carbon dioxide' we yumi ol manmeri i save rausim i kam autsait long bodi bilong yumi (dispela em, taim win we yumi i pulim i go insait i kam autsait).
English: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
Tok Pisin: Long namba 6 de bilong Oktoba 1789 ol maket meri i mekim King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette na tupela liklik pikinini bilong ol (Marie Therese we i gat 11-pela krismas na Louis-Charles we i gat 4-pela krismas) na susa bilong King, Madam Elizabeth, i go bek long Paris taim ol i stap long Versailles.
English: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.
Tok Pisin: Romanticicm i bin gat wanpela bikpela hap tingting bilong 'cultural determinism' insait long em, dispela tingting em i kam long 'writer' olsem Goethe, Fichte, na Schlegel.

Tok Pisin:"}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
Tok Pisin: Planti manmeri i no ting olsem pasin bilong i stap isi na lainim samting em impoten long ol travela (traveller) taim ol i kam bek gen long haus bilong ol.
English: Farther south is Niagara Falls and the north is home to the untapped natural beauty of the Muskoka and beyond.
Tok Pisin: Longwe long saut em Niagara Fall na long not em Musoka, wanplea ples we i luk nais na i gat ol narapela ples moa i stap.
English: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
Tok Pisin: Tingim 'skiing route' olsem em i wankain long 'hiking route'.
English: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'mutation' we i kamap insait long ol 'germ-line cell' tasol em ol i ken i go long ol pikinini, tasol ol 'mutation' we i kamap long narapela hap i ken kamapim 'cell-death' o kensa.
English: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
Tok Pisin: Ol woklain bilong 'fire rescue' i kisim dispela paia long 11:35 pm.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
Tok Pisin: Ol laspela risalt bilong ileksen bilong presiden na palimen bilong Nambia soim olsem presiden, Hifikepunye Pohamba, em ol i makim em wantaim bikpela namba tru long kamap presiden gen.
English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save insait long Metro em ol i save mekim long tok ples Catalan tasol, tasol ol samting we ol i no plen long mekim em wanpela 'automatic' sistem i save mekim dispela tok save long ol kainkain tok ples olsem Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.
English: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
Tok Pisin: Long 'savaana', em i hat long wanpela 'primate' we i gat wanpela 'digestive system' kain olsem bilong ol man long inapim ol 'amino-acid' long ol plent (plant) i stap long hap.
English: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.
Tok Pisin: I no gat wanpela "taim bilong ren" na "taim bilong san": mak bilong ren i save stap klostu wankain mak long olgeta yia.
English: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
Tok Pisin: 'Light pollution' i no bin wanpela problem long mak we em i stap long en tude, ol i save stap long ol siti o long ol skul, na i isi long go long en na i no olsem ol dispela we ol i bildim long tude.

Tok Pisin: Ol Assasin-bugs na ol Bed-bugs em ol i 'nidiocolous', ol i save stap long ples we ol i bon long en o long samting we i save givim ol kaikai.
English: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.
Tok Pisin: Dispela i mekim na ol i gat planti liklik ples bilong hait long ol animal we i laik kaikaim ol.

Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela yia, wanpela man o meri we i sik wantaim dispela binatang i ken givim dispela sik i go long 10 o 15-pela lain we i save stap klostu long ol.
English: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, em i no gat atoriti long senisim ol 'tax law' na ol 'tariff' namel long ol 'state'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol animal i lukautim ol dispela pikinini, ol dispela 'feral' pikinini save soim ol pasin (we ol inap long mek) we i wankain olsem pasin bilong dispela animal we i lukautim ol, kain olsem pret o i no save wanem samting bilong mekim taim em i stap wantaim ol narapela manmeri.

Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok olsem, i luk olsem draiva bilong dispela kar we i bamim dispela man bilong kisim foto bai i no inap long kisim ol sas.
English: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
Tok Pisin: Dispela liklik ples Haldarsvík em yu ken stap long em na lukluk i go long ailan bilong Eysturoy we i stap klostu na em i gat wanpela narapela kain sios we seip (shape) bilong em i olsem 'octagon'.
English: When all available resources are effectively used across the functional departments of an organization, creativity and ingenuity can transpire.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol dipatmen bilong wanpela oganaisesen i yusim gut olgeta risos, 'creativity' na 'ingenuity' i ken kamap.
English: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
Tok Pisin: Ol woklain i mas kisim tok orait long ol lain i antap long ol bipo long ol i mekim wanpela disisen, na ol i mas harim tok stia bilong ol lain we ol i wok aninit long en na ol i no ken askim kwesten.

English: At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
Tok Pisin: Long ol 'extreme' bilong dispela 'poll', 29 pesen (percent) bilong ol dispela sevei (survey) i bilip olsem Australia i mas kamap wanpela 'republic' hariap, taim 31 pesen i bilip olsem Australia i mas no ken kamap wanpela 'republic'.

Tok Pisin: Eksampel bilong ol 'on-site activity' em painim pis, kisim foto, lukim ol pisin, na raun long ol 'park' na stadim infomesen long 'ecosystem'.
English: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population.
Tok Pisin: Populesen (population) bilong Vatican City em i kain olsem 800. Dispela em nambawan liklik kantri tru insait long wol na kantri we i gat liklik populesen tru.
English: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.
Tok Pisin: Ol siti bilong Harappa na Mohenjo-daro i gat wanpela toilet we i yusim wara long klostu olgeta haus, naol i join i go long wanpela narapela kain 'sewage system'.
English: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
Tok Pisin: Three Kingdoms em i wanpela bilong ol taim bilong pait insait long histori bilong Ancient China we planti tausen manmeri i dai taim ol pait long sindaun long nambawan sia insait long 'grand palace' long Xi’an.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol ofisa i sekim nem na ples bilong dispela vota (voter) pinis, dispela vota bai putim dispela envelop (envelope) i go insait long 'ballot box' na putim siknesa bilong em long list bilong ol lain i kam na makim kendidet bilong ol.
English: The correlation between brain pathology and behaviour supports scientists in their research.
Tok Pisin: Rilesensip namel long 'brain pathology' na pasin i sapotim ol saintis insait long risets bilong ol.
English: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
Tok Pisin: Ol wara we i stap insait long ples em ol gutpela samting bilong mekim holide long en.
English: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol ples we i save givim ol fri dring we i gat 'alcohol' insait long en. Tasol, taim man i spak em i no inap long skelim gut samting, na olgeta gutpela man bilong 'gamble' i save olsem em i impoten long tingting bilong ol i mas stap stret.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'advisory' em ol sotpela tok save long ol samting i kamap insait long politiks bilong wanpela kantri.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol distrik em planti ol Japanese Coaster Buses i save ron long en, na yu bai sindaun gut.
English: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.
Tok Pisin: Sapos ol Allies i no mekim samting ol i bin mekim, Germany ating bai holimpasim na kisim Britain olsem em i bin mekim long olgeta hap bilong Europe.
English: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
Tok Pisin: Ol intanesinol lo we i tok tambu long ol long baim samting i mekim na ol i no inap long baim nupela balus.
English: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela samting we planti manmeri husat i wok long mekim plen long i gat 'gap-year' i wok long mekim em long travel na lainim samting.
English: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela rot, Paris i kamap olsem nambawan ples bilong ol kainkain stail bilong klos long dispela graun long tude, tasol Constantinople em i stap olsem nambawan siti bilong kainkain stail klos long taim bilong 'middle ages' long Europe.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela em Livingston Island, na Deception we 'flooded caldera' bilong volkeno we i ektif (active) yet i save givim wanpela kain lukluk bilong dispela basis.
English: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
Tok Pisin: Dispela haus sik i bihainim rot bilong banisim ol yet long binatang nogut, na ol i putim dispela sikman longwe long ol narapela sikmanmeri long banisim em long givim dispela sik i go long narapela.
English: For a comparison of population that surprises many: There are more African Americans living in the US than there are Canadian citizens.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela samting bilong skelim insait long populesen we i mekim planti lain i kirap nogut: I gat moa African American i stap long US winim namba bilong olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Canada.
English: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
Tok Pisin: Perry i tok olsem em bai "go bek long Texas long skelim ol risalt bilong miting bilong dispela nait, na skelim sapos i gat rot i stap bilong mi long dispela resis", tasol bihain em i tok olsem em bai i stap insait log dispela resis na resis long Jenueri 21 South Carolina primary.
English: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
Tok Pisin: Straksa bilong ol dispela gras bilong pisin i soim olsem wok bilong ol em i no bilong flai tasol em i bilong mekim tempritsa (temperature) bilong bodi bilong ol i stap gut na bilong soim kala bilong ol long ol narapela. Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: I gat ol toilet bilong bipotaim tru long Egypt, Persia na China. Long hap bilong ol Rome, ol toilet em ol i stap olsem hap bilong ol pablik haus bilong waswas we ol man na meri i save bung wantaim.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Bihain ol ripot i tok olsem dispela balus i kisim wanpela 'bomb threat' olsem na ol salim em i go bek long Afghanistan, na em i go daun long Kandahar.
English: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
Tok Pisin: Yu bai no inap westim taim bilong yu long wokabaut hap aua i go long dispela liklik ples we i gat ol narapela kain samting.
English: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World.
Tok Pisin: Em i bin wanpela ples we PBS progrem bilong Henry Louis Gates' Wonders of the African World i mekim wanpela bikpela stop na lukluk long en.
English: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

English: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.

English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim i go pinis long dispela wik, wanpela helikopta (helicopter) i 'crash' na i kilim tripela lain na narapela tripela i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong ol.
English: For news on tournaments and where to buy tickets for polo matches, check Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
Tok Pisin: Long nius long ol tonamen (tournament) na wanem hap bilong baim tiket long ol polo geim (game), sekim Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
English: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
Tok Pisin: Dispela tok pait i bin kamap bikos long ol lain i yusim planti mani tumas long givim helpim na mekim gen ol haus na ol samting we Hurricane Katrina i bin bagarapim; sampela bilong ol lain we i save was long hamas mani we gavman i save yusim i kolim dispela olsem "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
English: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
Tok Pisin: Dispela liklik ples Haldarsvík em yu ken stap long em na lukluk i go long ailan bilong Eysturoy we i stap klostu na em i gat wanpela narapela kain sios we seip (shape) bilong em i olsem 'octagon'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
Tok Pisin:'}]

Tok Pisin: Dispela em Netherlands, wantaim Anna Jochemsen we i pinis long namba nain ples long 'women's standing class' insait long Super-G long aste, na Finland wantaim Katja Saarinen we i pinis namba ten insait long dispela seim (same) geim (game).
English: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).

Tok Pisin: Cochamó Valley -nambawan hap bilong mekim 'climbing' long Chile, em ol kolim Yosemite of South America, em i gat ol kainkain bikpela 'granite wall' na 'crag'.
English: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'bug' em ol entomolojist (entomologist) i save yusim long toktok long dispela grup bilong ol binatang.

Tok Pisin: Dispela 'show' em pastaim em ol 'voice actor' we i no gat planti save na ekspiriens (experience) i ektim, na ol i bilong East Texas.

Tok Pisin: Dispela wil (wheel) i senisim graun long kainkain we. Bikpela samting tru we wil i mekim long yumi em i givim yumi isipela 'transportation' we i save muv hariap moa.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, sapos yu yusim dispela tok na nating, dispela tok em bai min kaikai i kam long 'central' na 'eastern' hap bilong Java ailan.
English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
Tok Pisin: 'Technological determinism' em i wanpela hap tok we i gat planti kainkain tingting we ol manmeri i save prektisim, stat long 'technology push' o 'technological imperative' i go long wanpela tingting we i tok olsem pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong graun em long bihainim ol lo bilong sains na kamapim ol teknoloji we i save bihainim ol dispela lo bilong sains.
English: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.
Tok Pisin: Narapela samting, em animal kaikai (ol anis, ol 'termite', na kiau) em ol i isi long kaikai, na tu ol i givim bikpela mak bilong ol 'protein' we i gat olgeta ol 'amino acid' we bodi i nidim.
English: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.
Tok Pisin: Ol insek em ol namba wan animal long stap long win. Dispela pasin bilong ol long flai i helpim ol long abrusim ol birua bilong ol na painim kaikai na pren bilong ol isi tru.
English: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.
Tok Pisin: Dispela i mekim na ol i gat planti liklik ples bilong hait long ol animal we i laik kaikaim ol.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela samting bilong skelim insait long populesen we i mekim planti lain i kirap nogut: I gat moa African American i stap long US winim namba bilong olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Canada.
English: In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands.
Tok Pisin: Long 1990, ol i putim em i go long lista bilong 'world heritage sites' we i stap long mak nogut, bikos long bagarap i kamap long ol wesan bilong em long deset (desert).
English: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol i luk olsem ol i no save gut long pilai wantaim ol sista bilong ol long hap saut, tasol taim tonamen (tournament) i wok long kamap, ol South Africa i wok long pilai gut moa.
English: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
Tok Pisin: Chambers, wanpela man we i no bilip long God, i tok pait olsem kot pepa bilong bilong em, em i "no bikpela samting" na "olgeta man i ken kisim narapela i go long kot."
English: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'scaffold' em ol i ken kamap long komputa o em i ken tru insait long klasrum, narapela we bilong tok em i olsem, wanpela tisa em wanpela 'scaffold', tasol wanpela 'paperclip man' insait long Microsoft Office em tu i wanpela 'scaffold'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
Tok Pisin: Lo bilong France long ileksen i tok olsem ol i mas putim ol 'code' long ol dispela wok bilong makim kendidet.
English: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain bilong travel we i plen long go mekim 'sex reassignment surgery' long narapela kantri i mas ol 'valid documents' bilong ol long yusim taim ol i kam bek.
English: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
Tok Pisin: Em i is long lukim olsem graun i senis tru bikos long ol nupela save bilong sains (science) na teknoloji (technology), na ol problem i wok long kamap bikpela bikos long planti manmeri na laipstail bilong manmeri long i gat ol kainkain bikpela samting.
English: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
Tok Pisin: Ol laspela risalt bilong ileksen bilong presiden na palimen bilong Nambia soim olsem presiden, Hifikepunye Pohamba, em ol i makim em wantaim bikpela namba tru long kamap presiden gen.
English: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
Tok Pisin: Ol i mekim ol toktok bilong stretim dispela hevi, tasol samting we ol kalabus lain i laikim em i no klia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol dispela graun i save kamapim ol 'sandbars' na ol nambis, we i save stap olsem ol ples bilong ol kainkain animal bilong bus.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
Tok Pisin: Dispela muvi we Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone i stap insait long en, em ol lain i makim em long i stap insait long olgeta bikpela 'category'.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.
English: The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side.
Tok Pisin: 'Crust' bilong em i kain olsem 70 km 'thick' long sait i stap klostu na 100 km 'thick' long sait i stap longwe.
English: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
Tok Pisin: Maski i no gat birua bilong tsunami i stap, ol lain i wok long pret na i stat long lusim ol bisnis na haus bilong ol.
English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Bikos long dispela, tupela 'specie' bilong pis i pinis olgeta, na tupela narapela em klostu i laik pinis olgeta, wanpela bilong ol em i 'humpback chub'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela gutpela 'athlete', taiga i ken klaim (em i no save klaim gut tumas), swim, kalap long bikpela mak na pulim ol samting wantaim strong we i faivpela taim moa long strong bilong man.
English: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
Tok Pisin: Ol i bin tok olsem ol bai i katim em i go daun long Tunde, tasol wanpela imejensi kot 'ruling' i seivim dispela diwai.
English: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela stadi we ol i pablisim (publish) long Fonde insait long wanpela jenel (journal) ol i kolim Science i givim infomesen long wanpela nupela 'specie' bilong pisin we i staplong Galapagos Islands bilong Ecuador.
English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol bikpela bilip bilong ol Kristen em i olsem ol i mas yusim gut mani na kago bilong ol long helpim ol narapela we i gat pen na hevi o i no gat mani na kaikai. Ol i bilip olsem mani bilong sios em i bilong mekim dispela wok.
English: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
Tok Pisin: 'Pyramid sound and light show' em i wanpela samting we ol pikinini i save laikim na em i stap long dispela eria.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Maski level bilong wara bai i go antap long sampela 'feet' tasol bihain long dispela taitwara, ol ofisa i laik olsem em i bai i mas inap long putim ol 'sandbars' long ples we wara i save ron i go daun long en.
predictions: Ol ofisel i holim gutpela hoap olsem wantaim disp

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken lukim ol 'pyramid' long tudak na yu ken lukim ol tu bipo long 'show' i stat.
English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri em ol i kam long wanpela famili, kain olsem wanpela bikpela famili bilong ol sista na ol pikinini meri bilong ol.
English: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
Tok Pisin: Cochamó Valley -nambawan hap bilong mekim 'climbing' long Chile, em ol kolim Yosemite of South America, em i gat ol kainkain bikpela 'granite wall' na 'crag'.
English: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'downhill snowsport', we i gat 'skiing' na 'snowboarding', em ol 'sport' we planti lain i save long en na yu bai slaid (slide) i go daun long wanpela hap wantaim 'skis' o 'snowboard' we ol i pasim long lek bilong yu.
English: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
Tok Pisin: Sapos Rossby namba i liklik, 'magnetic reversal' bilong dispela sta bai i no ektif (active) tumas.

label: No gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami i bin kamap, na 'geophysics agency' bilong Jakarta i tok olsem, no gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami bai i kamap bikos dispela guria i no kamap long mak bilong 6.5 we i mak bilong givim tok lukaut bilong tsunami.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
Tok Pisin: Ol Safari em ating ol i nambawan samting we i save kisim ol turis i go long Africa na ol i bikpela samting long planti ol visita.
English: It states that the most effective place for the main subject is at the intersection of lines dividing the image into thirds vertically and horizontally (see example).
Tok Pisin: Em i tok olsem gutpela ples bilong wanpela sabjek (subject) long i stap long taim bilong kisim foto em long ples we ol lain i brukim piksa i go long tripela hap 'vertically' na 'horizontally' (lukim eksampel).
English: It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
Tok Pisin: Em i gutpela long wanpela long baim wanpela Wild Card, we i save givim tok orait long i go insait long ol park insait long South Africa o olgeta South African National Parks.
English: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong sekuriti long sekim ol manmeri long ol 'checkpoint' i wok long kamap nogut moa bihain long Septemba 11, 2001.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
Tok Pisin: Ol kendidet (candidate) i ken salim ol lain we i makim ol long go na witnesim olgeta wanwan hap bilong wok. Long avinun, ol volentia (volunteer) i save kaunim ol vot (vote) na i gat ol lain i save bihainim ol prosidia (procedure) bilong supavaisim (supervise) wok bilong ol.
English: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
Tok Pisin: Sekim 'label' long ol 'first aid instruction' bilong dipela posin.

Tok Pisin: Ol i save yusim wanpela jaient 'rocket' we longpela bilong em i winim 100 'feet' long putim wanpela 'telescope' long 'space'.
English: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
Tok Pisin: Ol sik we i save kalap hariap, o ol animal we i save bagarapim ol kilim ol manmeri wantaim fos, em ol i no kam aninit long dispela nem 'pest'.
English: Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity.
Tok Pisin: Stat long taim ol i kamapim Asunción long 1537, Paraguay i bin larim planti bilong ol pasin na kalsa bilong ol asples grup i stap yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain long Spain i stat long bosim dispela hap long mak bilong tripela 'century'.
English: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
Tok Pisin: Long Sande, Presiden bilong United States Donald Trump, i tok insait long wanpela leta we press secretary bilong em i ritim, em i tok olsem ol soldia bilong US bai i lusim kantri Syria.
English: Thus, the pencil was a good friend to many people when it came out.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, pensil (pencil) em i bin wanpela gutpela pren bilong planti manmeri taim em i bin kamap.

Tok Pisin: Long hap, ol i painim bodi bilong Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, i karamap long ol blanket we blut i pas long en.

Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'paleontologists' tude i bilip olsem wanpela grup bilong ol dainaso i stap laip yet long tude. Mipela i save kolim ol olsem pisin.

label: "Dispela em i no gutbai. Dispela em i taim bilong pasim wanpela sapta na opim nupela sapta."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).
Tok Pisin: 'Sleep interruption' em i pasin bilong kirap namel long slip na go bek long slip sotpela taim bihain (10–60 minit).
English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.

English: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait bilong dispela samting, ol kondisen bilong ais na sno (snow) em i nomol long planti kantri, na ol kar i save ron i go i kam gut long olgeta de bilong yia.
English: The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach.
Tok Pisin: Dispela ol pasin bilong intanet i save givim nupela save long wanem we yumi ken yusim ‌intanet na kisim amamas.
English: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol 'cruise' i save tok olsem ol i karim ol lain i go long Berlin, Germany insait long ol 'brochure' bilong ol. Olsem yu ken lukim long mep (map) i stap antap Berlin i no stap klostu long solwara na wanpela visit long siti em i no stap insait long prais bilong 'cruise'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
Tok Pisin: Izmir em i namba tri bikpela siti insait long Turkey wantaim wanpela populesen long kain olsem 3.7 milien, namba tu bikpela port bihainim long Istanbul, na em i wanpela bikpela senta bilong trenspot (transport).
English: European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.
Tok Pisin: Pasin na tingting bilong ol lain long Europe na 'colonialism' i stat long '15th century', taim eksplora (explorer) bilong Portugal Vasco de Gama i painim Cape Route taim em i stap long Europe na i go long India.
English: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel em raun, kisim foto, na kisim save long ol 'orangatuang' taim yu go long Borneo.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
English: The harbor was the site of an infamous naval standoff in 1889 when seven ships from Germany, the US, and Britain refused to leave the harbor.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'habor' em i ples we bikpela pait i bin kamap long 1889 taim sevenpela sip bilong Germany, US, na Britain i les long lusim dispela 'habor'.

Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela pati we i go pas long gavman, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), i winim bikpela namba bilong ol sia insait long ileksen bilong palimen.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long ol soldia i kam kamap, Haiti i no bin i gat problem long sait bilong sik stat long ol yia insait long 1800 i kam inap nau.
English: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).
Tok Pisin: Yusim ol blog long gutpela na stretpela we "i ken mekim ol sumatin i ken skelim ol samting na save long wanem samting i no stret na wanem we bilong stret; taim ol wok wantaim ol meteriel long Internet, ol sumatin i ken save long wanem mak ol i stap long en taim ol skelim samting we ol narapela i raitim na tu ol i ken givim tingting bilong ol long ol samting we i wok long kamap (Oravec, 2002).
English: Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim ol liklik kalsa i save pinis hariap na i no save lusim evidens (evidence) bilong histori bilong ol na ol savemanmeri i no save lukim ol olsem ol i 'civilization' tru tru.
English: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
Tok Pisin: Ol manmeri bai bringim ol samting bilong mekim ofa i go long ol god na ol pris bai traim long inapim samting we ol god i nidim taim ol i mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) na ol bikpela bung bilong lotu.

Tok Pisin: Taim ol animal i lukautim ol dispela pikinini, ol dispela 'feral' pikinini save soim ol pasin (we ol inap long mek) we i wankain olsem pasin bilong dispela animal we i lukautim ol, kain olsem pret o i no save wanem samting bilong mekim taim em i stap wantaim ol narapela manmeri.

label: Ol 'coalition' na soldia bilong Afghanistan i muv i go long dispela eria long kisim dispela hap na ol i salim ol narapela balus bilong ol 'coalition' long helpim ol long mekim dispela.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Long 1624, Dutch East India Company i wokim wanpela senta bilong ol long 'southwestern' Taiwan, dispela i statim wanpela senis we i kamap long pasin bilong wokim 'grain' taim ol i kisim ol wokman bilong China long wok long ol rais na suga plentesen (plantation) bilong em.

Tok Pisin: Longwe long saut em Niagara Fall na long not em Musoka, wanplea ples we i luk nais na i gat ol narapela ples moa i stap.

Tok Pisin: Dispela tingting bilong sains i tok olsem planti 'dark matter' long 'galaxy' i stap raunim 'galaxy' olsem wanpela 'halo', em i gat planti 'small particles' i stap insait long em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'safari' bilong wokabaut (ol i save kolim tu olsem wanpela "'bush walk'", "hiking safari", o 'going "'footing'") em i pasin bilong wokabaut, long sampela aua o long sampela de.
English: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
Tok Pisin: Bikos ol dispela eria i no gat planti manmeri, planti taim 'light pollution' em bai i no wanpela problem, yu bai inap long lukim ol sta.
English: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait bilong dispela samting, ol kondisen bilong ais na sno (snow) em i nomol long planti kantri, na ol kar i save ron i go i kam gut long olgeta de bilong yia.
English: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu stap insait long dispela 'zone', yu ken kalapim boda na yu bai i no inap go long 'passport control checkpoint' gen.
English: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'suit' em ol stendet bisnis klos, na ol wanwok i save kolim wanpela narapela long nem bilong famili bilong ol o ol taitol bilong ol long wok.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Long France, pasin bilong 'vote' em i no pasin bilong yusim teknoloji: ol vota (voter) i save go long wanpela tebol, putim wanpela we ol i bin prinim pinis we i soim wanem kendidet (candidate) ol i laik makim i go long wanpela envelop (envelope).

messages:

English: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

English: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel em olsem, ol i no gat kon, o tomato, o potato, o kakau, na no gat wanpela bilong ol lain bilong bipo long Rom i bin teistim wanpela 'turkey'.
English: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol tingting long mining bilong 'technological determinism' i gat tupela bikpela tingting insait long ol: wanpela em i olsem divelopmen bilong teknoloji i bihainim wanpela rot we kalsa na politiks i no inap long senisim, na narapela em i olsem teknoloji i kamapim "senis" long ol komuniti bikos dispela ol pasin na tingting em ol manmeri i bon wantaim na teknoloji i no kamapim.
English: Liggins followed in his father’s footsteps and entered a career in medicine.
Tok Pisin: Liggins i bihainim papa bilong em na i kisim wok long sait bilong marasin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol bikpela bilip bilong ol Kristen em i olsem ol i mas yusim gut mani na kago bilong ol long helpim ol narapela we i gat pen na hevi o i no gat mani na kaikai. Ol i bilip olsem mani bilong sios em i bilong mekim dispela wok.
English: Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela topik we dispela ripot i toktok long en, em mak bilong Jerusalem we i stap olsem ples holi long tupela kantri wantaim na hevi bilong Jordan Valley.
English: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
Tok Pisin: 'Re-entry shock' i save kamap hariap moa long 'culture shock' (i no gat 'honeymoon phase'), na em i save stap longpela taim na em i ken kamap long mak we i bikpela moa long 'culture shock'.
English: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
Tok Pisin: Ol travela i ken bungim kainkain animal bilong bagarapim klos na kaikai we ol i no klia long en insait long ples we ol i kam long en.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain bilong bipo long Rom i no bin i gat kaikai we i kam long America o Asia we nau ol i stap long Europe long sampela handret yia bihain.
English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'shooter' insait long dispela 'supplementary pest control' test em ol 'ranger' i was long ol, bikos dispela test em ol i monitarim (monitor) na skelim 'effectiveness' bilong em.
English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
Tok Pisin: Em i no samting bilong sem long en: em i no narakain long ol narapela samting ol manmeri i save pret long em na ol narapela samting ol planti manmeri i save les long en.
English: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
Tok Pisin: 'Flat white' kofi em i narakain samting long ol lain Australia. Wanpela 'short black' em i wanpela ' expresso', 'cappuccino' we i kam wantaim krim (i no 'froth'), na ol i no save mekim ti we i gat milk insait long en.
English: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela narapela samting we i narakain em i olsem taim ol manmeri we i no gat planti samting i kaikai kaiakia bilong ol taim ol i sindaun long ol sia, ol maniman i save laik long i gat ol bikpela bung kaikai we ol i save slip long sait bilong ol na kaikai.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
Tok Pisin:"}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
Tok Pisin: Moa long wan tausen yia, dispela lotu bilong ol Kristen i bin bungim ol kantri bilong Europe wantaim, maski ol i gat wanwan tok ples na kastom bilong ol yet.
English: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
Tok Pisin: Dispela liklik ples Haldarsvík em yu ken stap long em na lukluk i go long ailan bilong Eysturoy we i stap klostu na em i gat wanpela narapela kain sios we seip (shape) bilong em i olsem 'octagon'.
English: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
Tok Pisin: Taim Federal Government i kam na i kisim ol mani bilong Mersey haus sik long Devonport, long Tasmania, gavman bilong dispela 'state' na ol sampela MP bilong gavman i tok strong olsem dispela pasim em i trik bilong redi long ileksen we bai kamap long Novemba.
English: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela em ol i salim i go long George Washington long Julai 6, na em i ritim long ol soldia bilong em long New York long Julai 9. Wanpela kopi i kamap long London long Ogas 10.
English: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
Tok Pisin: Ol gem i stat long 10:00am wantaim gutpela weda na maski i bin i gat liklik ren long moning, em i pinis hariap, dispela de em i gutpela tru long pilai ragbi 7's.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela geim (game) bilong 'series' bai kamap long Ellis Park long Johannesburg long wik i kam, taim ol Sprinboks i pilai agensim ol Australia.

English: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

Tok Pisin: Ol mosasaurus i bin i stap olsem nambawan wel animal long dispela taim, no gat narapela animal i inap long kaikaim ol, olsem na ol i no pret long wanpela samting. Ol i save pret long narapela mosasaurus tasol.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'bill' em i tok olsem ol vidio geim (video game) bilong pait we ol i salim long Carlifonia em ol i mas makim wantaimwanpela 'decal reading' "18" na mekim ol lain i brukim dispela lo long baim $1000 long wanwan taim ol i brukim dispela lo.

Tok Pisin: Bihain tasol long pait i stat, Britain i mekim wanpela 'naval blockade' long Germany.
English: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.

English: Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport.
Tok Pisin: Tude, Timbuktu em i wanpela taun we i no gat planti samting, maski em i gat gutpela nem we i save pulim ol turis, na em i gat wanpela eapot.
English: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday.
Tok Pisin: Martelly mekim 'swearing in' bilong nainpela memba bilong wanpela nupela Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) long aste.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
Tok Pisin: Del Potro i bin gat sans pastaim insait long namba tu 'set', tasol dispela tu em i nidim wanpela 'tie break' taim i kamap 6-6.
English: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
Tok Pisin: Maski, 'project based learning' i mekim pasin bilong lainim samting i kamap isi moa na i kirapim intres (interest), 'scaffolding' em i mekim moa samting.

Tok Pisin: Risets i bin painimaut olsem sans bilong ol meri long kisim MS em i tupela taim moa long ol man.

Tok Pisin: Ol i bin tokaut olsem ol Sundarbans em i wanpela UNESCO World Heritage Site. Dispela hap bilong bikbus em i stap insait long teritori (territory) bilong India we ol i kolim Sundarbans National Park.
English: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'luminosity' na 'rotation' em ol i save yusim wantaim long painimaut Rossby namba bilong wanpela sta, na dispela em i gat rilesensip wantaim 'plasma flow'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
Tok Pisin: Insait long 1960, Brezezinski i wok olsem wanpela edvaisa bilong John F. Kennedy na bihain em i wok long Lyndon B. Johnson edministresen.
English: Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
Tok Pisin: Bikos i no gat bekim i kamap long dispela 'tactic', Germany i ting olsem wankain samting bai i kamap long ol 'submarine' bilong em.
English: Atoms are so incredibly tiny that trillions of them could fit into the period at the end of this sentence.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'atom' em ol i liklik liklik tru na trilien (trillion) bilong ol bai i inap long fit i go inap long wanpela 'full stop' long pinis bilong wanpela sentens (sentence).
English: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long longpela distens (distance) long kontinen (continent) ol 'mammal' i no inap long mekim longpela wokabaut na dispela i mekim 'giant tortoise' i kamap olsem nambawan animal bilong kaikai gras insait long Galapagos.
English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting we ol i tok orait long en em ol tingting bilong Aristotle long sains (science), wantaim saikoloji (psychology).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.
Tok Pisin: Nau sains (science) i soim olsem dispela traipela 'carbon economy' em i rausim 'biosphere' long wanpela 'stable state' we i bin sapotim ol manmeri long tupela milien yia i go pinis.
English: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
Tok Pisin: Teksi bilong serim wantaim narapela pasindia em i gutpela rot bilong sindaun gut na i go i kam hariap long ol ples i stap klostu, kain olsem Paro (Nu 150) na Punakha (Nu 200).
English: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World.
Tok Pisin: Em i bin wanpela ples we PBS progrem bilong Henry Louis Gates' Wonders of the African World i mekim wanpela bikpela stop na lukluk long en.
English: Aristotle, a philosopher, theorised that everything is made up of a mixture of one or more of four elements. They were earth, water, air, and fire.
Tok Pisin: Aristotle, wanpela filosofa (philosopher), i kamapim tingting olsem olgeta samting i kamap long ol wanpela o moa bilong ol foapela elemen (elements) i miks wantaim. Ol dispela elemen em graun, wara, win, na paia.
English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Wanpela man we i wok long skelim dispela samting i bin tok olsem Bishkek i wok long kamap long mak we "i no gat lo na oda", taim ol grup manmeri i raun long ol han rot na i stilim ol samting long ol stoa.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In fact, it is not easy to find at all even if one knew it existed. Once inside the cave, it is a total isolation.
Tok Pisin: Tru tru, em i no isi long painim em o save sapos em i stap. Taim yu stap insait long dispela hul bilong ston, em yu stap longwe olgeta long ol narapela samting.
English: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.

English: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'ocelot' i save laik long kaikai ol liklik animal. Ol i save ketsim ol manki (monkey), snek, rat na ol pisin sapos ol i inap long ketsim. Klostu olgeta animal we ol 'ocelot' i save painim em ol i liklik sais moa long em.
English: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.
Tok Pisin: Narapela samting, em animal kaikai (ol anis, ol 'termite', na kiau) em ol i isi long kaikai, na tu ol i givim bikpela mak bilong ol 'protein' we i gat olgeta ol 'amino acid' we bodi i nidim.
English: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
Tok Pisin: Long 1895, bihain long em i lusim pait insait long First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), Qing gavman i sainim Treaty of Shimonoseki, insait long dispela em i givim pawa bilong Taiwan i go long Japan, husat i bosim dispela ailan i go inap long 1945.

English: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
Tok Pisin: Ol meme bilong we ol man i save lukautim em ol i save putim ol long grup we i save raun long ol liklik maunten o ol narapela hap bilong kaikai, planti taim ol 'goatherd' i save was long ol na dispela em ol pikinini ol bikpela man we ol i save kolim olsem 'sheperd'. Ol dispela ol pasin bilong lukautim ol meme em ol i wok long yusim yet long tude.

Tok Pisin: Ol i save mekim planti raun i go long ol rip long olgeta taim insait long wanpela yia, na bagarap i kamap long bodi long ol dispela kain samting i save kamap wanwan taim tasol.
English: Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called "non-serious."
Tok Pisin: Long wik i go pinis, METI i tokaut olsem Apple i bin tokim em long 34-pela moa hevi i kamap long 'overheating', we dispela kamapani i kolim olsem "'i no bikpela samting."
English: As knowledge of Greek declined, the West found itself cut off from its Greek philosophical and scientific roots.
Tok Pisin: Taim save bilong ol Greek i go daun, West i lusim ol tingting bilong Greek long sains (science) na filosofi (philosophy).
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Aerosmith i bin stopim ol narapela konset (concert) we i stap yet long raun bilong ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
Tok Pisin: Long aste avinun, long La Plata, wanpela siti we i stap 50 kilomita (31-pela 'mile') long Buenos Aires, dispela senata (senator) husat em i Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kircher i tokaut olsem em bai i resis long kamap presiden.
English: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
Tok Pisin: Long wanpela 'route', ol bikpela kampani i gat ol balus bilong ol yet, tasol long ol narapela 'route' na long ol liklik bisnis i bin i gat wanpela problem.
English: As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance.
Tok Pisin: Bikos ol 'inter-district' bas (bus) i save pulap, em i gutpela long baim wanpela tiket sampela de bipo long taim bilong kalap long bas.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
Tok Pisin: Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, i givim wanpela tok save long moning we i tokaut olsem ol bai kotim Huhne na Pryce.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
Tok Pisin: U.S President George W. Bush i kamap long Singapore long moning bilong Novemba 16, long statim wanpela wik we em bai i raun lukim Asia.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'scaffold' em ol i ken kamap long komputa o em i ken tru insait long klasrum, narapela we bilong tok em i olsem, wanpela tisa em wanpela 'scaffold', tasol wanpela 'paperclip man' insait long Microsoft Office em tu i wanpela 'scaffold'.
English: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong sekuriti long sekim ol manmeri long ol 'checkpoint' i wok long kamap nogut moa bihain long Septemba 11, 2001.
English: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
Tok Pisin: Nuclear agency bilong Japan i tok olsem, ol i painimaut olsem i gat 'radioactive caesium' na 'iodine' long dispela diwai.
English: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.
Tok Pisin: Ol blog i ken kisim helpim sumatin long rait gut. Planti taim ol sumatin i statim blog bilong ol wantaim 'grammar' na 'spelling' we i no gutpela, na taim i gat lain bai i ritim ol bai i senis na i rait gut moa.
English: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
Tok Pisin: Taim ol i askim em long mekim sampela toktok, Miller i tok, "Mike i save toktok planti taim long taim bilong dispela kot...I wok long redi olsem na mi no harim wanem samting em wok long tok."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'medical charity' Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres na the World Health Organisation i tok olsem dispela em i 'outbreak' we i stap long mak nogut tru insait long dispela kantri.
English: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
Tok Pisin: No gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami i bin kamap, na 'geophysics agency' bilong Jakarta i tok olsem, no gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami bai i kamap bikos dispela guria i no kamap long mak bilong 6.5 we i mak bilong givim tok lukaut bilong tsunami.
English: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
Tok Pisin: Long 'twelfth century', velu (value) bilong em i go daun bikos ol Crusaders i bin kam bek na ol i karim ol presen kain olsem ol silk na spais. Velu bilong ol dispela samting i antap moa long velu bilong ol samting we i stap long ol maket bilong ol Byzantine.
English: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, i gat sampela bas (bus) i save go long hap not long Hebron, dispela em i ples we ol i planim ol papa bilong bilip insait long Baibel Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, na ol meri bilong ol.
English: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
Tok Pisin: Wankain taim yu, ol man i mas werim ol trausers we i karamapim ni (knee).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
Tok Pisin: Maski tripela lain i bin stap insait long haus taim dispela kar i bamim, no gat wanpela bilong ol i kisim bagarap.
English: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'bill' em i tok olsem ol vidio geim (video game) bilong pait we ol i salim long Carlifonia em ol i mas makim wantaimwanpela 'decal reading' "18" na mekim ol lain i brukim dispela lo long baim $1000 long wanwan taim ol i brukim dispela lo.
English: The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African.
Tok Pisin: Dispela siti em i narapela kain long olgeta narapela siti bilong kantri, bikos em i luk moa olsem ples bilong Arab na i no olsem ples bilong Africa.
English: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'scaffold' long komputa em ol i stap insait long ol 'software' na wok bilong ol em long askim kwesten, tok save long wanem samting bilong mekim, na tok klia long ol rot bilong mekim samting we i hat long ol sumatin long mekim long save bilong ol yet.
English: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
Tok Pisin: "Em i luk nais tru na tu, em i save singsing gut," em i tok olsem insait long wanpela 'news conference' rekoding.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.

English: These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela rilesensip i save helpim long mekim 'planning', 'design', na 'operation' bilong ol 'roadway facilities'.
English: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
Tok Pisin: Cochamó Valley -nambawan hap bilong mekim 'climbing' long Chile, em ol kolim Yosemite of South America, em i gat ol kainkain bikpela 'granite wall' na 'crag'.
English: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.
Tok Pisin: Ol bas (bus) i save lusim 'inter-district bus station' (we i stap long narapela sait bilong wara) long de taim, maski planti, bilong ol we i go long is na Jakar/Bumthang i save lusim stesin long namel long 06:30 na 07:30.
English: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol manmeri husat i save liklik log Spanish i ken ting olsem Portuguese em i klostu wankain olsem Spanish na i no gat nid long stadi long em.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Em i tok moa olsem "ol i mas no ken askim ol long mekim ol wok we i antap moa long mak bilong divelopmen we ol i stap long em, mak bilong wok ol inap long mekim, na mak bilong save ol i gat."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Why would an organization want to go through the time consuming process of establishing a learning organization? One goal for putting organizational learning concepts into practice is innovation.
Tok Pisin: Wai na wanpela oganaisesen bai laik long mekim wok we i save kisim planti taim? Dispela em wok bilong kamapim wanpela oganaisesen we i save lainim samting. Wanpela bilong ol as tingting bilong mekim 'organizational learning' i kamap insait long oganaisesen em pasin bilong 'innovation'.
English: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel bilong ol 'on-site activity' em painim pis, kisim foto, lukim ol pisin, na raun long ol 'park' na stadim infomesen long 'ecosystem'.
English: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
Tok Pisin: Ol eksiden we i kamap long skai i save kamap planti taim long Iran, we i gat ol olpela balus na ol i no save mentenim gut long mekim ol operesen bilong pablik na bilong militeri (military).
English: In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love.
Tok Pisin: Insait long as tingting bilong em Tibetan Buddhism em i isi tru. Em i gat Kundalini Yoga, 'meditation' and the rot bilong 'all-embracing love'.
English: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save luk nais tru insait long wel envaironmen bilong ol, olsem an no ken traim long rausim "wanpela tasol" na kisim olsem ‘specimen’.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'curry' em i wanpela kaikai we i yusim ol 'herb' na 'spice', wantaim ol abus o kumu.
English: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
Tok Pisin: 'Great pyramid' em ol i bin wokim long givim ona long Pharaoh Khufu, na planti ol liklik pyramid, ol 'tomb', na tempel em ol i wok long givim ona long ol meri na famili memba bilong Khufu.
English: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken lukluk gut tru long tudak wantaim 'night vision', na tu, ol i save muv isi tru. Ol 'ocelot' i save painim kaikai bilong ol taim ol i hait wantaim ol samting i stap long envairomen na kalap antap long animal we ol i laik ketsim.
English: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wara i stap long han bilong yu bai i 'react' wantaim ol 'layer' we i stap autsait, we bai i pilim narakain na kamapim wanpela kain sel.
English: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
Tok Pisin: Duvall, em i marit na em i gat tupela bikpela pikinini, na em i no mekim Miller i amamas, we dispela stori i toktok long en.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.

Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela geim (game) bilong 'series' bai kamap long Ellis Park long Johannesburg long wik i kam, taim ol Sprinboks i pilai agensim ol Australia.
English: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.
Tok Pisin: Dispela plen bilong ol em i wok gut, ol i stopim impoten saplai (supply) i go long militeri (military) na ol manmeri, maski dispela 'blokade' i brukim intanesinel lo we i bin kamap aninit long ol agrimen bilong tupela 'century' i go pinis.
English: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
Tok Pisin: Biahin long ol risalt i kam autsait, Gingrich i apim nem bilong Santorum, tasol em i gat ol strongpela toktok long Romney, husat i bin mekim ol negatif kempen edvetismen (campaign advertisment) long Gingrich long Iowa.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'coalition' na soldia bilong Afghanistan i muv i go long dispela eria long kisim dispela hap na ol i salim ol narapela balus bilong ol 'coalition' long helpim ol long mekim dispela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

Tok Pisin: I luk olsem bai i gat moa 'maria' long sait i stap klostu bikos 'crust' em i 'thin' moa. Em i isi moa long 'lava' long kam antap long autsait.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Using ships to transport goods is by far the most efficient way to move large amounts of people and goods across oceans.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong yusim sip long muvim ol samting em i nambawan we tru bilong muvim bikpela namba bilong ol kago o ol manmeri long solwara.
English: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
Tok Pisin: Maski dispela em i wanpela 'stereotype' we i no stret, nambawan we long stap long Paris em long mekim ol gutpela pasin, ekt olsem wanpela man o meri husat i "bien élevé" (papamama bilong em i skulim em gut). Em bai mekim isi long i go i kam long Paris.
English: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
Tok Pisin: Teksi bilong serim wantaim narapela pasindia em i gutpela rot bilong sindaun gut na i go i kam hariap long ol ples i stap klostu, kain olsem Paro (Nu 150) na Punakha (Nu 200).
English: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wanwan gavman long givim ol paspot (passport) we ol i no makim (X) long man o meri o givim ol dokumen long soim senis long nem na man i go long meri o meri i go long man em i narakain narakain long wanwan gavman.
English: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon".
