messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i mekim risets long Princeton University long United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i mekim ripot long wanpela nupela 'specie' we i kamap insait long tupela generesen (generation), tasol ol i ting long dispela proses (process) i kisim longpela taim moa, em i kamap bikos long 'breeding' i kamap namel long Darwin finch bilong dispela eria, Geospiza fortes, na cactus finch we i kam long narapela eria, Geospiza conirostris.
English: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol i bin mekim wanpela test we ol i kolim PALM, ZMapp i stap olsem wanpela 'control', dispela em i min olsem ol saintis i yusim em olsem wanpela 'baseline' na i skelim wanem we ol narapela tritmen i wok bihainim em.
English: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun long wanpela hos, tasol lek bilong em i pas long 'stirrup', hos i ken pulim ol taim em i ranawe. Long daunim mak bilong dispela hevi long kamap, ol 'rider' i mas mekim samting long abrusim dispela.
English: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
Tok Pisin: Ol Gurani em ol impoten as ples manmeri we i stap nau long ples we ol i kolim Eastern Paraguay, na ol i save raun na pasinim abus na tu, ol i save planim kaikai long gaden.

Tok Pisin: Mausman bilong Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman i tok: "Angola i wok long go long mak we i nogut tru long dispela 'outbreak' na dispela hevi em i stap nogut tru long Angola," em i tok.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
Tok Pisin: Dispela sevis em planti taim ol sip i save yusim, na ol 'pleasure craft', wantaim ol 'expedition' husat i gat nid long yusim 'remote data' na 'remote voice'.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Tok Pisin: 'Great Pyramid' long Giza em i wanpela bilong ol 'seven wonders' we i sanap yet long tude.
English: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
Tok Pisin: Sikret (secret) bilong hau ol i save stap gut em i dispela samting ol i kolim 'niche', wanpela spesol wok wanwan pusi i save mekim na em i no resis wantaim narapela.
English: As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance.
Tok Pisin: Bikos ol 'inter-district' bas (bus) i save pulap, em i gutpela long baim wanpela tiket sampela de bipo long taim bilong kalap long bas.
English: Liggins followed in his father’s footsteps and entered a career in medicine.
Tok Pisin: Liggins i bihainim papa bilong em na i kisim wok long sait bilong marasin.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: NHK tu i ripot olsem Kashiwazaki Kariwa 'nuclear power plant' long Niigata provins i wok long wok gut.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
Tok Pisin: Dispela woa em bai i stap 40-pela yia na pait i kamap tru tru, long ol ami (army) we i makim ol kantri, long ol ples bilong pait long Africa i go long Asia, long Afghanistan, Cuba na planti narapela ples.
English: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel bilong ol 'on-site activity' em painim pis, kisim foto, lukim ol pisin, na raun long ol 'park' na stadim infomesen long 'ecosystem'.
English: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
Tok Pisin: Ol i bin tok olsem ol bai i katim em i go daun long Tunde, tasol wanpela imejensi kot 'ruling' i seivim dispela diwai.
English: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong sekuriti long sekim ol manmeri long ol 'checkpoint' i wok long kamap nogut moa bihain long Septemba 11, 2001.
English: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
Tok Pisin: Dispela ol protes em sampela taim i save kamapim kros na pait na ol i wok long kamap bikos i no gat ileksen i kamap, sampela i sapos long kamap long 2011.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. i ripot olsem i no gat sain bilong guria na Number 1 na Number 2 reactor we i stap long Shika 'nuclear power plant' em ol i pasim.
predictions: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. i tok olsem i no gat samting

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century.
Tok Pisin: Gothic style i kamap bikpela long taim namel long '10th - 11th century' na '14 century'.
English: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok, i luk olsem dispela bodi i stap insait long hap long kain olsem wanpela de.
English: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
Tok Pisin: Maski i no gat birua bilong tsunami i stap, ol lain i wok long pret na i stat long lusim ol bisnis na haus bilong ol.
English: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta fotinpela skul long Hawaii we i stap long nambis o i stap klostu long nambis i bin pas long Trinde, maski ol i bin rausim dispela tok lukaut.
English: New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain Egypt bilong New Kingdom i tingting olsem ol dispela bilding bilong ol tumbuna bilong ol em i narakain tru, long dispela taim ol dispela 'pyramid' i gat moa long tausen krismas.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol i mekim ripot olsem klostu 9400 haus long dispela rijen i no gat wata na klostu 100 bilong ol i no gar ilektrisiti (electricity).
predictions: Ol i tok, long dispela hap, 9400 haus i

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'travel agent' i save givim ol offer' we i gat brekfas (breakfast), kar bilong kisim yu i go i kam long eapot o bungim tu ol prais bilong balus tiket na prais bilong hotel.
English: The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October.
Tok Pisin: Dispela komisen (commission) em i wanpela samting we Martelly i mekim bikos long ol 'anit-regime' protes we i wok long kamap long olgeta hap na i stat long Oktoba.
English: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
Tok Pisin: Biahin long ol risalt i kam autsait, Gingrich i apim nem bilong Santorum, tasol em i gat ol strongpela toktok long Romney, husat i bin mekim ol negatif kempen edvetismen (campaign advertisment) long Gingrich long Iowa.
English: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
Tok Pisin: House Speaker bilong bipo Newt Gingrich, gavana bilong Texas Rick Perry, na Congresswoman Michele Bachmann i pinis namba foa, faiv na siks.
English: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
Tok Pisin: Dispela progrem i stat long 8:30 p.m. long lokel taim (15.00 UTC).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Sampela bilong ol rot em ol i bin bagarap, i no gat sevis bilong trein (train) long ol eria we guria i kamap long en, na Noto Airport long Ishikawa provins em i pas yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
Tok Pisin: Cyanuric acid na melamine em ol i bin painim ol insait long ol 'sample' bilong pispis bilong ol 'pes' we i bin dai taim ol i kaikai dispela kaikai bilong animal we i posin insait long em.
English: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim ol spesel taua we seip (shape) bilong ol i olsem ol 'pyramid', na ol i kolim ol 'ziggurats', em ol i save bildim olsem pat bilong ol tempel.
English: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
Tok Pisin: Dispela eria em i ples bilong ol kainkain animal na pisin.
English: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela 'feral' pikinini em ol lain i tok olsem ol animal long bus i lukautim ol; sampela em ol lain i tok olsem ol i stap ol yet long bus.
English: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, taim yu go lukim ol kasol (castle) insait long Loire Valley, Rhine valley o kisim wanpela ‘cruise’ i go long ol naispela siti long Danube o ‘boating’ long Erie Canal.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Wanpela bom i pairap autsait long ofis bilong gavana jenerel.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This can be easily done by using a relatively quiet alarm clock to bring you to consciousness without fully waking you.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em yu ken mekim taim yu yusim wanpela 'quiet alarm clock' long mekim yu i kirap isi isi na i no kirapim yu wantu.
English: The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
Tok Pisin: Rom i bin go pas long lukautim wok bilong sios long tausen yia na planti pawa na moni i stap long Rom. Dispela i mekim na planti manmeri i wok long i gat tupela tingting sapos em i inapim dispela bilip, o nogat.
English: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol draiva i save mekim pasin long mak we i 'consistent', olsem na, ol 'traffic' i save i gat sampela samting i 'consistent' long ol na dispela em ol savemanmeri i ken soim wantaim ol namba bilong 'mathematics'.
English: Elements like calcium and potassium are considered metals. Of course, there are also metals like silver and gold.
Tok Pisin: Ol elemen (element) kain olsem 'calcium' na 'potassium' em ol i save lukim ol olsem ol metel (metal). I gat ol narapela metel tu olsem silva na gol.
English: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.
Tok Pisin: Neurobiological infomesen i givim evidens (evidence) long wanpela 'theoretical approach' long investigesen bilong 'cognition'. Olsem na em i mekim eria bilong risets i kamap liklik moa na mekim em i kamap long 'exact'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Tripela moa bom i pairap klostu long ol bilding bilong gavman insait long tupela aua.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
Tok Pisin: Em i tok moa olsem "ol i mas no ken askim ol long mekim ol wok we i antap moa long mak bilong divelopmen we ol i stap long em, mak bilong wok ol inap long mekim, na mak bilong save ol i gat."
English: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
Tok Pisin: Ol animal we i no stap long planti hap kain olsem 'European brown bear', 'wolf', 'owl', 'lynx', 'wild cat', na 'capercaillie' i stap long hap, wantaim ol narapela animal we i stap long planti hap.
English: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel, ol sitisen bilong America long Middle East em ol bai i stap long narapela we long ol lain long Europe na ol Arab.
English: It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive.
Tok Pisin: Em i gutpela long werim wanpela ring (no ken werim ring we i luk ekspensif).
English: The eathquake struck Mariana at 07:19 a.m. local time (09:19 p.m. GMT Friday).
Tok Pisin: Dispela guria i kamap long Mariana long 07:19 a.m lokel taim (09:19 p.m GMT long Fraide).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i planti ol lain i lusim skul i wok long mekim, dispela em i mekim ol i kisim wanpela yia long malolo bipo long ol i go long univesiti, na ol i no stopim skul bilong ol.
English: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
Tok Pisin: Ol wok bilong painim dispela hap we 'crash' i kamap i bin bungim weda (weather) nogut na ples we i hat long man i go long en.
English: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
Tok Pisin: Long Tonga, no gat ripot bilong bikpela bagarap i kamap long ol samting o long ol manmeri, tasol i no gat pawa bilong lait, na dispela i mekim na ol atoriti long Tonga i no bin kisim tok lukaut bilong tsunami we PTWC i bin salim.
English: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
Tok Pisin: Ol plen bilong givim ol dispela sut marasin i go long ol eria we i gat histori bilong planti lain pik i sik long dispela yia i no bin kamap bikos i no gat inap mani na ol i no ting olsem em i wanpela bikpela samting taim ol i skelim em wantaim ol narapela sik.
English: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.
Tok Pisin: Long mekim 'traffic flow' i kamap gutpela moa, ol rilesensip i mas kamap namel long tripela bikpela samting: (1) 'flow', (2) 'density', and (3) 'velocity'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'winter sport' em planti lain long ol 'Northern regions' i save long en, na ol lain long Italy i save pilai insait long ol intanesinel geim (game) na ol Olympic events.
English: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
Tok Pisin: 'Pyramid sound and light show' em i wanpela samting we ol pikinini i save laikim na em i stap long dispela eria.
English: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.
Tok Pisin: 34 pesen (percent) bilong ol lain insait long dispela 'poll' i gat dispela tingting, we ol i laik olsem Queen Elizabeth II i mas kamap laspela kwin bilong Australia.
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Tok Pisin: Wankain, taim yu gat wanpela Schengen visa, yu no nid long aplai long ol visa long wanwan bilong ol Schengen memba kantri, na dispela seivim taim, mani na pepawok.
English: The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report "truly regrettable."
Tok Pisin: Dispela ministri i autim tingting bilong em taim em i kolim dispela pasin bilong Apple long i no givim ripot hariap olsem "i no gutpela tru."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dispela tupela 'compound' i save 'react' wantaim long kamapim ol 'crystal' we i ken blokim kidni long mekim wok bilong em, ol lain i go pas long risets long univesiti i tok.
predictions: Ol tufela 'compound' i wokim wanpela 'reaction' long wanpela na wanpela long mekim ol 'crystal' we i save blokim ol 'kidney function', ol 'researcher' long dispela 'university' i tok.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
Tok Pisin: Em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela samting we i save pulim ol turis i go long South Africa na ol i save lukim em olsem impoten samting insait long South African National Parks (SANParks).
English: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
Tok Pisin: Em i klia tru olsem, sapos yu save long wanpela Romance tok ples, em bai isi moa long yu long lainim Portuguese.
English: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
Tok Pisin: Traim long swim i go long wanpela hap we 'current' i no pulim bek gen o, bihainim mak bilong yu long swim na saposl i gat lain i lukim yu, yu ken tingting long wet long ol lain i ken seivim (save) yu.
English: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
Tok Pisin: Plis soim bikpela rispek long dispela ples. No ken mekim ol tok pilai long Holocaust o Nazis.
English: People have known about basic chemical elements such as gold, silver, and copper from antiquity, as these can all be discovered in nature in native form and are relatively simple to mine with primitive tools.
Tok Pisin: Ol manmeri i bin save long ol bikpela kemikel elemen (chemical element) kain olsem gol, silva, na kopa (copper) long bipo taim, bikos ol i bin painim ol insait long envairomen long 'native form' na em i isi long painim ol wantaim ol tul (tool) bilong bipo.

Tok Pisin:"}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.
Tok Pisin: 'Roar' bilong taiga em i wankaim olsem 'full-voiced roar' bilong wanpela laion, tasol em i klostu i laik wankain olsem wanpela sentens bilong man i pulim win taim em kros na singaut.
English: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta animal we i kam kamap long ailen i kam long hia taim ol i swim, flai o trip antap long wara.
English: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.
Tok Pisin: Ol laion, 'cheetah' na 'leopard' em sampela taim ol i save sem long kam ples klia na yu bai lukim ol gut taim yu yusim ol 'binoculars'.
English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim i go pinis long dispela wik, wanpela helikopta (helicopter) i 'crash' na i kilim tripela lain na narapela tripela i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong ol.
English: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wok painimaut i givim sampela tingting tu long wanem we gras bilong pisin i save kamap.

English: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
Tok Pisin: Madhya Pradesh Police i painim dispela leptop na mobail fon we ol i bin stilim.
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.
English: This seems sensible, because the Earth doesn't feel as if it's moving, does it?
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i luk olsem i stret, bikos yumi no save pilim olsem Earth i muv, a?
English: The rise of new technologies allows us to see and investigate brain structures and processes never seen before.
Tok Pisin: Dispela ol nupela teknoloji we i kamap i helpim mipela long lukim na mekim investigesen long ol straksa (structure) na proses (process) bilong brein (brain) we mipela i no bin lukim bipo.
English: Ottawa is Canada's charming, bilingual capital and features an array of art galleries and museums that showcase Canada's past and present.
Tok Pisin: Ottawa em i kapitol bilong Canada we ol lain i save yusim tupela tok ples na em i gat ol 'art gallery' na 'museum' we i soim taim bipo na taim bilong tude long Canada.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol i save yusim tok ples Spanish long ol pablik trenspot na ol narapela hap.
English: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'safari' we planti lain i save yusim em i toktok long travel long graun long lukim ol narakain animal bilong Africa, planti bilong ol em ol animal bilong 'savanna'.
English: It was ruled by the "Vichy" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them.
Tok Pisin: Dipela hap em ol "Vichy" French i bin bosim. Ol dispela lain ol French manmeri husat i bin mekim 'peace' wantaim ol German long 1940 na i wok wantaim ol lain i kam long kisim kantri bilong ol na ol i no pait agensim ol.

Tok Pisin: Mani bilong woa we U.S i kamapim taim em i laik holimpasim na kisim Philippines em ol manmeri long Filipino yet i baim.

Tok Pisin: Siminoff i tok olsem namba bilong ol samting we em i wok long salim i go antap taim emi kamap long wanpela episod bilong Shark Tank progrem we ol lain i stap insait long dispela progrem i no laik long givim em sampela mani bilong helpim bisnis bilong em.

label: Tasol eti pesen bilong ol kago bilong mipela em ol i save putim takis long em insait long ol 'tarriff' long ol kantri bilong Central America.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.
English: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu bin i go long narapela kantri long namba wan taim tru, yu bin isi na traim long lainim samting, yu save olsem ol travela i stap long narapela kantri i mas senisim tingting na pasin bilong ol.
English: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
Tok Pisin: Dispela muvi we Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone i stap insait long en, em ol lain i makim em long i stap insait long olgeta bikpela 'category'.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

English: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.
Tok Pisin: 'National football' bilong Italy, wantaim 'national football' tim bilong Germany em tupela namba tu tim we i gutpela tru insait long olgeta hap bilong graun na ol i bin sempion bilong FIFA World Cup long 2006.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'downhill snowsport', we i gat 'skiing' na 'snowboarding', em ol 'sport' we planti lain i save long en na yu bai slaid (slide) i go daun long wanpela hap wantaim 'skis' o 'snowboard' we ol i pasim long lek bilong yu.
English: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta moning. ol manmeri i save lusim liklik kantri taun taim ol i kalap long kar long go long ol ples bilong ol long wok na ol i save abrus ol narapela lain we ples bilong ol long wok i stap long ples we ol i lusim nau tasol na i kam.
English: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
Tok Pisin: I save i gat etinpela 'medal' tasol bilong winim long wanwan de, sampela kantri i no bin winim wanpela 'medal' na go long 'medal podium' long kisim.
English: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
Tok Pisin: Long 1956 Slania i muv i go long Sweden, tripela yia bihain em i stat wok long Swedish Post Office na kamap olsem 'chief engraver' bilong ol.

Tok Pisin: taim i go long pinis bilong ol Middle Ages 'western' Europe i stat long kamapim ol stail bilong ol yet. Wanpela bilong ol bikpela divelopmen we i kamap long dispela taim bikos long ol 'crusades' em ol manmeri i stat long yusim ol baten long pasim ol klos.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
Tok Pisin: Bipo em i bin wanpela siti ol i kolim Smyrna, nau em i kamap olsem siti bilong tude, em i divelop pinis, na planti wok bisnis i save kamap long en, em i stap raunim wanpela basis na ol maunten i raunim em.
English: This behavior oftentimes results in rifts between the leaders and the rest of the team.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin i save mekim hevi i kamap namel long ol lida na ol tim.

Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.
English: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu go long wanpela gaden we ol i stretim bilong ol lalin i kam na lukim, pasin bilong kolektim ol "'specimen’" bai mekim na ol i rausim yu, na ol i no inap toktok planti.
English: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.
Tok Pisin: 34 pesen (percent) bilong ol lain insait long dispela 'poll' i gat dispela tingting, we ol i laik olsem Queen Elizabeth II i mas kamap laspela kwin bilong Australia.

messages:

Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela narapela samting we i narakain em i olsem taim ol manmeri we i no gat planti samting i kaikai kaiakia bilong ol taim ol i sindaun long ol sia, ol maniman i save laik long i gat ol bikpela bung kaikai we ol i save slip long sait bilong ol na kaikai.
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.
English: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
Tok Pisin: Ol weda (weather) nogut i ken kamap long kainkain hap bilong dispela graun, na i gat kainkain, dispela em bai bihainim ples, envairomen, na ol kondisen bilong 'atmosphere'.
English: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'German pastry' em ol i gutpela tru, na long Bavaria, ol i gat gutpela teist na i gat kainkain, wankain olsem ol dispela bilong ol lain i stap saut, ol Austria.
English: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.
Tok Pisin: Long ol 'developed country' yu bai no inap long harim wankain mak bilong komplen long kwaliti bilong wara ol bris i pundaun.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.

English: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.

English: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol lain i mekim risets long Princeton University long United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i mekim ripot long wanpela nupela 'specie' we i kamap insait long tupela generesen (generation), tasol ol i ting long dispela proses (process) i kisim longpela taim moa, em i kamap bikos long 'breeding' i kamap namel long Darwin finch bilong dispela eria, Geospiza fortes, na cactus finch we i kam long narapela eria, Geospiza conirostris.
predictions: United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i tok olsem dispela niupela

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."

Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: We perceive the Foster Care System to be a safety zone for these children.

English: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
Tok Pisin: Ancient China i gat wanpela narakain we bilong soim ol kainkain time; wanwan 'stage' bilong China o wanwan famili we i holim pawa em i wanpela 'dynasty'.
English: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
Tok Pisin: Ol Liberal i tok olsem ol wok bilong bildim bek gen ol samting we i bin bagarap i bin lukluk long givim ol wok kontrak bilong konstraksen (construction) i go long ol bisnis we i gat sampela luksave lain bilong ol i stap long Washington.
English: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
Tok Pisin: Ol eksiden we i kamap long skai i save kamap planti taim long Iran, we i gat ol olpela balus na ol i no save mentenim gut long mekim ol operesen bilong pablik na bilong militeri (military).

Tok Pisin: Ol i mekim tupela 'experiment' we tupela i makim DNA insait long 'phage' wantaim wanpela 'radioactive phosphorus' o tupela i makim 'protein' bilong 'phage' wantaim 'radioactive sulfur'.
English: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long wanpela oganaisesen i ken i gat ol nupela na narapela kain we bilong mekim samting, ol lida i mas kamapim wanpela kalsa bilong kamapim ol nupela na narapela kain samting na tu, i mas i gat pasin bilong serim save na lainim samting wantaim.

English: Atoms are so incredibly tiny that trillions of them could fit into the period at the end of this sentence.

English: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
Tok Pisin: No gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami i bin kamap, na 'geophysics agency' bilong Jakarta i tok olsem, no gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami bai i kamap bikos dispela guria i no kamap long mak bilong 6.5 we i mak bilong givim tok lukaut bilong tsunami.
English: The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived.
Tok Pisin: 25-pela Dunlop broadies em ol i stap yet na ol i olpela kopi tru bilong dispela dokumen. Dispela namba wan dokumen we ol i raitim long han em i bagarap.
English: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran.
Tok Pisin: Ol man i stat long lukautim meme long kain taim olsem 10,000 yia i go pinis long Zagros Mountains bilong Iran.
English: Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
Tok Pisin: Bilong wanem na ol 'transportation system' i save kamapim ol dispela kain komplen, bilong wanem na ol i no save wok gut long olgeta de? Ol 'transportation engineer' i no save long mekim wok bilong ol? O, i gat samting we i bikpela moa i wok long kamap?
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim 'oxygen' we yumi ol manmeri i save pulim win long en, na ol i save kisim 'carbon dioxide' we yumi ol manmeri i save rausim i kam autsait long bodi bilong yumi (dispela em, taim win we yumi i pulim i go insait i kam autsait).
predictions: Ol planti i mekim oksijen we ol man i putim, na ol i kisim ka bon-dai-oksaid we ol man i

Tok Pisin: Ol i fosim ol long baim takis i go long 'colonial regime' bilong U.S long givim mani i go long ol 'expenditure' na 'interest' long ol 'bond' we ol yusim aninit long nem bilong gavman bilong Philipines insait long ol benk (bank) bilong Wall Street.

English: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wara i stap long han bilong yu bai i 'react' wantaim ol 'layer' we i stap autsait, we bai i pilim narakain na kamapim wanpela kain sel.

English: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
Tok Pisin: Dispela sevis em planti taim ol sip i save yusim, na ol 'pleasure craft', wantaim ol 'expedition' husat i gat nid long yusim 'remote data' na 'remote voice'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela trupela “'invisible team'” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) em i wanpela narakain samting i stap insait long ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa.

Tok Pisin: Giza Plateau, o "Giza Necropolis" insait long Valley of the Dead bilong Egypt i gat sampela pyramid (bikpela tru long olgeta em 'great pyramid'), sampela liklik 'tomb', sampela tempel, na 'great Sphinx'.
English: As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park.
Tok Pisin: Wankain olsem olgeta South African National Parks, i gat 'conservation' na 'entry fee' bilong wanwan de long ol park.
English: Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'pride' i save i gat wanpela i go long mak bilong tripela man, wantaim kain olsem tetipela meri na pikinini.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
Tok Pisin: Tupelal singsing bilong dispela muvi, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars, em ol i makim olsem 'best original song'. Ol i makim Lionsgate studio 26-pela taim—dispela em i moa long olgeta narapela 'studio'.

Tok Pisin: Danius i tok, "Nau yet, mipela i no wok long mekim wanpela samting. Mi bin ring na salim ol i-meil long man i save wok wantaim em na mi bin kisim ol gutpela bekim na dispela em i inap."

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The “invisible team” is the management team to which each of the members report. The invisible team sets the standards for each member.
Tok Pisin: Dispela “'invisible team'” em i wanpela 'management team' we wanwan memba bilong tim i save ripot i go long en. Dispela 'invisible team' i save makim stendet bilong wanwan memba long bihainim.
English: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken lukluk gut tru long tudak wantaim 'night vision', na tu, ol i save muv isi tru. Ol 'ocelot' i save painim kaikai bilong ol taim ol i hait wantaim ol samting i stap long envairomen na kalap antap long animal we ol i laik ketsim.
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.
English: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
Tok Pisin: Planti dai i save kamap bikos ol manmeri i pilim tait long traim long swim i kam bek agensim 'current', na dispela em i hat long mekim.
English: Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner.
Tok Pisin: Dispela bikpela pawa bilong em i kamapim senis long olgeta manmeri. Stat long king na i go daun long ol manmeri nating we i no gat nem na namba.

Tok Pisin: Bihain tasol long pait i stat, Britain i mekim wanpela 'naval blockade' long Germany.

English: He trained as an obstetrician and began to work at the Auckland's National Women's Hospital in 1959.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.

English: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sport' we planti manmeri i save long en em 'football', 'basketball', 'volleyball', 'water-polo', 'fencing', 'rugby', 'cycling', 'ice hockey', 'roller hockey' na 'F1 motor racing'.
English: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
Tok Pisin: Plis soim bikpela rispek long dispela ples. No ken mekim ol tok pilai long Holocaust o Nazis.
English: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
Tok Pisin: Mi lusim susa bilong mi na pren bilong em, na taim mi go long hap i gat tupela lain i sindaun long 'wheelchair', na ol i manmeri i kalapim tupela na pusim tupela tasol," Armand Versace.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol manmeri bai bringim ol samting bilong mekim ofa i go long ol god na ol pris bai traim long inapim samting we ol god i nidim taim ol i mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) na ol bikpela bung bilong lotu.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
Tok Pisin: Narapela resis bilong em, Giant Slalom, em i pinis namba ten insait long 'women's siiting group' wantaim ran taim bilong 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minit bihain long meri i kam long namba wan ples Austrian Claudia Loesch na 1:09.02 bihain long meri i kam long namba nain ples Gyöngyi Dani bilong Hungary.
English: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.
Tok Pisin: Maski ol i luk olsem ol i stap isi, ol 'bison', 'elk', 'moose', bea, na klostu olgeta bikpela animal i ken pait.
English: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim em i kama bun na liklik nogut tru na stikim (stick) em i go long ol narapela metel (metal). Sampela taim ol i ken mekim em i kama bun nogut tru na yusim em long bilasim ol piksa we ol peintim (paint) long han na insait long buk we ol i kolim "illuminated manuscripts".
English: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
Tok Pisin: Bikos ol gras bilong pisin we i stap long ol dainaso i no gat 'well-developed shaft', we ol i save kolim 'rachis', tasol em i gat tupela narapela samting long ol gras bilong pisin— 'barbs' na 'barbules' — ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i skelim olsem dispela 'rachis' em i kamap bihain long divelopmen bilong ol dispela gras bilong ol pisin we i stap long ol dainaso.
English: European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.
Tok Pisin: Pasin na tingting bilong ol lain long Europe na 'colonialism' i stat long '15th century', taim eksplora (explorer) bilong Portugal Vasco de Gama i painim Cape Route taim em i stap long Europe na i go long India.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Wanwan tempel i gat wanpela ples bilong sindaun autsait na i gat ples insait we ol pris tasol i ken i go insait.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers.
Tok Pisin: Klostu olgeta komputa we ol i yusim long tude em ol i save senisim infomesen i stap long 'code' bilong ol 'binary number'.
English: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'civilization' em i kam long wanpela tok Latin 'civilis', em i min olsem 'civil', na em i wankain olsem narapela tok Latin 'civis', mining bilong en em 'citizen', na 'civitas', mining bilong en em siti o 'city-state', na dispela tu em i toktok long sais bilong 'society'.
English: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
Tok Pisin: Draiva bilong trak, husat i gat 64-pela krismas, em i no kisim bagarap long dispela 'crash'.
English: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel em olsem, ol i no gat kon, o tomato, o potato, o kakau, na no gat wanpela bilong ol lain bilong bipo long Rom i bin teistim wanpela 'turkey'.
English: Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade.
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim kaikai bilong ol long san taim 'photosynthesis' i kamap. Ol i save givim seid (shade).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Sampela taim ol spesel taua we seip (shape) bilong ol i olsem ol 'pyramid', na ol i kolim ol 'ziggurats', em ol i save bildim olsem pat bilong ol tempel.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
Tok Pisin: Long mun i go pinis Iran i kisim wanpela bikpela disasta (disaster) bihain long planti yia taim wanpela balus we i wok long i go long Armenia i 'crash', na i kilim 168 manmeri we i stap long balus.
English: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
Tok Pisin: Ol pepa bilong kot i tok olsem, ol rabis long kem bilong UN em ol i no kilim gut ol binatang long en, dispela i mekim na ol binatang i go insait long wara Artibonite, wanpela bilong ol bikpela wara insait long kantri Haiti.
English: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
Tok Pisin: Maski level bilong wara bai i go antap long sampela 'feet' tasol bihain long dispela taitwara, ol ofisa i laik olsem em i bai i mas inap long putim ol 'sandbars' long ples we wara i save ron i go daun long en.
English: After seeing the horrors and atrocities of war during World War I, nations desired to avoid such a situation again in the future.
Tok Pisin: Ol kantri i lukim pinis ol pen na hevi na kranki pasin bilong woa we i kamap insait long World War I, ol kantri i laik long abrusim dispela kain samting long kamap gen long bihaintaim.
English: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i planti ol lain i lusim skul i wok long mekim, dispela em i mekim ol i kisim wanpela yia long malolo bipo long ol i go long univesiti, na ol i no stopim skul bilong ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The top of the tower was special sanctuary for the god.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Antap long dispela taua em sampela spesol ples bilong dispela god i stap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.
Tok Pisin: Long kisim ol gutpela hap bilong lukim Hong Kong, lusim ailan na go long fran bilong wara long Kowloon long hapsait.
English: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean.
Tok Pisin: Long hap not bilong rijen em Sahel i raunim, na long hap na hap wes Atlantic Ocean i raunim.
English: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
Tok Pisin: Dispela i mekim em i ken wok 'backwards' wantaim 802.11a, 802.11g, dispela i ken kamap sapos dispela 'base station' i gat 'dual radios'.
English: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'mutation' we i kamap insait long ol 'germ-line cell' tasol em ol i ken i go long ol pikinini, tasol ol 'mutation' we i kamap long narapela hap i ken kamapim 'cell-death' o kensa.
English: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i no save bilong wanem na ol mobail fon sevis i strong moa long hia na i no strong long planti ol narapela hap bilong dispela rot, kain olsem Pennsylvania Wilds.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

label: Long ol ples we i hot long Middle East, haus em i no impoten.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).
Tok Pisin: Na tu, 'blogging' "i save fosim ol sumatin long save moa long ol samting we i wok long kamap long komuniti we ol i stap long en." Dispela nid long inapim nid bilong ol lain i ritim blog bilong ol i mekim na ol sumatin i gat moa save na kamap 'interesting' (Toto, 2004).
English: This seems sensible, because the Earth doesn't feel as if it's moving, does it?
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i luk olsem i stret, bikos yumi no save pilim olsem Earth i muv, a?
English: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
Tok Pisin: Long 1895, bihain long em i lusim pait insait long First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), Qing gavman i sainim Treaty of Shimonoseki, insait long dispela em i givim pawa bilong Taiwan i go long Japan, husat i bosim dispela ailan i go inap long 1945.
English: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
Tok Pisin: South Africa em i nambawan tim insait long dispela tonamen (tournament) na em i stat gut taim em i winim tim bilong Zambia we i stap namba 5 insait long tonamen 26 - 00.
English: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
Tok Pisin: Perian tok ples em i isi na grama (grammar) bilong em i isi long bihainim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
Tok Pisin: Moa long wan tausen yia, dispela lotu bilong ol Kristen i bin bungim ol kantri bilong Europe wantaim, maski ol i gat wanwan tok ples na kastom bilong ol yet.

Tok Pisin: Sekim 'label' long ol 'first aid instruction' bilong dipela posin.

Tok Pisin: Long pait bilong kisim indipendens (independence) we Mau muvmen (movement) i bin oganaisim, wanpela bung i bin kamap long taun na namel long dispela ''paramount chief' Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III i bin dai.
English: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
Tok Pisin: Huhne i risain (resign) em Ed Davey MP bai i kisim ples bilong em long Cabinet. Norman Lamb MP bai i kisim wok bilong Business Minister we Davey bai i lusim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambis bilong Tamaki Drive i stap long Waitemata Harbour, long ol 'upmarket' komuniti bilong Mission Bay na St Heliers long Central Auckland.
English: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).
Tok Pisin: Eksampel em, “'learning” and “socialization'” em ol impoten motivesen (motivation) we i save mekim ol manmeri i laik long yusim intanet (James et al., 1995).
English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu no save long draiv long ol rot autsait long siti, yu mas strongim yu yet: i gat ol ples we i sut i go daun o i kam antap, i gat ol liklik rot we i no gat spes long ron, na ol sap kona.
English: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
Tok Pisin: Em i wokim wanpela WiFi belo bilong dua, em i tok.
English: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem sampela bilong ol sikmanmeri i bin kisim dispela binatang long haus sik, Dr, Moll i ting olsem, na tupela bilong ol lain em ol wokmanmeri bilong haus sik.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
Tok Pisin: 'Pronunciation' em i tok ples Italian bikos planti bilong ol wod em ol i save kolim olsem hau ol i raitim.
English: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela kos bai karampaim ol samting we mipela i toktok long hia na bai givim moa infomesen, wantaim sampela ekspiriens.
English: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'monastery' i save givim ol laplap long ol meri we i no redi na i kam, tasol sapos yu bringim laplap bilong yu, gutpela moa long bringim wanpela we i gat ol brait (bright) kala, yu bai kisim wanpela smail long wanpela 'monk' o wanpela 'nun' long dua bilong go insait.
English: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol kainkain we bilong mekim wara i kamap 'pure', sampela i save mekim wok bilong daunim sampela kain samting we i ken kamapim hevi.
English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
Tok Pisin: 'Technological determinism' em i wanpela hap tok we i gat planti kainkain tingting we ol manmeri i save prektisim, stat long 'technology push' o 'technological imperative' i go long wanpela tingting we i tok olsem pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong graun em long bihainim ol lo bilong sains na kamapim ol teknoloji we i save bihainim ol dispela lo bilong sains.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: I no gat planti lain i sindaun long Greenland. Long ol tumbuna stori bilong ol Norway, ol i tok olsem Erik the Red em ol i bin rausim em long Iceland bikos em i bin kilim wanpela man, na taim em i travel i go long wes, em i painim Greenland na em i givim dispela nem long en.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
Tok Pisin: Dispela tok pait i bin kamap bikos long ol lain i yusim planti mani tumas long givim helpim na mekim gen ol haus na ol samting we Hurricane Katrina i bin bagarapim; sampela bilong ol lain we i save was long hamas mani we gavman i save yusim i kolim dispela olsem "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
English: The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain we i save kisim foto long kamera i kisim ples bilong wanpela bikmeri long wanem em i laik go long toilet. Ol i sutim Mendoza long gan na em i dai.
English: Of course, the superprofits derived from the protracted exploitation of the Filipino people would constitute the basic gains of U.S. imperialism.
Tok Pisin: Em i tru olsem, ol bikpela win mani we i kamap taim o i bagarapim ol Filipino manmeri em bai kamapim ol win mani bilong U.S long bosim ol narapela hap bilong graun.
English: It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands.
Tok Pisin: Em i 'thin' moa aninit long 'maria' na 'thick' moa aninit long 'highlands'.
English: It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive.
Tok Pisin: Em i gutpela long werim wanpela ring (no ken werim ring we i luk ekspensif).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
Tok Pisin: Long '16th century' Paraguay, we ol i bin kolim "The Giant Province of the Indies", i bin kamap taim ol lain Spain i kam bosim ol asples lain.
English: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu stap long narapela kantri na kam bek long haus bilong yu, yu senisim pasin bilong yu long bihainim nupela kalsa na yu lusim sampela bilong ol pasin bilong kalsa bilong yu yet.
English: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, ol i save makim ol ‘route’ we planti lain i save go wokabaut o ‘cycling’ long em.
English: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela 'feral' pikinini em ol lain i tok olsem ol animal long bus i lukautim ol; sampela em ol lain i tok olsem ol i stap ol yet long bus.
English: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela em Livingston Island, na Deception we 'flooded caldera' bilong volkeno we i ektif (active) yet i save givim wanpela kain lukluk bilong dispela basis.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly.
Tok Pisin: Planti manmeri i no ting olsem ol i wankain olsem ol dainaso bikos ol i gat 'feather' na ol i ken flai.
English: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
Tok Pisin: Cochamó Valley -nambawan hap bilong mekim 'climbing' long Chile, em ol kolim Yosemite of South America, em i gat ol kainkain bikpela 'granite wall' na 'crag'.
English: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
Tok Pisin: Dr. Tony Moll i painimaut long dispela Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) long KwaZulu-Natal rijen bilong South Africa.
English: The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October.
Tok Pisin: Dispela komisen (commission) em i wanpela samting we Martelly i mekim bikos long ol 'anit-regime' protes we i wok long kamap long olgeta hap na i stat long Oktoba.
English: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
Tok Pisin: Long namba 6 de bilong Oktoba 1789 ol maket meri i mekim King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette na tupela liklik pikinini bilong ol (Marie Therese we i gat 11-pela krismas na Louis-Charles we i gat 4-pela krismas) na susa bilong King, Madam Elizabeth, i go bek long Paris taim ol i stap long Versailles.

English: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.

Tok Pisin: Wantaim Kundalini Yoga dispela Kundalini energy ('enlightenment energy') em i save kirap insait long 'yoga postures', eksesais bilong pulim win, ol 'mantra' na 'visualizations'.

Tok Pisin: Ol i ken lukluk gut tru long tudak wantaim 'night vision', na tu, ol i save muv isi tru. Ol 'ocelot' i save painim kaikai bilong ol taim ol i hait wantaim ol samting i stap long envairomen na kalap antap long animal we ol i laik ketsim.
English: No extra transport is being put on and overground trains will not stop at Wembley, and car parking and park-and-ride facilities are unavailable at the ground.
Tok Pisin: No gat narapela trenspot (transport) i stap long graun na ol trein (train) we i save ron antap long graun bai i stop long Wembley, na ples bilong putim kar na mekim 'park-and-ride' bai i no inap op.

English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Wanpela bilong ol bikpela bilip bilong ol Kristen em i olsem ol i mas yusim gut mani na kago bilong ol long helpim ol narapela we i gat pen na hevi o i no gat mani na kaikai. Ol i bilip olsem mani bilong sios em i bilong mekim dispela wok.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, em ol i bin painim em long Blue Ash, Ohio, long wanpela komuniti we i stap kain olsem 15-pela 'mile' long hap not bilong Cincinnati na em i slip long graun arere long rot na em i werim wanpela 'T-shirt' na pens, na em i luk olsem em i kisim planti marasin na tingting bilong em i no klia.

English: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'filter' em strong bilong wanwan i narakain, na yu mas tingting, bihaim yu mas tingting long baim wara long wanplela botol long wanpela gutpela kampani.

Tok Pisin: Bipo long wanpela oganaisesen i ken i gat ol nupela na narapela kain we bilong mekim samting, ol lida i mas kamapim wanpela kalsa bilong kamapim ol nupela na narapela kain samting na tu, i mas i gat pasin bilong serim save na lainim samting wantaim.

Tok Pisin: Ol laspela risalt bilong ileksen bilong presiden na palimen bilong Nambia soim olsem presiden, Hifikepunye Pohamba, em ol i makim em wantaim bikpela namba tru long kamap presiden gen.

Tok Pisin: Maski i no gat birua bilong tsunami i stap, ol lain i wok long pret na i stat long lusim ol bisnis na haus bilong ol.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Everything in the Universe is made of matter. All matter is made of tiny particles called atoms.

English: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.

English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.
English: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
Tok Pisin: Yu mas lukaut long no ken larim laplap i kamap hot tumas (dispela i ken kamapim mekim klos i kamap liklik, o sapos em i hot tumas, klos bai i paia).
English: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
Tok Pisin: No gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami i bin kamap, na 'geophysics agency' bilong Jakarta i tok olsem, no gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami bai i kamap bikos dispela guria i no kamap long mak bilong 6.5 we i mak bilong givim tok lukaut bilong tsunami.
English: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
Tok Pisin: Ol kendidet (candidate) i ken salim ol lain we i makim ol long go na witnesim olgeta wanwan hap bilong wok. Long avinun, ol volentia (volunteer) i save kaunim ol vot (vote) na i gat ol lain i save bihainim ol prosidia (procedure) bilong supavaisim (supervise) wok bilong ol.
English: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).
Tok Pisin: Em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela samting we i save pulim ol turis i go long South Africa na ol i save lukim em olsem impoten samting insait long South African National Parks (SANParks).
