messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
Tok Pisin: Dispela namba ten bikpela win na ren we ol i kolim long dispela Hurricane sisen (season) em, Subtropical Storm Jerry, na em i wok long stat long kamap long Atlantic Ocean long tude.
English: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
Tok Pisin: Ol stretim bek gen ol 'economic link' namel long dispela tupela hap bilong Moldova maski ol toktok bilong politiks i no kamap gut.
English: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
Tok Pisin: Wanpela we i wok insait long 'garage' klostu long ples bilong eksiden i tok: "I gat ol pikinini we i wok long wet i stap long i go long narapela sait bilong rot na olgeta i wok long singaut na krai."
English: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
Tok Pisin: Namel long 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, ol kalabus lain i statim wanpela paia long autsait bilong kalabus bilding.
English: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long ol soldia i kam kamap, Haiti i no bin i gat problem long sait bilong sik stat long ol yia insait long 1800 i kam inap nau.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: 'Great pyramid' em ol i bin wokim long givim ona long Pharaoh Khufu, na planti ol liklik pyramid, ol 'tomb', na tempel em ol i wok long givim ona long ol meri na famili memba bilong Khufu.
predictions: Ol i wokim dispela bikpela piramiti long givim onap

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'safari' we planti lain i save yusim em i toktok long travel long graun long lukim ol narakain animal bilong Africa, planti bilong ol em ol animal bilong 'savanna'.
English: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
Tok Pisin: Ol liklik ailan long solwara na nambawan bikpela raunwara i inap long wanpela 'yatch' o liklik bot o 'kayak' we i ken givim ol narapela we bilong kisim amamas.
English: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
Tok Pisin: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki i tok olsem ol dispela man i karamapim pes bilong ol taim ol i kamap long kot.
English: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
Tok Pisin: Lo bilong France long ileksen i tok olsem ol i mas putim ol 'code' long ol dispela wok bilong makim kendidet.
English: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).
Tok Pisin: 'Sleep interruption' em i pasin bilong kirap namel long slip na go bek long slip sotpela taim bihain (10–60 minit).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The "up bow" mark looks like a V and the "down bow mark" like a staple or a square missing its bottom side.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dispela "'up bow" mark' i luk olsem wanpela V na dispela "'down bow mark'" i luk olsem wanpela 'staple' o wanpela 'square' i no gat aninit sait bilong em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
Tok Pisin: Tasol maket bilong salim 'laptop' i go long pablik' bai i gat kainkain prodak na i senis olgeta bihain long ASUS i kisim 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award we Executive Yuan bilong Republic of China i givim.
English: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol Kristen bilip we i toktok long dispela tredisen (tradition), tasol em i wankain olsem tredisen bilong Spring na Fertility bipo long taim bilong Kristen bilip.
English: Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim ol liklik kalsa i save pinis hariap na i no save lusim evidens (evidence) bilong histori bilong ol na ol savemanmeri i no save lukim ol olsem ol i 'civilization' tru tru.
English: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
Tok Pisin: Ol manmeri bai bringim ol samting bilong mekim ofa i go long ol god na ol pris bai traim long inapim samting we ol god i nidim taim ol i mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) na ol bikpela bung bilong lotu.
English: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wok painimaut i givim sampela tingting tu long wanem we gras bilong pisin i save kamap.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: 'Up' em i min olsem yu mas stat long 'tip' na pusim 'bow', na 'down' em i min olsem yu mas stat long 'frog' (dispela em i ples we han bilong yu i holim 'bow') na pulim dispela 'bow'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
Tok Pisin: Maski em i lusim dispela 'show' long 1993 em i holim yet dispela taitel bilong 'executive producer', em i kontinu (continue) long kisim ten milien dola long olgeta sisen (season) olsem 'royalty' mani.
English: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken lukluk gut tru long tudak wantaim 'night vision', na tu, ol i save muv isi tru. Ol 'ocelot' i save painim kaikai bilong ol taim ol i hait wantaim ol samting i stap long envairomen na kalap antap long animal we ol i laik ketsim.
English: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan tok ples bilong Barcelona em Catalan na Spanish. Klostu hap namba bilong ol lain i stap long hap i save tok ples Catalan, bikpela namba moa i save long em, na klostu olgeta lain i save long Spanish.
English: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
Tok Pisin: Ol manmeri bai bringim ol samting bilong mekim ofa i go long ol god na ol pris bai traim long inapim samting we ol god i nidim taim ol i mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) na ol bikpela bung bilong lotu.
English: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
Tok Pisin: Three Kingdoms em i wanpela bilong ol taim bilong pait insait long histori bilong Ancient China we planti tausen manmeri i dai taim ol pait long sindaun long nambawan sia insait long 'grand palace' long Xi’an.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: An up-bow usually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Wanpela 'up-bow' em i save kamapim wanpela saun we i 'soft' moa, na wanpela 'down-bow' em i wanpela saun we i strong moa na i gat moa fos.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
Tok Pisin: Deputy Prime Minister bilong Singapore Wong Kan Seng i tok halo long em na em i toktok wantaim Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong long 'trade' na 'terrorism'.
English: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
Tok Pisin: Em i kamap wantaim dispela laspela tingting bikos long planti gutpela toktok na 'encouragment' we ol meri na man i salim i go long em na i tokim em olsem marasin bilong spesim pikinini em i mas kamap olsem wanpela sevis we olgeta haus sik i mas givim.
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol pikinini em ol i save kolim ol olsem "'feral" o wel pikinini. Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.
English: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
Tok Pisin: Ol plen bilong givim ol dispela sut marasin i go long ol eria we i gat histori bilong planti lain pik i sik long dispela yia i no bin kamap bikos i no gat inap mani na ol i no ting olsem em i wanpela bikpela samting taim ol i skelim em wantaim ol narapela sik.
English: The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, ol Arab i bin kisim Islam i kam long ol dispela hap, na ol i kamap olsem bikpela lotu insait long Comoros na Mayotte.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
Tok Pisin: Ol Safari em ating ol i nambawan samting we i save kisim ol turis i go long Africa na ol i bikpela samting long planti ol visita.
English: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em Netherlands, wantaim Anna Jochemsen we i pinis long namba nain ples long 'women's standing class' insait long Super-G long aste, na Finland wantaim Katja Saarinen we i pinis namba ten insait long dispela seim (same) geim (game).
English: Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.
Tok Pisin: Risets i bin painimaut olsem sans bilong ol meri long kisim MS em i tupela taim moa long ol man.
English: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
Tok Pisin: Disaplin (discipline) bilong defens, we ol i wok long hendelim bal na gutpela tim wok i mekim ol i pilai gut tru na olgeta lain i save olsem ol narapela tim i mas traim long winim ol.
English: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'bug' em ol entomolojist (entomologist) i save yusim long toktok long dispela grup bilong ol binatang.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long namba 6 de bilong Oktoba 1789 ol maket meri i mekim King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette na tupela liklik pikinini bilong ol (Marie Therese we i gat 11-pela krismas na Louis-Charles we i gat 4-pela krismas) na susa bilong King, Madam Elizabeth, i go bek long Paris taim ol i stap long Versailles.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu kam autsait long 'current', pasin bilong swim i go bek em bai i no inap hat long mekim.
English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
Tok Pisin: Em i no i stap em yet, 'experimentation', na wanpela 'experiment' em i wanpela 'test' ol save yusim long rausim wanpela o moa bilong ol tingting we ol i bin kamapim, pasin bilong askim ol kwesten, na mekim stadi tu i save givim stia long 'scientific research'.
English: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
Tok Pisin: Wara i wok long kapsait i go antap long 'levee' long seksen we bikpela bilong em i 100 'feet'.
English: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
Tok Pisin: Apia em ol i bin kamapim em long 1850s na em i bin nambawan kapitol bilong Samoa stat long 1959 i kam inap nau.
English: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
Tok Pisin: Schengen zone, em i narakain, sampela taim em i save stap olsem wanpela kantri bilong em yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.
Tok Pisin: Long ol rot we i gat sno (snow) o ais, 'friction' em i no strong na yu no inap long draiv olsem yu save draiv antap long kolta nating.
English: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela lain we i save pilai restling (wrestling) i soim sori bilong ol long Luna.
English: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
Tok Pisin: Dispela sikman i bin go long Nigeri, we i gat sampela 'case' bilong Ebola i kamap long en.
English: In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela wok patnasip (partnership) bilong NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, ol volentia we i kwalifai (qualify) em ol i rikrutim (recruit) ol aninit long 'hunting progrem' bilong Sporting Shooters Association.
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, bihain long Revolution ol wok i op long olgeta man long larim ol man i gat driman na i save wok hat long mekim ol gutpela wok we ol i laik long mekim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

label: Ol dipela bikpela lain manmeri we i belhat na i stap i fosim King na Queen long larim ol windua bilong karis bilong ol i op na i stap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i soim olsem tru tru sampela bilong ol dinaso i gat gras bilong pisin, wanpela tingting we planti lain i gat, tasol dispela i givim ol infomesen we ol fosil i no inap long givim, kain olsem kala na 'three dimensional arrangement'.
English: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
Tok Pisin: . Ol saintis i tok olsem kala bilong gras bilong dispela animas em i 'chestnut-brown' long antap wantaim wanpela 'pale' o 'carotenoid-colored' long aninit sait.
English: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem bai i gat moa 'maria' long sait i stap klostu bikos 'crust' em i 'thin' moa. Em i isi moa long 'lava' long kam antap long autsait.
English: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
Tok Pisin: Wankain olsem mun i save i gat wanpela fos we i save pulim graun i go long em, na kamapim ol tait, Milky Way tu i save i gat wanpela fos we i save pulim Sagittarius 'galaxy' i kam long em.
English: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, yu bai i no inap long lukluk gut taim sno (snow) i pundaun o blo o win i kamap wara o i kamap ais long ol windua bilong kar.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Wanpela taim wanpela man insait long ol bikpela lain manmeri i apim na soim het bilong wanpela 'royal guard' we ol i bin kilim long Versailles long fran bilong Queen na em i pret nogut tru.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.
English: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.
Tok Pisin: Long ol 'developed country' yu bai no inap long harim wankain mak bilong komplen long kwaliti bilong wara ol bris i pundaun.
English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.
English: He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
Tok Pisin: Na bihain ol i salim em i go long Addenbrooke's Hospital long Cambridge.
English: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
Tok Pisin: Long Mande, nambawan sekreteri bilong Nobel Commitee for Literature long Swedish Academy, i tokaut long pablik long redio progrem bilong Sveriges Radio long Sweden olsem, ol i bin no inap long toktok wantaim Bob Dylan long 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature we em bin winim, na ol i no wok long traim long toktok wantaim em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
Tok Pisin: Ol woklain bilong 'fire rescue' i kisim dispela paia long 11:35 pm.
English: This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim dispela em i wankain olsem 'sympomatic treatment'. Tasol, sapos yumi i no laikim wanpela sotpela ansa, orait yumi mas painim as bilong problem, na yumi mas stopim ol.
English: One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela em ol i salim i go long George Washington long Julai 6, na em i ritim long ol soldia bilong em long New York long Julai 9. Wanpela kopi i kamap long London long Ogas 10.
English: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.
Tok Pisin: Ol bas (bus) i save lusim 'inter-district bus station' (we i stap long narapela sait bilong wara) long de taim, maski planti, bilong ol we i go long is na Jakar/Bumthang i save lusim stesin long namel long 06:30 na 07:30.
English: It was ruled by the "Vichy" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them.
Tok Pisin: Dipela hap em ol "Vichy" French i bin bosim. Ol dispela lain ol French manmeri husat i bin mekim 'peace' wantaim ol German long 1940 na i wok wantaim ol lain i kam long kisim kantri bilong ol na ol i no pait agensim ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: They were compelled to pay taxes to the U.S. colonial regime to defray a major part of the expenditures and the interest on bonds floated in the name of the Philippine government through the Wall Street banking houses.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol i fosim ol long baim takis i go long 'colonial regime' bilong U.S long givim mani i go long ol 'expenditure' na 'interest' long ol 'bond' we ol yusim aninit long nem bilong gavman bilong Philipines insait long ol benk (bank) bilong Wall Street.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela rot, Paris i kamap olsem nambawan ples bilong ol kainkain stail bilong klos long dispela graun long tude, tasol Constantinople em i stap olsem nambawan siti bilong kainkain stail klos long taim bilong 'middle ages' long Europe.
English: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
Tok Pisin: Wok bilong em i gat gutpela kwaliti we planti laini luksave long en na we em i save mekim ol wanwan liklik samting em i narakain tru we wanwan "lain we i gat nem bilong mekim dispela wok" namel long ol 'philatelist'. Sampela i 'specialize' long sait bilong kolektim ol wok bilong em tasol.
English: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
Tok Pisin: Lokel 'telephone service provider' bilong yu bai inap long givim moa infomesen long yu long hau yu ken konekt long dispela sevis.
English: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
Tok Pisin: Institut bilong Haiti long Justice na Democracy i bin mekim wanpela stadi bilong em yet we i painimaut olsem ol soldia bilong kantri Nepal insait long dispela grup bilong 'peacekeeping' i no save na i karim dispela sik i kam long Haiti.
English: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
Tok Pisin: Long '16th century' Paraguay, we ol i bin kolim "The Giant Province of the Indies", i bin kamap taim ol lain Spain i kam bosim ol asples lain.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Of course, the superprofits derived from the protracted exploitation of the Filipino people would constitute the basic gains of U.S. imperialism.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Em i tru olsem, ol bikpela win mani we i kamap taim o i bagarapim ol Filipino manmeri em bai kamapim ol win mani bilong U.S long bosim ol narapela hap bilong graun.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
Tok Pisin: National Hurricane Centre (NHC) i tok olsem long dispela taim Jerry i no stap long mak we em i inap long kamapim bagarap long graun.
English: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok olsem, i luk olsem draiva bilong dispela kar we i bamim dispela man bilong kisim foto bai i no inap long kisim ol sas.
English: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i wanbel wantaim tok save bilong USOC we i tok olsem gutpela bilong ol 'athlete' na ol 'club', na ol gem bilong ol, na dispela i ken kamap taim mipela i gohet long mekim ol wok bilong mipela na mekim ol gutpela senis i kamap insait long oganaisesen, na i no rausim setifiket.
English: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
Tok Pisin: Dispela haus sik i bihainim rot bilong banisim ol yet long binatang nogut, na ol i putim dispela sikman longwe long ol narapela sikmanmeri long banisim em long givim dispela sik i go long narapela.
English: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
Tok Pisin: Moldova em i wanpela 'republic' we i gat kainkain hauslain we i bin kisim taim nogut long kros na pait i kamap namel long ol hauslain.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim 'oxygen' we yumi ol manmeri i save pulim win long en, na ol i save kisim 'carbon dioxide' we yumi ol manmeri i save rausim i kam autsait long bodi bilong yumi (dispela em, taim win we yumi i pulim i go insait i kam autsait).
English: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
Tok Pisin: ASUS Eee PC, we ol i bin mekim presentesen bilong em i go long olgeta hap bilong graun bikos em i ken seivim man na em i ken mekim planti impoten wok, em i kamap olsem wanpela bikpela topik we ol lain i wok long toktok long em long 2007 Taipei IT Month.

Tok Pisin: Olgeta sitisen (citizen) bilong Vatican City em ol i Roman Catholic.

Tok Pisin: Longwe long saut em Niagara Fall na long not em Musoka, wanplea ples we i luk nais na i gat ol narapela ples moa i stap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Rom i bin go pas long lukautim wok bilong sios long tausen yia na planti pawa na moni i stap long Rom. Dispela i mekim na planti manmeri i wok long i gat tupela tingting sapos em i inapim dispela bilip, o nogat.

English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim 'oxygen' we yumi ol manmeri i save pulim win long en, na ol i save kisim 'carbon dioxide' we yumi ol manmeri i save rausim i kam autsait long bodi bilong yumi (dispela em, taim win we yumi i pulim i go insait i kam autsait).
English: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
Tok Pisin: Long olpela Medina em i isi long painim ol ples we i save salim ol samting bilong ol Morocco, kain olsem 'tagine', 'pottery', 'leather goods', 'hookahs', na ol kainkain 'geegaws', tasol olgeta dispela samting em i bilong ol turis long baim.
English: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
Tok Pisin: . Ol saintis i tok olsem kala bilong gras bilong dispela animas em i 'chestnut-brown' long antap wantaim wanpela 'pale' o 'carotenoid-colored' long aninit sait.

predictions: Teknoloji determinism em wanpela tok we i kaverim wanpela

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta taim yu bai harim saun bilong ol turis na ol lain bilong salim samting. Dispela stori bilong saun na lait em i wankain tru olsem wanpela stori buk.
English: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
Tok Pisin: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, em ol i bin painim em long Blue Ash, Ohio, long wanpela komuniti we i stap kain olsem 15-pela 'mile' long hap not bilong Cincinnati na em i slip long graun arere long rot na em i werim wanpela 'T-shirt' na pens, na em i luk olsem em i kisim planti marasin na tingting bilong em i no klia.
English: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.
Tok Pisin: Sampela ol animal, kain olsem ol elefen na 'giraffe', i save laik long kam klostu long ol kar na ol stendet ikwipmen (equipment) bai mekim yu i ken lukim ol gut.
English: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol kaikai bilong ol German i save gat ol 'almond', 'hazelnut', na ol narapela 'nut'. Ol keik (cake) we planti lain i save long en em i save go gut wantaim wanpela strongpela kap kofi.

English: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long 'twelfth century', velu (value) bilong em i go daun bikos ol Crusaders i bin kam bek na ol i karim ol presen kain olsem ol silk na spais. Velu bilong ol dispela samting i antap moa long velu bilong ol samting we i stap long ol maket bilong ol Byzantine.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
Tok Pisin: Long 1895, bihain long em i lusim pait insait long First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), Qing gavman i sainim Treaty of Shimonoseki, insait long dispela em i givim pawa bilong Taiwan i go long Japan, husat i bosim dispela ailan i go inap long 1945.
English: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol draiva i save mekim pasin long mak we i 'consistent', olsem na, ol 'traffic' i save i gat sampela samting i 'consistent' long ol na dispela em ol savemanmeri i ken soim wantaim ol namba bilong 'mathematics'.
English: Thousands of years ago, a man called Aristarchus said that the Solar System moved around the Sun.
Tok Pisin: Sampela tausen yia i go pinis, wanpela man nem bilong em Aristarchus i tok olsem Solar System i save muv raunim Sun.
English: The much-abused and often-ridiculed rule of thirds is a simple guideline creating dynamism while keeping a measure of order in an image.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'rule of thrids' we planti lain i save bagarapim na tok pilai long en em i wanpela isipela 'guideline' we kamapim gutpela foto na i mekim na i gat sampela oda insait long wanpela piksa.
English: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'filter' em strong bilong wanwan i narakain, na yu mas tingting, bihaim yu mas tingting long baim wara long wanplela botol long wanpela gutpela kampani.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands.
Tok Pisin: Narapela samting tu em i olsem, "Timbuktu" em i hat long go long en na ol i save yusim dispela nem olsem tok piksa bilong ol samting i narapela kain, i stap long longwe ples.
English: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
Tok Pisin: 'Re-entry shock' i save kamap hariap moa long 'culture shock' (i no gat 'honeymoon phase'), na em i save stap longpela taim na em i ken kamap long mak we i bikpela moa long 'culture shock'.

Tok Pisin: Del Potro i bin gat sans pastaim insait long namba tu 'set', tasol dispela tu em i nidim wanpela 'tie break' taim i kamap 6-6.

Tok Pisin: Olgeta i ron i kam bek long ples we eksiden i bin kamap long en.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
Tok Pisin: Long France, pasin bilong 'vote' em i no pasin bilong yusim teknoloji: ol vota (voter) i save go long wanpela tebol, putim wanpela we ol i bin prinim pinis we i soim wanem kendidet (candidate) ol i laik makim i go long wanpela envelop (envelope).
English: The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived.

English: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long sampela taim, dispela nupela populesen i stat long mekim senis na lainim long stap long nupela envairomen bilong ol, ol i stat long luk narakain liklik long narapela populesen.

Tok Pisin: Long hap not na i stap long ples we isi long go long en em dispela ol i kolim Sintra we i gat histori na i nais tru na planti ol lain long narapela kantri i save long en taim ol ritim toktok bilong Lord Byron long ol naispela samting i stap long em.
English: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.
Tok Pisin: Long mun i go pinis, wanpela komisen (commission) bilong presiden i mekim rekomendesen (recommendation) olsem CEP bilong bipo i mas risain (resign) olsem wanpela hap wok bilong kantri i muv i go long ol nupela ileksen.

English: He trained as an obstetrician and began to work at the Auckland's National Women's Hospital in 1959.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol 'cruise' i save tok olsem ol i karim ol lain i go long Berlin, Germany insait long ol 'brochure' bilong ol. Olsem yu ken lukim long mep (map) i stap antap Berlin i no stap klostu long solwara na wanpela visit long siti em i no stap insait long prais bilong 'cruise'.

Tok Pisin: Dispela 'controller' i luk olsem wanpela 'remote controller' bilong televisen, dispela 'controller' i yusim tupela 'sensors' we i stap klostu long teleiven bilong dispela 'user' long mekim 'trangulate' long 'three dimensional space'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
Tok Pisin: Nau em i stap long olgeta hap bilong grup ailan, kaikai bilong Java em i gat ol 'seasoned dishes', na namba fleiva bilong kaikai bilong Java em pinat, 'chilie', suga (dispela em kokonas sugar bilong Java) na ol kainkain 'aromatic spices'.
English: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
Tok Pisin: "Mipela bai wok hat strong long daunim namba bilong 'carbon dioxide' we i save kamap long wanpela 'unit' bilong GDP long wanpela bikpela mak long yia 2020 long mak we em i bin i stap long en long yia 2005," Hu i tok.
English: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim bai i gat skul fi long enrol long ol dispela edukesen progrem.

English: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.

label: Ol memba bilong wanpela 'subculture' i ken soim olsem ol i memba bilong em taim ol i yusim wanpela kain stail, kain olsem klos ol i werim, pasin ol i gat long en, na toktok ol i yusim.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Intanet i save bungim ol pasin bilong toktok long wanwan man o meri wantaim ol pasin bilong toktok long planti manmeri.
English: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

Tok Pisin: Ol piksa we ol i kisim wantaim 'infrared' lait i soim olsem senis we i kamap long temprita (temperature) long de na nait i soim olsem dispela ol ples em ol hul bilong ston.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars.
Tok Pisin: Insait long dispela 'transport shuttle' olgeta lain i konek wantaim, na ol i sapotim wanpela 'transport system' we ol 'private car' i kamapim.
English: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
Tok Pisin: Husat lain i mekim plen long go long wanpela kantri we woa i save kamap lng en i mas kisim treining (training) i kam long ol profesenol.
English: Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol distrik em planti ol Japanese Coaster Buses i save ron long en, na yu bai sindaun gut.
English: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
Tok Pisin: Wankain olsem ol narapela saveman, em i gat tupela tingting sapos ol i ken oraitim sik suga, em i tok olsem ol dispela samting we ol i painimaut long en, em i no bilong ol manmeri husat i gat Type 1 bilong sik suga.
English: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
Tok Pisin: Stat long 1988 na i kam inap long nau, olgeta 'ballot box' i mas i stap ples klia na ol lain bilong vot (vote) na ol lain bilong was long vot i ken lukim olsem i no gat envelop (envelope) i stap long stat bilong vot na i no gat narapela envelop ol i putim gen i go antap long ol envelop we ol i kaunim pinis na olgeta i kam long ol lain we i gat atoriti long vot.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dispela kain ol pikinini em ol i save kolim ol olsem "'feral" o wel pikinini. Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, bihain long Revolution ol wok i op long olgeta man long larim ol man i gat driman na i save wok hat long mekim ol gutpela wok we ol i laik long mekim.
English: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2.
Tok Pisin: 'Aspect ratio' bilong dispela fomet (format) (ol i divaidim (divide) em wantaim twelv long kisim wanpela liklik 'whole-number ratio') na ol i tok dispela 'ratio' em i 3:2.
English: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
Tok Pisin: Ol woklain i mas kisim tok orait long ol lain i antap long ol bipo long ol i mekim wanpela disisen, na ol i mas harim tok stia bilong ol lain we ol i wok aninit long en na ol i no ken askim kwesten.
English: Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.
Tok Pisin: Nau sains (science) i soim olsem dispela traipela 'carbon economy' em i rausim 'biosphere' long wanpela 'stable state' we i bin sapotim ol manmeri long tupela milien yia i go pinis.
English: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
Tok Pisin: Stesin bilong dispela websait kolim dispela 'show' olsem "wanpela redio drama we i bihainim ol stail bilong bipo tasol i gat nupela na narapela kain kleva (clever) stail long em!"
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol 'feral' pikinini em ol sampela bikpela bagarap o 'trauma' i bin kamap long ol bipo long ol i ranawe o papamama i no bisi long ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Japans holds nearly 7,000 islands (the biggest being Honshu), making Japan the 7th largest island in the world!
Tok Pisin: Japan i gat 7,000 ailan (bikpela ailan tru em i Honshu), na dispela i mekim Japan i kamalpl olsem namba 7 bikpela ailan insait long olgeta hap bilong graun.
English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
Tok Pisin: Em i no samting bilong sem long en: em i no narakain long ol narapela samting ol manmeri i save pret long em na ol narapela samting ol planti manmeri i save les long en.
English: Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife.
Tok Pisin: Madagascar em i wanpela bikpela tru, na em i kain olsem wanpela kontinen (continent) bilong em, taim yumi lukluk long sait bilong 'wildlife'.
English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela geim (game) bilong 'series' bai kamap long Ellis Park long Johannesburg long wik i kam, taim ol Sprinboks i pilai agensim ol Australia.

Tok Pisin: Dispela em i namba faiv CEP bilong Martelly insait long foapela yia.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.
Tok Pisin: 'Nature-based tourism' em i save pulim ol manmeri we i intres long lukim ol eria bilong 'nature' na amamas long lukim ol ples, wantaim ol plent (plent) na animal bilong dispela eria.
English: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.
Tok Pisin: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard i tok olsem long taim bilong kempen (campaign) long 2010 ileksen bilong gavman em i bilip olsem Australia i mas kamap olsem wanpela 'republic' taim Queen Elizabeth II i pinis long bosim kantri bilong ol.
English: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river.
Tok Pisin: Amazon River em i namba tu longpela wara na namba wan bikpela wara long Earth. Em i karim wara we mak bilong em i 8-pela taim moa long namba tu bikpela wara.
English: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
Tok Pisin: USA Gymnastics i sapotim leta bilong United States Olympic Commitee na em i save olsem dispela em i wanpela bikpela samting tru long Olymlpic famili long kamapim wanpela seif envairomen bilong olgeta 'athletes'.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Tok Pisin: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
Tok Pisin: Finland em i wanpela gutpela kantri bilong raun long bot. Dispela "'Ples bilong tausen raunwara'" i gat planti tausen ailen insait long ol raunwara na long ol solwara.
English: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
Tok Pisin: "Dispela em i no gutbai. Dispela em i taim bilong pasim wanpela sapta na opim nupela sapta."
English: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stap kol moa long ol ples we i raunim ol long san na long nait ol i hot moa long ol ples we i raunim ol.
English: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
Tok Pisin: Danius i tok, "Nau yet, mipela i no wok long mekim wanpela samting. Mi bin ring na salim ol i-meil long man i save wok wantaim em na mi bin kisim ol gutpela bekim na dispela em i inap."

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela graun i save kamapim ol 'sandbars' na ol nambis, we i save stap olsem ol ples bilong ol kainkain animal bilong bus.
English: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim em i kama bun na liklik nogut tru na stikim (stick) em i go long ol narapela metel (metal). Sampela taim ol i ken mekim em i kama bun nogut tru na yusim em long bilasim ol piksa we ol peintim (paint) long han na insait long buk we ol i kolim "illuminated manuscripts".
English: All things considered, we should not be surprised if our own ancestors solved their "protein problem" in somewhat the same way that chimps on the savanna do today.
Tok Pisin: Taim yumi skelim olgeta samting, yumi mas no ken kirap nogut sapos ol tumbuna bilong ol i stretim ol "problem bilong 'protein'" bilong ol long wankain we olsem ol 'chimps' long 'savanna' i save mekim long tude.
English: The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa.
Tok Pisin: Dispela siti em i ples bilong i stap long en na klaimim Nyiragongo volkeno wantaim ol lain bilong painim Moutain Gorilla. Prais bilong ol dispela lain bilong painim gorila i orait moa long ol narapela insait long Africa.
English: As a result, the process of an organization working together to overcome an obstacle can lead to a new innovative process to serve the customer's need.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, proses (process) bilong wanpela oganaisesen long wok wantaim na daunim wanpela hatpela samting i ken kamap ol nupela narapela kain proses bilong inapim nid bilong kastoma.

label: 'Scaffolding' em i no wanpela metod (method) bilong lainim samting tasol em i wanpela helpim we i save givim sapot long ol wanwan sumatin husat i wok long lainim wanpela nupela samting kain olsem yusim wanpela nupela komputa o statim wanpela nupela projek (project).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
Tok Pisin: I gat 17,000 ailan long makim wanpela long en, kaikai bilong Indonesia em i wanpela bikpela nem we i karampaim ol kainkain kaikai we yu ken painim long olgeta hap bilong Indonesia.
English: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
Tok Pisin: Laspela nius bilong dispela i mekim ripot olsem, level bilong ol 'sea readings' i soim olsem wanpela tsunami i bin kamap. Tru tru i bin i gat sampela ektiviti bilong tsunami we ol i bin rekodim klostu long Pago Pago na Niue.
English: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
Tok Pisin: Long Japan, empera (emperor) i save holim ol pati bilong ol namba wan 'cherry blossom' pati bilong em yet na ol memba bilong 'aristocracy' long Imperial Court.
English: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
Tok Pisin: Insait long 1960, Brezezinski i wok olsem wanpela edvaisa bilong John F. Kennedy na bihain em i wok long Lyndon B. Johnson edministresen.
English: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
Tok Pisin: Dispela Report i stat wantaim wanpela askim long i mas i gat 'open debate' na wanbel long wanpela tingting i kamap long polisi bilong United States i go long Middle East.

English: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River.
Tok Pisin: Kruger National Park (KNP) i stap long hap 'north-east' bilong South Africa na i ran arere long bod bilong Mozambique long is, Zimbabwe long not, na boda long hap saut em Crocodile River.
English: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i save stadi long 'nature' na ol 'philosophy' i save lukluk long ol 'classical texts', kain olsem, Bible long tok ples Latin.
English: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
Tok Pisin: Ol gem i stat long 10:00am wantaim gutpela weda na maski i bin i gat liklik ren long moning, em i pinis hariap, dispela de em i gutpela tru long pilai ragbi 7's.
English: While he was working at the hospital Liggins began to investigate premature labor during his spare time.
Tok Pisin: Taim em i wok long haus sik Liggins i stat long mekim investigesen (investigation) long 'premature labour' long taim bilong em yet.
English: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wanwan gavman long givim ol paspot (passport) we ol i no makim (X) long man o meri o givim ol dokumen long soim senis long nem na man i go long meri o meri i go long man em i narakain narakain long wanwan gavman.

English: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
Tok Pisin:"}]

predictions: Ol 'Virtual Scaffolds' i stap long insait long 'software'

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
Tok Pisin: Taim Federal Government i kam na i kisim ol mani bilong Mersey haus sik long Devonport, long Tasmania, gavman bilong dispela 'state' na ol sampela MP bilong gavman i tok strong olsem dispela pasim em i trik bilong redi long ileksen we bai kamap long Novemba.
English: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'coalition' na soldia bilong Afghanistan i muv i go long dispela eria long kisim dispela hap na ol i salim ol narapela balus bilong ol 'coalition' long helpim ol long mekim dispela.
English: It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
Tok Pisin: Em i gutpela long wanpela long baim wanpela Wild Card, we i save givim tok orait long i go insait long ol park insait long South Africa o olgeta South African National Parks.
English: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, dispela leta i tok olsem Turkey bai i mekim wok bilong was long ol soldia bilong ISIS we ol kantri bilong Europe i no laik long salim i go bek long kantri bilong ol.
English: The amount of inner peace a person possesses correlates oppositely to the amount of tension in one’s body and spirit.
Tok Pisin: Mak bilong bel isi i stap insait long wanpela man i gat koneksen (connection) tasol em i oposit (opposite) long mak bilong hevi we i stap insait long bodi na spirit bilong wanpela man.

English: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.
English: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.
Tok Pisin: Ol bas (bus) i save lusim 'inter-district bus station' (we i stap long narapela sait bilong wara) long de taim, maski planti, bilong ol we i go long is na Jakar/Bumthang i save lusim stesin long namel long 06:30 na 07:30.
English: The lower the tension, the more positive the life force present. Every person has the potential to find absolute peace and contentment.
Tok Pisin: Taim hevi em i liklik, bai i gat moa positif fos bilong laip i stap. Olgeta man i gat strong long painim bel isi tru na amamas.
English: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken lukim ol 'pyramid' long tudak na yu ken lukim ol tu bipo long 'show' i stat.
English: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, 'still image photography' fomet (format) we planti lain i save long en em i 35mm, we i nambawan sais bilong 'film' bihain long taim bilong 'analog film'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: No gat wanpela pikinini i mas stap insait long wanpela envairomen we i no gutpela long ol, i no lukautim ol, na i givim save long ol, tasol ol i save stap insait long kain envairomen olsem.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'content theories' i save lukluk long painimaut wanem ol samting i save kirapim bel bilong ol manmeri o i tasim bel na tingting bilong ol.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.
English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri em ol i kam long wanpela famili, kain olsem wanpela bikpela famili bilong ol sista na ol pikinini meri bilong ol.
English: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
Tok Pisin: Long ol liklik ailan na ol raunwara, yu bai no inap nidim wanpela 'yatch'.

Tok Pisin: Sapos Rossby namba i liklik, 'magnetic reversal' bilong dispela sta bai i no ektif (active) tumas.

English: Segregation and recombination shuffle variation back and forth between the two pools with each generation.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: 'Segregation' na 'recombination' i save mekim dispela 'variation' i go i kam namel long tupela 'pool' insait long wanwan 'generation'.
predictions: Segregesen na rikombinesen i mekim varieisen i go bek

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
Tok Pisin: Dispela Iraq Study Group i givim ripot bilong em long 12:00 GMT long tude.

Tok Pisin: Ol maunten bilong Peninsula long hia i bungim wantaim ol graun i stap antap, na bihain em i stap ples klia gen na i kamapim 360 km sen (chain) bilong Ellsworth Mountains we Minnesota Glacier i brukim i go long tupela hap.
English: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
Tok Pisin: Long planti narapela siti bilong Italy na long olgeta hap bilong graun, bikpela moa long Poland, ol i mekim ol wankain 'setup', na planti manmeri i lukim dispela funerel (funeral).
English: To understand the Templars one must understand the context that prompted the creation of the order.
Tok Pisin: Long klia gut long ol Templars yumi mas klia gut long stori i stap baksait we i mekim ol i kamapim dispela grup.
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, bihain long Revolution ol wok i op long olgeta man long larim ol man i gat driman na i save wok hat long mekim ol gutpela wok we ol i laik long mekim.

predictions: Long savanna, i nogat isi long wanpela praimet we i gat

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa.
Tok Pisin: Eastern African Islanders em ol i stap long Indian Ocean autsait long 'eastern coast' bilong Africa.
English: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
Tok Pisin: Isipela we bilong ron long balus insait long namba wan klas o bisnis klas em long yusim bikpela mani long kisim dispela naispela sevis (o, i gutpela moa, larim kampani bilong yu i yusim dispela mani long yu).
English: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25.
Tok Pisin: Curtis Cooper, wanpela 'mathematician' na 'computer science professor' long University of Central Missouri, i bin painimaut olsem bikpela 'prime number' tru long Jenueri 25.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Tok Pisin: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.
English: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
Tok Pisin: 'Light pollution' i no bin wanpela problem long mak we em i stap long en tude, ol i save stap long ol siti o long ol skul, na i isi long go long en na i no olsem ol dispela we ol i bildim long tude.

Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Na moa yet, sapos ol i no inap long mekim dispela ol bikpela samting i ken kamap: 'growth depression', 'malnutrition', na bikpela tru em i dai.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
Tok Pisin: Ol memba bilong wanpela 'subculture' i ken soim olsem ol i memba bilong em taim ol i yusim wanpela kain stail, kain olsem klos ol i werim, pasin ol i gat long en, na toktok ol i yusim.
English: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
Tok Pisin: Nuclear agency bilong Japan i tok olsem, ol i painimaut olsem i gat 'radioactive caesium' na 'iodine' long dispela diwai.
English: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
Tok Pisin: Maski tripela lain i bin stap insait long haus taim dispela kar i bamim, no gat wanpela bilong ol i kisim bagarap.
English: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
Tok Pisin: Em i klia tru olsem, sapos yu save long wanpela Romance tok ples, em bai isi moa long yu long lainim Portuguese.
English: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'monastery' i save givim ol laplap long ol meri we i no redi na i kam, tasol sapos yu bringim laplap bilong yu, gutpela moa long bringim wanpela we i gat ol brait (bright) kala, yu bai kisim wanpela smail long wanpela 'monk' o wanpela 'nun' long dua bilong go insait.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela plent (plant) we i stap long dispela hap em ol 'protein' i save stap insait long ol lip na ol bin bilong en, tasol dispela em i hat long ol bel bilong ol 'primate' olsem mipela long brukim i go daun na ol i mas kukim ol pastaim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu no save long draiv long ol rot autsait long siti, yu mas strongim yu yet: i gat ol ples we i sut i go daun o i kam antap, i gat ol liklik rot we i no gat spes long ron, na ol sap kona.
English: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol lain i save stap long Bishkek i sutim tok long ol lain i mekim protes (protest) long saut olsem ol i kamapim dispela pasin bilong brukim lo.
English: At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east.
Tok Pisin: Pastaim dispela dres i bihainim stail bilong Byzantine kalsa bilong is.
English: Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri: Em i gutpela olsem ol meri i we i go long hap i mas tok olsem ol i marit, maski ol i no marit tru tru.
English: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.
Tok Pisin: Dispela man we i bin winim gol medel (gold medal) i bai swim insait long 100m na 200m 'freestyle' na insait long tripela 'relay' long Commonwealth Games, tasol bikos long ol komplen bilong em long 'fitness' em i ol i no save sapos em bai pilai.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In contrast, animal foods (ants, termites, eggs) not only are easily digestible, but they provide high-quantity proteins that contain all the essential amino acids.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Narapela samting, em animal kaikai (ol anis, ol 'termite', na kiau) em ol i isi long kaikai, na tu ol i givim bikpela mak bilong ol 'protein' we i gat olgeta ol 'amino acid' we bodi i nidim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol kainkain we bilong mekim wara i kamap 'pure', sampela i save mekim wok bilong daunim sampela kain samting we i ken kamapim hevi.
English: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
Tok Pisin: Taim Federal Government i kam na i kisim ol mani bilong Mersey haus sik long Devonport, long Tasmania, gavman bilong dispela 'state' na ol sampela MP bilong gavman i tok strong olsem dispela pasim em i trik bilong redi long ileksen we bai kamap long Novemba.
English: Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'winter sport' em planti lain long ol 'Northern regions' i save long en, na ol lain long Italy i save pilai insait long ol intanesinel geim (game) na ol Olympic events.
English: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'handicraft' em ol i kolim ol olsem ol 'antique', maski ol i no gat bikpela krismas wankain olsem ol narapela samting we fektori (factory) i mekim planti long wanpela taim.
English: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long wanpela wik we ol lus i kamap long 'midterm election', Bush i toktok long wanpela lain manmeri na i tokim ol long 'expansion' we bai i kamap long 'trade' long Asia.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Taim yumi skelim olgeta samting, yumi mas no ken kirap nogut sapos ol tumbuna bilong ol i stretim ol "problem bilong 'protein'" bilong ol long wankain we olsem ol 'chimps' long 'savanna' i save mekim long tude.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Fears of lack of transportation raised the possibility that the game would be forced to play behind closed doors without the team's supporters.
Tok Pisin: Pret bilong no gat trenspot (transport) i mekim na i luk olsem dispela geim (game) em ol bai i pilai insait long wanpela hap we i no gat sapota i ken i go.

Tok Pisin: Tasol, draiva bilong kar i kisim ol bikpela bagarap long het.

Tok Pisin: I luk olsem sampela bilong ol sikmanmeri i bin kisim dispela binatang long haus sik, Dr, Moll i ting olsem, na tupela bilong ol lain em ol wokmanmeri bilong haus sik.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

Tok Pisin: Cyanuric acid na melamine em ol i bin painim ol insait long ol 'sample' bilong pispis bilong ol 'pes' we i bin dai taim ol i kaikai dispela kaikai bilong animal we i posin insait long em.

Tok Pisin: Dispela spes namel long Point Marion na Fairmont em i ol nambawan hatpela kondisen bilong draiv long Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, planti taim em i go insait long ol ples we i no gat planti lain na i stap longwe.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.
Tok Pisin: Long September 17, 1939, ol difens (defence) bilong ol Poland em i bruk, na wanpela samting tasol bilong mekim em long go bek na bung gen long 'bridgehead' bilong Romania.
English: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela taim wanpela man insait long ol bikpela lain manmeri i apim na soim het bilong wanpela 'royal guard' we ol i bin kilim long Versailles long fran bilong Queen na em i pret nogut tru.
English: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century.
Tok Pisin: Gothic style i kamap bikpela long taim namel long '10th - 11th century' na '14 century'.
English: These theories look at what it is about certain people that make them want the things that they do and what things in their environment will make them do or not do certain things.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela 'theory' i save lukluk long wanem samting insait long sampela manmeri i save mekim ol i laikim ol samting we ol i mekim na wanem ol samting insait long envairomen (environment) bai wokim na ol i mekim wanpela samting o i no mekim wanpela samting.
English: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
Tok Pisin: Ol travela i ken bungim kainkain animal bilong bagarapim klos na kaikai we ol i no klia long en insait long ples we ol i kam long en.

English: If you find yourself resetting the clock in your sleep, it can be placed on the other side of the room, forcing you to get out of bed to turn it off.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'hotpela chocolate' em i stap long stendet bilong ol Belgium. Em i bikpela man i long ol frut jus, tasol ol i nambawan.
English: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
Tok Pisin: Long sait bilong Romanticisim, ples we ol man i kam long en i save mekim ol i gat wanpela kain pasin, na bihain long sampela taim ol kastom na ol kalsa we i go wantaim ples we ol i stap long en i save kamap, na ol dispela, bai soim wanem pasin em i pasin bilong ol manmeri long dispela ples, dispela em i gutpela moa long ol lo we ol lain i kisim nating long narapela hap na i kam yusim.
English: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
Tok Pisin: Long 1976, em i givim edvais long Carter long 'foreign policy', na bihain em i kisim ples bilong Henry Kissinger na wok olsem National Security Advisor (NSA) long yia 1977 i go long 1981.
English: Farther south is Niagara Falls and the north is home to the untapped natural beauty of the Muskoka and beyond.
Tok Pisin: Longwe long saut em Niagara Fall na long not em Musoka, wanplea ples we i luk nais na i gat ol narapela ples moa i stap.
English: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
Tok Pisin: Bihain, Lakkha Singh i go pas long singim ol bhajan.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War.
Tok Pisin: Infomesen we ol i mekim i go pablik, i bin toktok long ol kros i kamap long ol boda, we Palestine i bin laikim ol boda we i bin stap bipo long 1967 Mideast War.
English: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
Tok Pisin: No ken bagarapim dispela ples taim yu put mak ol skrapim 'graffiti' i go insait long ol samting.
English: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela lain we i save pilai restling (wrestling) i soim sori bilong ol long Luna.

Tok Pisin: Cochamó Valley -nambawan hap bilong mekim 'climbing' long Chile, em ol kolim Yosemite of South America, em i gat ol kainkain bikpela 'granite wall' na 'crag'.
