messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication.
Tok Pisin: Intanet i save bungim ol pasin bilong toktok long wanwan man o meri wantaim ol pasin bilong toktok long planti manmeri.
English: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).
Tok Pisin: Sapos yumi skelim olgeta samting, tupela pasin i kamap ples klia taim ol meneja i stat long go pas long ol wanlain bilong ol. Long wanpela sait em ol i laik stap olsem “wanpela bilong ol mangi long grup” (meri long grup).
English: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i save stadi long 'nature' na ol 'philosophy' i save lukluk long ol 'classical texts', kain olsem, Bible long tok ples Latin.
English: After all, the leader is ultimately responsible for the success and failure of the team.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long olgeta samting, em i wok bilong lida long mekim tim i mekim gut wok o i no mekim gut wok.
English: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
Tok Pisin: I no gat wanpela bikpela tok we olgeta lain i yusim long makim wanem ol samting em ol i 'antique'. Sampela 'agency' bilong kisim takis i save tok olsem ol samting we i gat moa long 100 krismas em ol i 'antique'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The lower the tension, the more positive the life force present. Every person has the potential to find absolute peace and contentment.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Taim hevi em i liklik, bai i gat moa positif fos bilong laip i stap. Olgeta man i gat strong long painim bel isi tru na amamas.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.
Tok Pisin: Ol Sundarbans i karamapim wanpela eria mak bilong 3,850 km², na 'one-thrid' bilong en em wara/ples tais i karamapim.
English: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela we tasol bilong salim samting hariap em long salim em olsem wanpela 'checked luggage', Ol lo bilong 'airline' bai i no inap long ol bek we i no gat pasindia, na dispela hap em yu bai helpim.
English: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
Tok Pisin: Yumi save mekim ol haus bilong yumi long ol plent (plant) na yumi save mekim ol klos bilong yumi long ol plent. Planti bilong ol kaikai we yumi save kaikai em ol plent. Sapos no gat plent, ol animal bai i no inap long stap laip.
English: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
Tok Pisin: ASUS Eee PC, we ol i bin mekim presentesen bilong em i go long olgeta hap bilong graun bikos em i ken seivim man na em i ken mekim planti impoten wok, em i kamap olsem wanpela bikpela topik we ol lain i wok long toktok long em long 2007 Taipei IT Month.
English: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
Tok Pisin: France em i namba seventin kantri long European Union long kisim taim nogut long dispela vaires (virus); bihain long Austria, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece na Italy.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Everyone can achieve enlightenment. The only thing standing in the way of this goal is our own tension and negativity.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Olgeta lain i ken kisim 'enlightenment'. Wanpela samting tasol we i sanap namel long dispela as tingting em hevi na 'negativity' bilong yumi yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
Tok Pisin: National Hurricane Centre (NHC) i tok olsem long dispela taim Jerry i no stap long mak we em i inap long kamapim bagarap long graun.
English: Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called "non-serious."
Tok Pisin: Long wik i go pinis, METI i tokaut olsem Apple i bin tokim em long 34-pela moa hevi i kamap long 'overheating', we dispela kamapani i kolim olsem "'i no bikpela samting."
English: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
Tok Pisin: Disaplin (discipline) bilong defens, we ol i wok long hendelim bal na gutpela tim wok i mekim ol i pilai gut tru na olgeta lain i save olsem ol narapela tim i mas traim long winim ol.
English: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
Tok Pisin: Prime Minister Stephen Harper i bin wanbel long salim 'Clean Air Act' bilong gavman i go long wanpela 'all-party committee' long skelim, bipo long namba tu taim bilong ritim em, dispela bai i kamap bihain long 25-pela minit miting wantaim NDP lida Jack Layton long PMO.

English: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
Tok Pisin: Finland em i wanpela gutpela kantri bilong raun long bot. Dispela "'Ples bilong tausen raunwara'" i gat planti tausen ailen insait long ol raunwara na long ol solwara.
English: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.
Tok Pisin: Ol i raitim ol dispela hap tok long baksait bilong Declaration of Independence pepa "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". Dispela hap tok i stap long aninit bilong dispela dokumen, na em i stap 'upside down'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: At the same time, the German navy, using mainly U-boats, was trying to stop this traffic.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Long wankain taim, 'navy' bilong Germany, i yusim ol U-boat, na i wok long traim long stopim dispela long kamap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
Tok Pisin: Ol Wagonways em ol i bin bildim long England taim bipo long '16th Century'.
English: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
Tok Pisin: Long ol ples we i hot long Middle East, haus em i no impoten.
English: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
Tok Pisin: Mi save pilim sampela samting olgeta taim mipela i save mekim prektis long dispela, mi save pilim insait long lewa bilong mi.
English: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
Tok Pisin: Dispela mani i ken i go long ol haus we tait wara i no inap long bagarapim ol, gutpela menejmen bilong wara, na planim kainkain kaikai.
English: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
Tok Pisin: Maski, 'project based learning' i mekim pasin bilong lainim samting i kamap isi moa na i kirapim intres (interest), 'scaffolding' em i mekim moa samting.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Sapos ol Allies i no mekim samting ol i bin mekim, Germany ating bai holimpasim na kisim Britain olsem em i bin mekim long olgeta hap bilong Europe.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim ol 'travel agent' i save wok wantaim wanwan hotel, yu bai lukim olsem yu ken yusim wanpela lokel 'agent' long makim spes bilong stap long o narapela hap, kain olsem ol 'camping ground'.
English: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save givim moa 'stability' long 'rider', tasol ol i ken kamapim hevi long sait bilong sefti bikos nogut lek bilong 'rider' i pas insait long ol.
English: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
Tok Pisin: Na tu long hap not yu ken go Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), wanpela ples we olgeta lain i save long en bikos long ol stori bilong Maria mama bilong Jisas i kamap long en.
English: Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes "journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."
Tok Pisin: Professor Pamela Ferguson bilong University of Dundee i tok olsem "ol jenelis (journalist) i ken putim ol yet long birua sapos ol i pablisim ol foto na kain samting olsem bilong ol saspek."
English: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
Tok Pisin: Bachmann, husat i winim Ames Straw Poll long Ogas, i mekim disisen long stopim kempen (campaign) bilong em.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol man i stat long lukautim meme long kain taim olsem 10,000 yia i go pinis long Zagros Mountains bilong Iran.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
Tok Pisin: Em i kamap wantaim dispela laspela tingting bikos long planti gutpela toktok na 'encouragment' we ol meri na man i salim i go long em na i tokim em olsem marasin bilong spesim pikinini em i mas kamap olsem wanpela sevis we olgeta haus sik i mas givim.
English: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
Tok Pisin: Congress i stat long givim mani long 'obscenity initiative' long taim em i mekim bajet bilong em long 2005 na tok olsem FBI i mas givim 10-pela wokmanmeri bilong stretim ol 'case' bilong 'adult pornography'.
English: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
Tok Pisin: Em i klia tru olsem, sapos yu save long wanpela Romance tok ples, em bai isi moa long yu long lainim Portuguese.
English: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
Tok Pisin: Ol saintis i tok olsem dispela paia we i kamap taim dispela tupela samting i bam em i traipela nogut tru.
English: The job of navies has traditionally been to ensure that your country maintains the ability to move your people and goods, while at the same time, interfering with your enemy's ability to move his people and goods.
Tok Pisin: Wok bilong ol 'navy' em i bilong lukim olsem kantri bilong yu em i inap long muvin ol kago na manmeri, na tu, stopim ol birua long muvim ol kago na ol manmeri bilong em.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long 'underwater typology' wara we i kam bek em i bung long ol ples we i dip, na wanpela 'fast current' i go long dispela hap we i dip i ken kamap long hap.
English: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).
Tok Pisin: Na tu, 'blogging' "i save fosim ol sumatin long save moa long ol samting we i wok long kamap long komuniti we ol i stap long en." Dispela nid long inapim nid bilong ol lain i ritim blog bilong ol i mekim na ol sumatin i gat moa save na kamap 'interesting' (Toto, 2004).
English: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim bai i gat skul fi long enrol long ol dispela edukesen progrem.
English: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'satellite' em wanpela 'rocket' i bin salim i go long 'space'. Ol saintis i yusim ol 'telescope' long 'space' bikos 'atmosphere' bilong Earth i save tanim sampela bilong ol lait bilong yumi na hau yumi lukim ol samting.
English: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'stirrup' em ol sapot bilong lek bilong 'rider' we i hangamap i kam daun long sait sait bilong 'saddle'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol meme bilong we ol man i save lukautim em ol i save putim ol long grup we i save raun long ol liklik maunten o ol narapela hap bilong kaikai, planti taim ol 'goatherd' i save was long ol na dispela em ol pikinini ol bikpela man we ol i save kolim olsem 'sheperd'. Ol dispela ol pasin bilong lukautim ol meme em ol i wok long yusim yet long tude.
predictions: Ol 'domestic goat' em ol i stap long ol 'herd' we i

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel bilong ol 'on-site activity' em painim pis, kisim foto, lukim ol pisin, na raun long ol 'park' na stadim infomesen long 'ecosystem'.
English: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
Tok Pisin: Ol eksiden we i kamap long skai i save kamap planti taim long Iran, we i gat ol olpela balus na ol i no save mentenim gut long mekim ol operesen bilong pablik na bilong militeri (military).
English: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
Tok Pisin: Ol loken atoriti i givim tok lukaut long ol lain i stap klostu long dispela diwai long stap insait long haus tasol, putim of 'air-conditioner' na no ken dring wara long tep.
English: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'case' we ol i saspekim H5N1 long Croatia na Denmark em ol i no painimaut yet olsem ol i tru tru, o nogat.
English: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
Tok Pisin: 'Pronunciation' em i tok ples Italian bikos planti bilong ol wod em ol i save kolim olsem hau ol i raitim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol Wagonways em ol i bin bildim long England taim bipo long '16th Century'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.
Tok Pisin: Yu no inap long lukim wanpela narapela samting tasol skai we i klia, i luk nais na i stap antap na planti maunten i raunim em. Yu no inap long lukim o harim ol samting bilong dispela graun taim yu stap insait long dispela hul bilong ston.
English: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'courier' kampani em ol i save baim ol gut long bringim ol samting hariap. Planti taim, em i impoten long mekim dispela wantaim ol dokumen bilong bisnis, ol 'merchandise' o 'spare parts' long mekim wanpela ripea (repair) hariap.
English: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
Tok Pisin: Dispela tupela 'compound' i save 'react' wantaim long kamapim ol 'crystal' we i ken blokim kidni long mekim wok bilong em, ol lain i go pas long risets long univesiti i tok.
English: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Lakkha Singhmekim singsing chhappan bhog bhajan. Singa, Raju Khandelwal i wok long singsing wantaim em.
English: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust.
Tok Pisin: Antap bilong Moon em i gat ol ston na das (dust). 'Outer layer' bilong Moon em ol i kolim 'crust'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Maski ol 'wagonways' em ol plang we i stap sait sait long rot, ol i mekim ol hos we i pulim ol long spit moa na i pulim bikpela kago long ol rot we i no raf (rough) moa long mak bilong ol rot we i save stap long dispela de.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
Tok Pisin: Chambers, wanpela man we i no bilip long God, i tok pait olsem kot pepa bilong bilong em, em i "no bikpela samting" na "olgeta man i ken kisim narapela i go long kot."
English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
Tok Pisin: Em i no makim wanpela namba bilong mak we dispela bai i kam daun long en, na em i tok olsem ol bai mekim dispela bihainim hamas mani China i mekim.
English: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
Tok Pisin: Maski wanwan kantri em i bin 'Scandinavian', i gat planti samting i narakain namel long ol manmeri, ol king, ol kastom na histori bilong Denmark, Sweden, Norway na Iceland.
English: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok olsem, i luk olsem draiva bilong dispela kar we i bamim dispela man bilong kisim foto bai i no inap long kisim ol sas.
English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting we ol i tok orait long en em ol tingting bilong Aristotle long sains (science), wantaim saikoloji (psychology).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol i yusim ol 'crossties' pastaim long holim ol dispela 'track' i stap long wanpela ples. Bihain, nau, ol i luksave olsem ol dispela 'track' bai kamap gutpela moa sapos ol i gat wanpela hap ain i stap antap long ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
Tok Pisin: "Mipela bai wok hat strong long daunim namba bilong 'carbon dioxide' we i save kamap long wanpela 'unit' bilong GDP long wanpela bikpela mak long yia 2020 long mak we em i bin i stap long en long yia 2005," Hu i tok.
English: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
Tok Pisin: Mi no inap long klia gut long dispela; em i no stret.
English: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
Tok Pisin: Isipela we bilong ron long balus insait long namba wan klas o bisnis klas em long yusim bikpela mani long kisim dispela naispela sevis (o, i gutpela moa, larim kampani bilong yu i yusim dispela mani long yu).
English: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
Tok Pisin: Scotturb Bus 403 i save ron olgeta taim i go long Sintra, na stop long Cabo da Roca.
English: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong gavman bilong narapela kantri long luksave long ol dispela dokumen em i narakain narakain tu.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dispela pasin em planti lain i save mekim, tasol em i kamapim 'wear' long plang wil bilong ol 'wagon'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
Tok Pisin: Mi lusim susa bilong mi na pren bilong em, na taim mi go long hap i gat tupela lain i sindaun long 'wheelchair', na ol i manmeri i kalapim tupela na pusim tupela tasol," Armand Versace.
English: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
Tok Pisin: Institut bilong Haiti long Justice na Democracy i bin mekim wanpela stadi bilong em yet we i painimaut olsem ol soldia bilong kantri Nepal insait long dispela grup bilong 'peacekeeping' i no save na i karim dispela sik i kam long Haiti.
English: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
Tok Pisin: Ol meme bilong we ol man i save lukautim em ol i save putim ol long grup we i save raun long ol liklik maunten o ol narapela hap bilong kaikai, planti taim ol 'goatherd' i save was long ol na dispela em ol pikinini ol bikpela man we ol i save kolim olsem 'sheperd'. Ol dispela ol pasin bilong lukautim ol meme em ol i wok long yusim yet long tude.
English: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.
Tok Pisin: Teknoloji (technology) i givim ansa wantaim 'field trip' we i kamap long komputa. Ol sumating i ken lukluk long ol 'museum artifact', lukim wanpela 'aquarium', ol lukluk long wanpela naispela 'art' taim ol i sindaun insait long klas.
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'curry' em i wanpela kaikai we i yusim ol 'herb' na 'spice', wantaim ol abus o kumu.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Bihain, ol i senisim ol plang wil wantaim ain wil. Long 1767, ol i wokim ol namba wan 'full-iron rails'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta taim yu bai harim saun bilong ol turis na ol lain bilong salim samting. Dispela stori bilong saun na lait em i wankain tru olsem wanpela stori buk.
English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, lukaut long ol smel we i save pulim ol bea na ol narapela animal, olsem na no ken karim o kukim kaikai we i gat strongpela smel na mekim kem i stap klin.
English: In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly.
Tok Pisin: Bikpela moa, ol i tok olsem yumi i ken painimaut sapos wanpela man o meri i giaman taim yumi painimaut mining bilong 'micro-expression' bilong em long stretpela we.
English: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol draiva i save mekim pasin long mak we i 'consistent', olsem na, ol 'traffic' i save i gat sampela samting i 'consistent' long ol na dispela em ol savemanmeri i ken soim wantaim ol namba bilong 'mathematics'.
English: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, ol i save makim ol ‘route’ we planti lain i save go wokabaut o ‘cycling’ long em.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man).
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Namba wan 'transportation' em wokabaut, ol manmeri i stat long wokabaut long tupela lek tu miline yia i go pinis taim ol Homo Erectus (dispela em i min olsem 'upright man') i kamap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air.
Tok Pisin: Planti samting long laip bilong ol Hebrew famili i save kamap autsait long haus.
English: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken yusim boda-boda (motobaik teksi) long raun insait long Goma. Lokel prais bilong dispela em i ~500 Congolese Francs long ron long sotpela hap.
English: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
Tok Pisin: Potro i kisim wanpela tritmen long solda (shoulder) bilong em long dispela taim na i go bek long pilai.
English: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
Tok Pisin: Bachmann, husat i winim Ames Straw Poll long Ogas, i mekim disisen long stopim kempen (campaign) bilong em.
English: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
Tok Pisin: Ol bikpela rot, ol bilding i gat glas long fran na ol stoa bilong tude em ol i gat ol 'red-tiled roof' we i tredisinel, '18th century' maket, na ol olpela 'mosque' na sios, tasol dispela siti em olsem wanpela siti bilong Mediterranean Europe na i no Turkey bilong bipo.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Their predecessors, the Australopithecus did not walk upright as habitually.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol lain i stap pastaim, ol Australopithecus i no wokabut long tupela lek olgeta taim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
Tok Pisin: Adekoya i bin stap long Edinburgh Sheriff Court na ol i sasim wm long kilim pikinini man bilong em.
English: Children are placed in Foster Care for a wide variety of reasons that range from neglect, to abuse, and even to extortion.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save putim ol pikinini long Foster Care bikos long kainkain samting na em i ken 'neglect', i go long 'abuse', na pasin bilong fosim pikinini long mekim samting bilong kisim mani.
English: This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i save kamap long olgeta hap bilong UK, tasol Scottish justicw i save wok narakain na ol kot i bin lukim pablikesen bilong ol foto olsem samting we i soim tingting bilong sampela lain na em i no tru.
English: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.
Tok Pisin: Long ol rot we i gat sno (snow) o ais, 'friction' em i no strong na yu no inap long draiv olsem yu save draiv antap long kolta nating.
English: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain bilong bipo long Rom i no bin i gat kaikai we i kam long America o Asia we nau ol i stap long Europe long sampela handret yia bihain.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Pasin bilong wokabaut long tupela lek em ol i painim long fosil (fossil) bilong ol Australopithecus we i bin stap 4.2-3.9 milien yia i go pinis, tasol ol Sahelanthropus i bin wokabaut long tupela lek long kain taim olsem seven milien yia i go pinis.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Sharks do exist, however they rarely attack humans. Most sharks are scared of humans and would swim away.
Tok Pisin: Ol sak i stap, tasol i no save kaikai man. Planti bilong ol sak i save pret long manmeri na i save swim i go longwe.
English: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
Tok Pisin: Mi no save sapos yu luksave long dispela o nogat, tasol planti bilong ol kago i kam long Central America i kam insait long kantri 'duty-free'.
English: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, tupela 'specie' bilong pis i pinis olgeta, na tupela narapela em klostu i laik pinis olgeta, wanpela bilong ol em i 'humpback chub'.
English: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
Tok Pisin: 'Great Pyramid' long Giza em i wanpela bilong ol 'seven wonders' we i sanap yet long tude.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.

Tok Pisin: Long hap not na i stap long ples we isi long go long en em dispela ol i kolim Sintra we i gat histori na i nais tru na planti ol lain long narapela kantri i save long en taim ol ritim toktok bilong Lord Byron long ol naispela samting i stap long em.

Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Hershey na Chase i bin yusim 'phages', o ol vaires (virus), long putim DNA bilong ol yet i go insait long wanpela 'bacterium'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
Tok Pisin: Sapos kantri we yu bai go long en em ol lain i tok save long sampela samting we yu mas lukaut long en, sampela senis bai kamap long 'travel health insurance' o 'trip cancellation insurance' bilong yu.
English: This seems sensible, because the Earth doesn't feel as if it's moving, does it?
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i luk olsem i stret, bikos yumi no save pilim olsem Earth i muv, a?
English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong flai long balus em i ken wanpela ekspiriens wei mekim ol manmeri i gat kainkain krismas na i kam long kainkain ples i pret, bikpela moa em sapos ol i no bin flai bipo o i bin stap insait long wanpela samting nogut we i kamap long balus bipo.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
Tok Pisin: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'mutation' i ken kamapim kainkain samting na ol i save kamap bikos long wanem kain 'mutation', impoten wok bilong dispela hap 'genetic material' na sapos dispela ol 'cell' em ol 'germ-line cell'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'monastery' i save givim ol laplap long ol meri we i no redi na i kam, tasol sapos yu bringim laplap bilong yu, gutpela moa long bringim wanpela we i gat ol brait (bright) kala, yu bai kisim wanpela smail long wanpela 'monk' o wanpela 'nun' long dua bilong go insait.
English: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'hotpela chocolate' em i stap long stendet bilong ol Belgium. Em i bikpela man i long ol frut jus, tasol ol i nambawan.
English: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'bug' em ol entomolojist (entomologist) i save yusim long toktok long dispela grup bilong ol binatang.
English: Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists.
Tok Pisin: Rolando Mendoza i sut long M16 gan bilong em long ol turis.
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'mutation' we i kamap insait long ol 'germ-line cell' tasol em ol i ken i go long ol pikinini, tasol ol 'mutation' we i kamap long narapela hap i ken kamapim 'cell-death' o kensa.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
Tok Pisin: Bipo em i bin wanpela siti ol i kolim Smyrna, nau em i kamap olsem siti bilong tude, em i divelop pinis, na planti wok bisnis i save kamap long en, em i stap raunim wanpela basis na ol maunten i raunim em.
English: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'show' em pastaim em ol 'voice actor' we i no gat planti save na ekspiriens (experience) i ektim, na ol i bilong East Texas.
English: Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."
Tok Pisin: Tommy Dreamer i tok "Luna em i namba wan Queen of Extreme. Em i namba wan meneja bilong mi. Luna i lusim mipela long nait bilong tupela mun. Dispela em i narakain samting na i wankain olsem pasin bilong em. Strongpela meri."
English: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela trupela “'invisible team'” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) em i wanpela narakain samting i stap insait long ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa.
English: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
Tok Pisin: South Africa i bin winim All Blacks (New Zealand) long 'rugby union' long Tri Nations geim (game) long Royal Bafokeng Stadium long Rustenburg, South Africa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: 'Nature-based tourism' em i save pulim ol manmeri we i intres long lukim ol eria bilong 'nature' na amamas long lukim ol ples, wantaim ol plent (plent) na animal bilong dispela eria.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.
Tok Pisin: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard i tok olsem long taim bilong kempen (campaign) long 2010 ileksen bilong gavman em i bilip olsem Australia i mas kamap olsem wanpela 'republic' taim Queen Elizabeth II i pinis long bosim kantri bilong ol.
English: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong serim wanpela 'field trip' long komputa em i wanpela gutpela we tu long tingting lon wanpela raun na serim ol samting i bin kamap wantaim klas bilong bihaintaim.
English: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain we i dai em Nicholas Alden, 25, na Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback i bin draivim kar.
English: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
Tok Pisin: Tasol bikos em i stap long "‘high tropics’" sampela ‘degree’ not long ‘equator’ yu bai nid long stap insait long hot (olgeta taim) na strongpela san (taim san i klia, dispela i no save kamap planti taim).
English: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."
Tok Pisin: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels i tok olsem "Luna i save mekim ol kainkain samting olsem mi…ating em i winim mi…laikim em na misim (miss) em…mi bilip olsem em i stap long gutpela ples."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Eksampel bilong ol 'on-site activity' em painim pis, kisim foto, lukim ol pisin, na raun long ol 'park' na stadim infomesen long 'ecosystem'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
Tok Pisin: Singapore em i seif tru na isi long i go i kam, na yu ken baim kainkain samting taim yu kamap long hap.
English: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
Tok Pisin: Ol i wok long traim yet long painimaut mak bilong dispela bikpela paia na em i bin kamapim wanem kain bagarap long Earth.
English: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'medical charity' Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres na the World Health Organisation i tok olsem dispela em i 'outbreak' we i stap long mak nogut tru insait long dispela kantri.
English: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
Tok Pisin: Tok ples Italian em ol lain i save wok insait long steit (state) i save yusim tu long toktok long olgeta de na ol i save yusim Latin long mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) bilong lotu.
English: Thus, the pencil was a good friend to many people when it came out.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, pensil (pencil) em i bin wanpela gutpela pren bilong planti manmeri taim em i bin kamap.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.
Tok Pisin: Pastaim em i bin stap long James Paget Hospital long Great Yarmouth.

Tok Pisin: Ol laspela risalt bilong ileksen bilong presiden na palimen bilong Nambia soim olsem presiden, Hifikepunye Pohamba, em ol i makim em wantaim bikpela namba tru long kamap presiden gen.

Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol Baltic Cruises i save larim ol lain i stap longpela taim long St. Petersburg, Russia.

Tok Pisin: Dispela em i wankain long ol militeri (military) bikos nau ol i no kisim 'rank' we i bihainim 'class' bilong famili bilong ol, tasol ol bai i kisim 'rank' we i bihainim pasin bilong ol na wanem samting ol i inap long mekim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Resting on the top of one of the mountains north of Mecca, the cave is completely isolated from the rest of the world.
Tok Pisin: Em i stap antap long wanpela bilong ol maunten long hap not bilong Mecca, dispela hul bilong ston em i stap hait long olgeta hap bilong graun.
English: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save insait long Metro em ol i save mekim long tok ples Catalan tasol, tasol ol samting we ol i no plen long mekim em wanpela 'automatic' sistem i save mekim dispela tok save long ol kainkain tok ples olsem Spanish, English, French, Arabic na Japanese.
English: No child should ever have to grow up in an environment that is not nurturing, caring, and educational, but they do.
Tok Pisin: No gat wanpela pikinini i mas stap insait long wanpela envairomen we i no gutpela long ol, i no lukautim ol, na i givim save long ol, tasol ol i save stap insait long kain envairomen olsem.
English: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan tok ples bilong Barcelona em Catalan na Spanish. Klostu hap namba bilong ol lain i stap long hap i save tok ples Catalan, bikpela namba moa i save long em, na klostu olgeta lain i save long Spanish.
English: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
Tok Pisin: Mi no save sapos yu luksave long dispela o nogat, tasol planti bilong ol kago i kam long Central America i kam insait long kantri 'duty-free'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
Tok Pisin: Bipo em i bin wanpela siti ol i kolim Smyrna, nau em i kamap olsem siti bilong tude, em i divelop pinis, na planti wok bisnis i save kamap long en, em i stap raunim wanpela basis na ol maunten i raunim em.
English: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
Tok Pisin: I gat strongpela tok save i go long ol travela long save long ol weda (weather) we i save kamap long ol eria bikos ol bai mekim senis i kamap long ol plen bilong ol travela.
English: While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage.
Tok Pisin: Taim no gat man i save long husat i raitim ol dispela hap tok, ol i save olsem taim em i nupela yet, dispela bikpela 'parchment' dokumen (sais bilong en, em 29¾ 'inches' na 24½ 'inches') em ol i bin rolim bai em i ken stap long storej (storage).
English: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
Tok Pisin: Planti dai i save kamap bikos ol manmeri i pilim tait long traim long swim i kam bek agensim 'current', na dispela em i hat long mekim.
English: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wanwan gavman long givim ol paspot (passport) we ol i no makim (X) long man o meri o givim ol dokumen long soim senis long nem na man i go long meri o meri i go long man em i narakain narakain long wanwan gavman.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
Tok Pisin: Cyanuric acid na melamine em ol i bin painim ol insait long ol 'sample' bilong pispis bilong ol 'pes' we i bin dai taim ol i kaikai dispela kaikai bilong animal we i posin insait long em.
English: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
Tok Pisin: Yu mas lukaut long no ken larim laplap i kamap hot tumas (dispela i ken kamapim mekim klos i kamap liklik, o sapos em i hot tumas, klos bai i paia).
English: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
Tok Pisin: Potro i kisim wanpela tritmen long solda (shoulder) bilong em long dispela taim na i go bek long pilai.
English: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
Tok Pisin: Lokel 'telephone service provider' bilong yu bai inap long givim moa infomesen long yu long hau yu ken konekt long dispela sevis.
English: Many common formats (APS family of formats, for example) are equal to or closely approximate this aspect ratio.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol fomet (format) we ol lain i save yusim (eksampel, APS famili bilong ol fomet) em i wankain o klostu wankain olsem dispela 'aspect ratio'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bom i stap long kar na i pairap long bikpela ofis bilong ol polis long Gaziantep, long Turkey aste moning na i kilim tupela polis ofisa na kamapim bagarap long bodi bilong moa long twentipela narapela manmeri.
English: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken yusim boda-boda (motobaik teksi) long raun insait long Goma. Lokel prais bilong dispela em i ~500 Congolese Francs long ron long sotpela hap.
English: Sharing a field trip virtually is also a great way to reflect a on a trip and share experiences with future classes.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong serim wanpela 'field trip' long komputa em i wanpela gutpela we tu long tingting lon wanpela raun na serim ol samting i bin kamap wantaim klas bilong bihaintaim.
English: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
Tok Pisin: Bihain ol ripot i tok olsem dispela balus i kisim wanpela 'bomb threat' olsem na ol salim em i go bek long Afghanistan, na em i go daun long Kandahar.
English: With two years of the end of the war, the former allies were now enemies and the Cold War began.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long tupela yia long pinis bilong woa, ol lain we i bin wok wantaim i kamap olsem ol birua na Cold War i stat.

English: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.
Tok Pisin:"}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
Tok Pisin: Ol ofisa bilong Armsterdam siti na Anne Frank Museum i tok olsem dispela diwai em wanpela 'fungus' i bagarapim em na em i ken kamapim bagarap long helt bilong pablik taim ol i tok olsem em i laik pundaun.
English: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
Tok Pisin: USA Gymnastics i sapotim wanpela investigesen we i ken painimaut long wanem we pasin bilong bagarapim narapela man o meri i kamap long dispela kain mak long longpela taim na nau ol lain i bin kisim dispela kain hevi long Larry Nassar i tokaut long en na ol bai mekim ol senis we i gutpela na i stretpela.
English: On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method.
Tok Pisin: Long ol ailan i stap autsait em ol i no inap long yusim ol 'credit cards', maski ol i ken kisim karensi (currency) bilong Britain na United States; sekim ol papa o mama bilongol stua long save wanem em ol rot bilong yusim long baim samting.
English: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
Tok Pisin: House Speaker bilong bipo Newt Gingrich, gavana bilong Texas Rick Perry, na Congresswoman Michele Bachmann i pinis namba foa, faiv na siks.
English: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
Tok Pisin: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki i tok olsem ol dispela man i karamapim pes bilong ol taim ol i kamap long kot.

Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Bilong wanem na ol 'transportation system' i save kamapim ol dispela kain komplen, bilong wanem na ol i no save wok gut long olgeta de? Ol 'transportation engineer' i no save long mekim wok bilong ol? O, i gat samting we i bikpela moa i wok long kamap?

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Ol narapela lain we i save pilai restling (wrestling) i soim sori bilong ol long Luna.
English: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol toilet bilong bipotaim tru long Egypt, Persia na China. Long hap bilong ol Rome, ol toilet em ol i stap olsem hap bilong ol pablik haus bilong waswas we ol man na meri i save bung wantaim.
English: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain bilong bipo long Rom i no bin i gat kaikai we i kam long America o Asia we nau ol i stap long Europe long sampela handret yia bihain.

Tok Pisin: Ol leta bilong tingim em 'c' na 'g', bikos 'pronunciation' bilong ol i save senis bihainim 'vowel' we i kam bihain long ol.

Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'bug' em ol entomolojist (entomologist) i save yusim long toktok long dispela grup bilong ol binatang.

Tok Pisin: Na tu, Lakkha Singhmekim singsing chhappan bhog bhajan. Singa, Raju Khandelwal i wok long singsing wantaim em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Most of the buildings on the edges of the complex have been rebuilt in order to give tourists a better idea of how they originally appeared.

Tok Pisin: Olgeta animal we i kam kamap long ailen i kam long hia taim ol i swim, flai o trip antap long wara.
English: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, 'still image photography' fomet (format) we planti lain i save long en em i 35mm, we i nambawan sais bilong 'film' bihain long taim bilong 'analog film'.
English: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
Tok Pisin: Ol animal we i no stap long planti hap kain olsem 'European brown bear', 'wolf', 'owl', 'lynx', 'wild cat', na 'capercaillie' i stap long hap, wantaim ol narapela animal we i stap long planti hap.
English: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'binary number' em i ken i gat tupela velu (value), dispela em i 0 o 1, na ol dispela namba em ol i save kolim olsem ol 'binary digit' - o 'bits' long toktok bilong komputa.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report "truly regrettable."

English: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.

English: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

English: The Northern Marianas emergency management office said that there were no damages reported in the nation.
Tok Pisin: Northern Marianas ofis we i save menejim imejensi i tok olsem i no gat bagarap i kamap insait long kantri.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.

English: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.
Tok Pisin: Ol i bin ting olsem em i laik resis gen long kamap olsem presiden long 2016.
English: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.
Tok Pisin: Long '16th century' Paraguay, we ol i bin kolim "The Giant Province of the Indies", i bin kamap taim ol lain Spain i kam bosim ol asples lain.

Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong yusim sip long muvim ol samting em i nambawan we tru bilong muvim bikpela namba bilong ol kago o ol manmeri long solwara.
English: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.
Tok Pisin: Long ol sampela bikde, bikpela namba bilong ol lain i save pilai musik i mekim kem long dispela ples, na planti bilong ol i save pilim olsem dispela em i impoten hap bilong dispela ekspiriens.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
Tok Pisin: I no gat planti lain i sindaun long Greenland. Long ol tumbuna stori bilong ol Norway, ol i tok olsem Erik the Red em ol i bin rausim em long Iceland bikos em i bin kilim wanpela man, na taim em i travel i go long wes, em i painim Greenland na em i givim dispela nem long en.
English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim 'oxygen' we yumi ol manmeri i save pulim win long en, na ol i save kisim 'carbon dioxide' we yumi ol manmeri i save rausim i kam autsait long bodi bilong yumi (dispela em, taim win we yumi i pulim i go insait i kam autsait).
English: It was to last for the next 40 years and would be fought for real, by proxy armies, on battlefields from Africa to Asia, in Afghanistan, Cuba and many other places.
Tok Pisin: Dispela woa em bai i stap 40-pela yia na pait i kamap tru tru, long ol ami (army) we i makim ol kantri, long ol ples bilong pait long Africa i go long Asia, long Afghanistan, Cuba na planti narapela ples.
English: The vertical clearance under the bridge is 15 meters. Construction was completed in August 2011, it didn't open to traffic until March 2017.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'vertical clearance' aninit long bris em i 15 mita. Konstraksen (construction) i bin pinis long Ogas 2011, em i no op long ol kar i ron i go inap long Mas 2017.
English: It is still produced today, but more importantly its aspect ratio has been inherited by digital camera image sensor formats.
Tok Pisin: Ol i wokim em yet long tude, tasol impoten moa em i olsem 'aspect ratio' bilong en em ol 'digital camera image senor' fomet (format) i kisim na yusim.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Sampela bilong ol lain i save stap long Bishkek i sutim tok long ol lain i mekim protes (protest) long saut olsem ol i kamapim dispela pasin bilong brukim lo.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755.

English: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol metod (method) we planti lain i save yusim long soim olsem 'socialization' em i impoten em ol i save yusim stori bilong ol pikinini we i bin 'socialized' bikos ol papamama i no bisi long ol, ol samting nogut i kamap long laip bilong ol, o ol lain i mekim nogut long ol taim ol i wok long gro.
English: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: 'Foster Care System' bilong mipela em i sapos long givim ol ples we i seif long ol pikinini long i stap, lain we i ken laikim ol na lukautim ol, gutpela helt kea (health care).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: 'Flat white' kofi em i narakain samting long ol lain Australia. Wanpela 'short black' em i wanpela ' expresso', 'cappuccino' we i kam wantaim krim (i no 'froth'), na ol i no save mekim ti we i gat milk insait long en.

Tok Pisin: Lokel 'telephone service provider' bilong yu bai inap long givim moa infomesen long yu long hau yu ken konekt long dispela sevis.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol bikpela bilip bilong ol Kristen em i olsem ol i mas yusim gut mani na kago bilong ol long helpim ol narapela we i gat pen na hevi o i no gat mani na kaikai. Ol i bilip olsem mani bilong sios em i bilong mekim dispela wok.
English: As knowledge of Greek declined, the West found itself cut off from its Greek philosophical and scientific roots.
Tok Pisin: Taim save bilong ol Greek i go daun, West i lusim ol tingting bilong Greek long sains (science) na filosofi (philosophy).
English: The High Middle Ages were preceded by the Early Middle Ages and followed by the Late Middle Ages, which by convention ends around 1500.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long High Middle Ages i bin gat Early Middle Ages na bihain long en i bin gat Late Middle Ages, dispela taim em i pinis long kain taim olsem 1500.

Tok Pisin: Yu kem mekim ol mak bilong yu yet wantaim pensil, tasol tingim ol 'bowing marks' we ol i printim pinis em i gat as na ol i stap, olsem na yu mas rispektim ol.
English: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol i luk olsem ol i no save gut long pilai wantaim ol sista bilong ol long hap saut, tasol taim tonamen (tournament) i wok long kamap, ol South Africa i wok long pilai gut moa.
English: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong sekuriti long sekim ol manmeri long ol 'checkpoint' i wok long kamap nogut moa bihain long Septemba 11, 2001.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.

Tok Pisin: Oyapock River Bridge em i wanpelad 'cable-stayed bridge'. Em i stap long Oyapock River na konektim ol siti bilong Oiapoque insait long Brazil na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock insait long French Guiana.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

English: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long 'underwater typology' wara we i kam bek em i bung long ol ples we i dip, na wanpela 'fast current' i go long dispela hap we i dip i ken kamap long hap.
English: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i wanbel wantaim tok save bilong USOC we i tok olsem gutpela bilong ol 'athlete' na ol 'club', na ol gem bilong ol, na dispela i ken kamap taim mipela i gohet long mekim ol wok bilong mipela na mekim ol gutpela senis i kamap insait long oganaisesen, na i no rausim setifiket.
English: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol draiva i save mekim pasin long mak we i 'consistent', olsem na, ol 'traffic' i save i gat sampela samting i 'consistent' long ol na dispela em ol savemanmeri i ken soim wantaim ol namba bilong 'mathematics'.
English: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'German pastry' em ol i gutpela tru, na long Bavaria, ol i gat gutpela teist na i gat kainkain, wankain olsem ol dispela bilong ol lain i stap saut, ol Austria.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday.
Tok Pisin: Xinhua i givim ripot olsem long Trinde ol lain bilong gavman we i wok long mekim investigesen (investigation) i painim tupela 'black box' we i save rekodim ol samting i kamp insait long balus.
English: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.

Tok Pisin: Risets insait long AI em i wok bilong mekim masin i mekim ol wok we i save kamap olgeta taim na i nidim save bilong wanpela wok long mekim disisen.
English: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
Tok Pisin: 'Re-entry shock' i save kamap hariap moa long 'culture shock' (i no gat 'honeymoon phase'), na em i save stap longpela taim na em i ken kamap long mak we i bikpela moa long 'culture shock'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
Tok Pisin: Long 'savaana', em i hat long wanpela 'primate' we i gat wanpela 'digestive system' kain olsem bilong ol man long inapim ol 'amino-acid' long ol plent (plant) i stap long hap.
English: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save givim moa 'stability' long 'rider', tasol ol i ken kamapim hevi long sait bilong sefti bikos nogut lek bilong 'rider' i pas insait long ol.
English: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25.
Tok Pisin: Curtis Cooper, wanpela 'mathematician' na 'computer science professor' long University of Central Missouri, i bin painimaut olsem bikpela 'prime number' tru long Jenueri 25.
English: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
Tok Pisin: Sikret (secret) bilong hau ol i save stap gut em i dispela samting ol i kolim 'niche', wanpela spesol wok wanwan pusi i save mekim na em i no resis wantaim narapela.
English: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambis we i stap long North Shores (long North Habour district) em ol i stap long Pacific Ocean na i stat long Long Bay long hap not na i go long Devenport long hap saut.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.
Tok Pisin: French Revolution i kirapim tingting bilong planti ol narapela 'working class' manmeri long ol narapela kantri long statim ol 'revolution' bilong ol yet.
English: This is called a chemical's pH. You can make an indicator using red cabbage juice.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em ol kolim pH bilong kemikel (chemical). Yu ken mekim wanpela 'indicator' wantaim retpela jus bilong kabis.
English: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
Tok Pisin: Three Kingdoms em i wanpela bilong ol taim bilong pait insait long histori bilong Ancient China we planti tausen manmeri i dai taim ol pait long sindaun long nambawan sia insait long 'grand palace' long Xi’an.
English: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'subculture' i save mekim ol lain i gat wankain tingting na i pilim olsem ol stendet bilong 'society' i no bilong ol na taim ol i bung wantaim ol i kamapim wanpela 'identity' bilong ol yet.
English: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'outbreak' i mekim na gavman bilong India i mekim ol dispela samting kain olsem salim ol lain bilong holimpasim pik i go long ol eria we planti pik i sik na i stap, na givim tausen moskito keten (curtain) na spreyim (spray) ol 'pesticide'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Unfortunately, studying traffic flow is difficult because driver behavior cannot be predicted with one-hundred percent certainty.

Tok Pisin: Britain i putim ol bom aninit long ol intanesinel wara long stopim ol sip long i go insait long bikpela seksen bilong solwara, dispela i kamapim birua tu long ol sip bilong ol narapela lain we i no stap insait long dispela pait.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'binary number' em i ken i gat tupela velu (value), dispela em i 0 o 1, na ol dispela namba em ol i save kolim olsem ol 'binary digit' - o 'bits' long toktok bilong komputa.

Tok Pisin: Dispela i save givim mipela nupela infomesen na meteriel long kamapim ol 'simulation model' we i ken helpim yumi long klia gut long ol proses (process) we i save kamap insait long tingting bilong mipela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Dispela wara i stap long han bilong yu bai i 'react' wantaim ol 'layer' we i stap autsait, we bai i pilim narakain na kamapim wanpela kain sel.

Tok Pisin: USA Gymnastics na USOC i gat wankain as tingting — mekim geim bilong 'gymnastics', na ol narapela, i kamap seif olgeta bai ol 'athletes' i ken bihainim ol driman bilong ol long wanpela seif, positif na gutpela envairomen we i mekim ol i pilim olsem ol i inap long mekim samting.

Tok Pisin: Ol ripot i bin kam pas i tok olsem ol i salim dispela balus i go bek long Afghanistan bipo long ol i tok nogat long em long pundaun long Ürümqi.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.

English: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).
Tok Pisin: Sapos yumi skelim olgeta samting, tupela pasin i kamap ples klia taim ol meneja i stat long go pas long ol wanlain bilong ol. Long wanpela sait em ol i laik stap olsem “wanpela bilong ol mangi long grup” (meri long grup).
English: Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
Tok Pisin: Sekim 'label' long ol 'first aid instruction' bilong dipela posin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30.
Tok Pisin: Ol bas (bus) i save lusim 'inter-district bus station' (we i stap long narapela sait bilong wara) long de taim, maski planti, bilong ol we i go long is na Jakar/Bumthang i save lusim stesin long namel long 06:30 na 07:30.
English: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands.
Tok Pisin: Narapela samting tu em i olsem, "Timbuktu" em i hat long go long en na ol i save yusim dispela nem olsem tok piksa bilong ol samting i narapela kain, i stap long longwe ples.
English: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
Tok Pisin: Planti dai i save kamap bikos ol manmeri i pilim tait long traim long swim i kam bek agensim 'current', na dispela em i hat long mekim.
English: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
Tok Pisin: Dr. Ehud Ur, em i wanpela profesa bilong marasin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, long Nova Scotia na em i siaman sains na klinik seksen bilong Canadian Diabetes Association i givim tok lukaut olsem dispela risets i nupela yet.
English: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
Tok Pisin: Sampela 'atom' i gat 'unstable nuclei' na dispela em i min olsem ol i save bruk taim yu tasim liklik o i no tasim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.
Tok Pisin: Ol i raitim ol dispela hap tok long baksait bilong Declaration of Independence pepa "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". Dispela hap tok i stap long aninit bilong dispela dokumen, na em i stap 'upside down'.
English: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.
Tok Pisin: Na moa yet, sapos ol i no inap long mekim dispela ol bikpela samting i ken kamap: 'growth depression', 'malnutrition', na bikpela tru em i dai.
English: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.

Tok Pisin: Ol liklik ailan long solwara na nambawan bikpela raunwara i inap long wanpela 'yatch' o liklik bot o 'kayak' we i ken givim ol narapela we bilong kisim amamas.
