Tok Pisin: Tibetan Buddhism em i bihainim ol samting we Buddha i tisim, tasol ol i mekim em i go bikpela moa wantaim 'mahayana path of love' na tu wantaim planti ol teknik (technique) bilong Indian Yoga.

Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Long planti narapela siti bilong Italy na long olgeta hap bilong graun, bikpela moa long Poland, ol i mekim ol wankain 'setup', na planti manmeri i lukim dispela funerel (funeral).
English: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.

English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i save kolim dispela proses (process) 'speciation', dispela em i min olsem kamapim nupela 'specie'. 'Speciation' em i wanpela samting we yumi i no inap long abrusim na em i wanpela impoten pat bilong 'evolution'.
English: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda.
Tok Pisin: Goma em i wanpela siti we ol turis i save laik i go long en insait long Democratic Republic of Congo long hap ist klostu long kantri Rwanda.
English: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok i save senis long wanwan ples, long sampela ples kain olsem North America em namba bilong krismas i no bikpela tumas tasol long Europe em bai i bikpela.
English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela topik we dispela ripot i toktok long en, em mak bilong Jerusalem we i stap olsem ples holi long tupela kantri wantaim na hevi bilong Jordan Valley.
English: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol animal i lukautim ol dispela pikinini, ol dispela 'feral' pikinini save soim ol pasin (we ol inap long mek) we i wankain olsem pasin bilong dispela animal we i lukautim ol, kain olsem pret o i no save wanem samting bilong mekim taim em i stap wantaim ol narapela manmeri.
English: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'handicraft' em ol i kolim ol olsem ol 'antique', maski ol i no gat bikpela krismas wankain olsem ol narapela samting we fektori (factory) i mekim planti long wanpela taim.
English: The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
Tok Pisin: Bikpela Amazon River em i 6,387 km (3,980 miles). Em i save kolektim ol wara i kam long planti tausen liklik wara.
English: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long wanpela wik we ol lus i kamap long 'midterm election', Bush i toktok long wanpela lain manmeri na i tokim ol long 'expansion' we bai i kamap long 'trade' long Asia.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
Tok Pisin: Maski, 'project based learning' i mekim pasin bilong lainim samting i kamap isi moa na i kirapim intres (interest), 'scaffolding' em i mekim moa samting.
English: Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."
Tok Pisin: Tommy Dreamer i tok "Luna em i namba wan Queen of Extreme. Em i namba wan meneja bilong mi. Luna i lusim mipela long nait bilong tupela mun. Dispela em i narakain samting na i wankain olsem pasin bilong em. Strongpela meri."
English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em planti lain i save mekim, tasol em i kamapim 'wear' long plang wil bilong ol 'wagon'.
English: The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side.
Tok Pisin: 'Crust' bilong em i kain olsem 70 km 'thick' long sait i stap klostu na 100 km 'thick' long sait i stap longwe.
English: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela 'rider' i pundaun long wanpela hos, tasol lek bilong em i pas long 'stirrup', hos i ken pulim ol taim em i ranawe. Long daunim mak bilong dispela hevi long kamap, ol 'rider' i mas mekim samting long abrusim dispela.

Tok Pisin: Long kisim ol gutpela hap bilong lukim Hong Kong, lusim ailan na go long fran bilong wara long Kowloon long hapsait.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
Tok Pisin: Long aste avinun, long La Plata, wanpela siti we i stap 50 kilomita (31-pela 'mile') long Buenos Aires, dispela senata (senator) husat em i Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kircher i tokaut olsem em bai i resis long kamap presiden.
English: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast.
Tok Pisin: Ol Sundarbans em ol nambawan bikpela 'littoral mangrove belt' long olgeta hap bilong graun, sais bilong ol em i 80 km (50 mi) i go insait long Bangladeshi na ples i stap insait tru long India longwe long nambis.
English: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
Tok Pisin: Dispela muvi we Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone i stap insait long en, em ol lain i makim em long i stap insait long olgeta bikpela 'category'.
English: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
Tok Pisin: 'Flat white' kofi em i narakain samting long ol lain Australia. Wanpela 'short black' em i wanpela ' expresso', 'cappuccino' we i kam wantaim krim (i no 'froth'), na ol i no save mekim ti we i gat milk insait long en.
English: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.
Tok Pisin: I no gat wanpela "taim bilong ren" na "taim bilong san": mak bilong ren i save stap klostu wankain mak long olgeta yia.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Tupelal singsing bilong dispela muvi, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars, em ol i makim olsem 'best original song'. Ol i makim Lionsgate studio 26-pela taim—dispela em i moa long olgeta narapela 'studio'.

English: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
Tok Pisin: I bin no gat ol bikpela bus insait long graun bilong ol Canaan, olsem na plang em i ekspensif (expensive) tumas.
English: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
Tok Pisin: Long 1895, bihain long em i lusim pait insait long First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), Qing gavman i sainim Treaty of Shimonoseki, insait long dispela em i givim pawa bilong Taiwan i go long Japan, husat i bosim dispela ailan i go inap long 1945.
English: Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity.
Tok Pisin: Stat long taim ol i kamapim Asunción long 1537, Paraguay i bin larim planti bilong ol pasin na kalsa bilong ol asples grup i stap yet.
English: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
Tok Pisin: Ol plent (plant) i save mekim 'oxygen' we yumi ol manmeri i save pulim win long en, na ol i save kisim 'carbon dioxide' we yumi ol manmeri i save rausim i kam autsait long bodi bilong yumi (dispela em, taim win we yumi i pulim i go insait i kam autsait).
English: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save givim moa 'stability' long 'rider', tasol ol i ken kamapim hevi long sait bilong sefti bikos nogut lek bilong 'rider' i pas insait long ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long taim bilong winta (winter) ples i ken kol nogut tru: ol tempritsa (temperature) i no save go daun aninit long mak we ais i save kamap, tasol i win na wara i stap long win i save bung wantaim long mekim ples i pilim kol moa long wanem samting 'thermometer' i tok.

Tok Pisin: Plitvice Lakes nesinel park em i gat planti bikpela diwai, planti bilong ol dispela diwai em 'beech', 'spruce', na ol 'fir' diwai, na em i gat miks Alpine na Mediterranean plent (plant).

Tok Pisin: I gat ol toilet bilong bipotaim tru long Egypt, Persia na China. Long hap bilong ol Rome, ol toilet em ol i stap olsem hap bilong ol pablik haus bilong waswas we ol man na meri i save bung wantaim.
English: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em Netherlands, wantaim Anna Jochemsen we i pinis long namba nain ples long 'women's standing class' insait long Super-G long aste, na Finland wantaim Katja Saarinen we i pinis namba ten insait long dispela seim (same) geim (game).
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love.
Tok Pisin: Insait long as tingting bilong em Tibetan Buddhism em i isi tru. Em i gat Kundalini Yoga, 'meditation' and the rot bilong 'all-embracing love'.
English: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'safari' we planti lain i save yusim em i toktok long travel long graun long lukim ol narakain animal bilong Africa, planti bilong ol em ol animal bilong 'savanna'.
English: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
Tok Pisin: Ol Liberal i tok olsem ol wok bilong bildim bek gen ol samting we i bin bagarap i bin lukluk long givim ol wok kontrak bilong konstraksen (construction) i go long ol bisnis we i gat sampela luksave lain bilong ol i stap long Washington.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: 'Roar' bilong taiga em i wankaim olsem 'full-voiced roar' bilong wanpela laion, tasol em i klostu i laik wankain olsem wanpela sentens bilong man i pulim win taim em kros na singaut.
English: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
Tok Pisin: Tok ples Italian em ol lain i save wok insait long steit (state) i save yusim tu long toktok long olgeta de na ol i save yusim Latin long mekim ol seremoni (ceremony) bilong lotu.
English: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
Tok Pisin: Taim em i wok olsem NSA, em i helpim Carter long mekim ol gutpela disisen long ol 'world affairs', kain olsem Camp David Accords, long 1978; na mekim rilesensip namel long US–China i kamap gut long 1970; Iranian Revolution, we i bin kamapim 'Iran hostage crises', long 1979; na taim Soviet i go insait long kantri Afghanistan, long 1979.
English: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
Tok Pisin: Wara i wok long kapsait i go antap long 'levee' long seksen we bikpela bilong em i 100 'feet'.
English: He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
Tok Pisin: Na bihain ol i salim em i go long Addenbrooke's Hospital long Cambridge.
English: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.
Tok Pisin: Ol Sundarbans i karamapim wanpela eria mak bilong 3,850 km², na 'one-thrid' bilong en em wara/ples tais i karamapim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol nambis we i stap long North Shores (long North Habour district) em ol i stap long Pacific Ocean na i stat long Long Bay long hap not na i go long Devenport long hap saut.
predictions: Ol bikpela bis (long North Harbour district) i stap long Pacific Ocean na

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).
Tok Pisin: Yusim ol blog long gutpela na stretpela we "i ken mekim ol sumatin i ken skelim ol samting na save long wanem samting i no stret na wanem we bilong stret; taim ol wok wantaim ol meteriel long Internet, ol sumatin i ken save long wanem mak ol i stap long en taim ol skelim samting we ol narapela i raitim na tu ol i ken givim tingting bilong ol long ol samting we i wok long kamap (Oravec, 2002).
English: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, em i luk olsem dispela hap tok ol i bin raitim bihain bai em i ken i stap olsem wanpela 'label'.
English: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, taim ol nupela rot bilong rait i kamap, pensil (pencil) i kisim wanpela posisen we i daunbilo na i no gat planti i yusim em.
English: Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications.
Tok Pisin: Vatican City i save yusim tok ples Italian insait long ol lo bilong em na long mekim ol 'official communication'.
English: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta maus bilong hul bilong ston, we ol i kolim "The Seven Sisters", sais bilong namel bilong ol em ol i gat 100 i go long 250 mita (328 i go long 820 'feet') o moa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Klostu olgeta bilong ol nambis em i seif long swim na planti bilong ol i gat gutpela seid (shade) bilong ol pohuukawa diwai long hait long san.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
Tok Pisin: Dispela tupela setelait (satellite), hevi bilong tupela wantaim i winim 1,000 paun, na i wok long ron long 17,500 'mile' long wanpela aua, i bam 491 'mile' antap long Earth.
English: With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations.
Tok Pisin: Wantaim Kundalini Yoga dispela Kundalini energy ('enlightenment energy') em i save kirap insait long 'yoga postures', eksesais bilong pulim win, ol 'mantra' na 'visualizations'.
English: Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior.
Tok Pisin: Risets insait long AI em i wok bilong mekim masin i mekim ol wok we i save kamap olgeta taim na i nidim save bilong wanpela wok long mekim disisen.
English: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela seim (same) mun narapela balus i ran i go autsait long mak bilong 'runway' long Mashhad na i bamim wanpela wol, na kilim seventinpela lain.
English: The correlation between brain pathology and behaviour supports scientists in their research.
Tok Pisin: Rilesensip namel long 'brain pathology' na pasin i sapotim ol saintis insait long risets bilong ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol nambis bilong Tamaki Drive i stap long Waitemata Harbour, long ol 'upmarket' komuniti bilong Mission Bay na St Heliers long Central Auckland.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i wankain long ol militeri (military) bikos nau ol i no kisim 'rank' we i bihainim 'class' bilong famili bilong ol, tasol ol bai i kisim 'rank' we i bihainim pasin bilong ol na wanem samting ol i inap long mekim.
English: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, em i luk olsem dispela hap tok ol i bin raitim bihain bai em i ken i stap olsem wanpela 'label'.
English: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol animal i lukautim ol dispela pikinini, ol dispela 'feral' pikinini save soim ol pasin (we ol inap long mek) we i wankain olsem pasin bilong dispela animal we i lukautim ol, kain olsem pret o i no save wanem samting bilong mekim taim em i stap wantaim ol narapela manmeri.
English: The 35mm format is actually, somewhat confusingly, 36mm in width by 24mm in height.
Tok Pisin: Ol 35mm fomet (format) em ol, i ken mekim ol lain i paul, ol i gat 36mm long 'width' na 24mm long 'height'.
English: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'curry' em i wanpela kaikai we i yusim ol 'herb' na 'spice', wantaim ol abus o kumu.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela ol gutpela nambis i save pulap wantaim ol famili na i save i gat ol gutpela stua i stap long klostu long dispela nambis. Em i seif long swim long ol dispela nambis.
predictions: Dispela em i olpela 'family beach' we ol manmeri ol i

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
Tok Pisin: Maski wanwan kantri em i bin 'Scandinavian', i gat planti samting i narakain namel long ol manmeri, ol king, ol kastom na histori bilong Denmark, Sweden, Norway na Iceland.
English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela geim (game) bilong 'series' bai kamap long Ellis Park long Johannesburg long wik i kam, taim ol Sprinboks i pilai agensim ol Australia.
English: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
Tok Pisin: Dispela tupela setelait (satellite), hevi bilong tupela wantaim i winim 1,000 paun, na i wok long ron long 17,500 'mile' long wanpela aua, i bam 491 'mile' antap long Earth.
English: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela rot, Paris i kamap olsem nambawan ples bilong ol kainkain stail bilong klos long dispela graun long tude, tasol Constantinople em i stap olsem nambawan siti bilong kainkain stail klos long taim bilong 'middle ages' long Europe.
English: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i wankain long Norway, Sweden na New Zealand, tasol em i narakain liklik (eksampel long Netherlands, dispela namba em i 40).
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Nambawan lokel bia em 'Number One', em i no wanpela narakain bia, tasol em i nais na i mekim man i pilim gut. Wanpela narapela lokel bia em i "Manta".
predictions: Nem bilong bia lokal em i 'Number One', em i no wanpela

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain we i dai em Nicholas Alden, 25, na Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback i bin draivim kar.
English: Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).
Tok Pisin: Yu mas strong na tok nogat long ol man, no ken pret long sanap strong na toktok (pasin em i pasin bilong dispela ples, em i no orait long ol i mekim olsem!).
English: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'casino' i save traim hat tru long yusim taim na mani we ol 'guest' i kam na spendim. I no gat windua na klok, na ol dua bilong go autsait em i save hat long painim.
English: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
Tok Pisin: Plitvice Lakes nesinel park em i gat planti bikpela diwai, planti bilong ol dispela diwai em 'beech', 'spruce', na ol 'fir' diwai, na em i gat miks Alpine na Mediterranean plent (plant).
English: His research showed that if a hormone was administered it would speed up the baby's foetal lung maturation.
Tok Pisin: Risets bilong em i soim olsem sapos ol i givim wanpela 'hormone' dispela i inap long mekim 'foetal lung' bilong bebi i gro hariap.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: I gat planti French wain long dring, tasol ol wain bilong New Zealand na Australia em i isi moa long kisim ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
Tok Pisin: Singapore em i seif tru na isi long i go i kam, na yu ken baim kainkain samting taim yu kamap long hap.
English: After seeing the horrors and atrocities of war during World War I, nations desired to avoid such a situation again in the future.
Tok Pisin: Ol kantri i lukim pinis ol pen na hevi na kranki pasin bilong woa we i kamap insait long World War I, ol kantri i laik long abrusim dispela kain samting long kamap gen long bihaintaim.
English: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
Tok Pisin: Moldova em i wanpela 'republic' we i gat kainkain hauslain we i bin kisim taim nogut long kros na pait i kamap namel long ol hauslain.
English: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).
Tok Pisin: Na tu, 'blogging' "i save fosim ol sumatin long save moa long ol samting we i wok long kamap long komuniti we ol i stap long en." Dispela nid long inapim nid bilong ol lain i ritim blog bilong ol i mekim na ol sumatin i gat moa save na kamap 'interesting' (Toto, 2004).
English: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain we i dai em Nicholas Alden, 25, na Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback i bin draivim kar.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol lokel wara long tep (tap) em i seif long dringim, tasol em isi long painim botol wara sapos yu pret long wara long tep.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain long Babylon i bildim wanpela namba wan tempel long wanwan god bilong ol we ol i save mekim olsem dispela em i haus bilong dispela god.
English: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
Tok Pisin: Izmir em i namba tri bikpela siti insait long Turkey wantaim wanpela populesen long kain olsem 3.7 milien, namba tu bikpela port bihainim long Istanbul, na em i wanpela bikpela senta bilong trenspot (transport).
English: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
Tok Pisin: Em i givim yumi trein (train), kar, ma planti narapela masin bilong 'transportation'.
English: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, bikos pasin bilong salim toktok i go i kam i save kisim taim, ol stail bilong wes bai stap bihain long 25 i go long 30-pela yia.
English: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
Tok Pisin: Dispela laspela sko (score) em i wanpela poin win, 21 na 20, na i pinisim 15-pela geim (game ) we All Blacks i bin winim.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: 'Flat white' kofi em i narakain samting long ol lain Australia. Wanpela 'short black' em i wanpela ' expresso', 'cappuccino' we i kam wantaim krim (i no 'froth'), na ol i no save mekim ti we i gat milk insait long en.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
Tok Pisin: USA Gymnastics i sapotim leta bilong United States Olympic Commitee na em i save olsem dispela em i wanpela bikpela samting tru long Olymlpic famili long kamapim wanpela seif envairomen bilong olgeta 'athletes'.
English: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
Tok Pisin: Dispela eria em i ples bilong ol kainkain animal na pisin.
English: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela long tim bilong em Fernando Alonso i stap long fran olgeta taim insait long resis, tasol em i stop long resis taim em i mekim wanpela 'pit stop', i luk olsem dispela i kamap biko long wanpela fran wil (wheel) we ol i no putim gut.
English: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.
Tok Pisin: Dispela man we i bin winim gol medel (gold medal) i bai swim insait long 100m na 200m 'freestyle' na insait long tripela 'relay' long Commonwealth Games, tasol bikos long ol komplen bilong em long 'fitness' em i ol i no save sapos em bai pilai.
English: The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife.
Tok Pisin: Dispela park i karamapim 19,500 km² na em i bruk i go long 14-pela 'ecozone', wanwan bilong ol i sapotim narakain narakain 'wildlfie'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'hotpela chocolate' em i stap long stendet bilong ol Belgium. Em i bikpela man i long ol frut jus, tasol ol i nambawan.
predictions: Hot chocolate em i gutpela tru long Belgian. Fruit juice em i diaman tasol em i gutpela tru.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
Tok Pisin: Displela nupela envairomen i gat ol kainkain risos na ol kainkain kompetisen, olsem na dispela nupela populesen (population) bai nidim ol narapela pasin long kamap strong moa long mak we ol i bin stap long en bipo.
English: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i save kolim dispela proses (process) 'speciation', dispela em i min olsem kamapim nupela 'specie'. 'Speciation' em i wanpela samting we yumi i no inap long abrusim na em i wanpela impoten pat bilong 'evolution'.
English: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan samting we i soim olsem 'internal poisoning' i kamap em wanpela kontena bilong marasin o 'toxic chemical' bilong haus i op na i stap.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol i save mekim planti raun i go long ol rip long olgeta taim insait long wanpela yia, na bagarap i kamap long bodi long ol dispela kain samting i save kamap wanwan taim tasol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu bin i go long narapela kantri long namba wan taim tru, yu bin isi na traim long lainim samting, yu save olsem ol travela i stap long narapela kantri i mas senisim tingting na pasin bilong ol.
English: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
Tok Pisin: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger i sainim wanpela 'bill' na mekim em i kamap olsem lo tru tru we i stopim ol lain long salim o rentim o geim (game) bilong pait i go long ol pikinini.
English: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, yu mas sekim olsem yu kolim 'r' na 'rr' narakain: 'caro' em i min olsem dia, na 'carro' em i min olsem 'chariot'.
English: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
Tok Pisin: Ol ofisa bilong Armsterdam siti na Anne Frank Museum i tok olsem dispela diwai em wanpela 'fungus' i bagarapim em na em i ken kamapim bagarap long helt bilong pablik taim ol i tok olsem em i laik pundaun.
English: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
Tok Pisin: Mipela i no save bilong wanem na ol mobail fon sevis i strong moa long hia na i no strong long planti ol narapela hap bilong dispela rot, kain olsem Pennsylvania Wilds.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Tasol, kisim tok save bilong ol atoriti, bihainim olgeta sain, na ritim na bihainim gut ol tok lukaut.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol pasin we ol lain i save mekim long dispela holide em ol lain i no Kristen na ol kantri we i no Kristen kantri i save bihainim long olgeta hap bilong graun.
English: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
Tok Pisin: Straksa bilong ol dispela gras bilong pisin i soim olsem wok bilong ol em i no bilong flai tasol em i bilong mekim tempritsa (temperature) bilong bodi bilong ol i stap gut na bilong soim kala bilong ol long ol narapela. Ol lain i go pas long dispela wok painimaut i ting olsem, maski dispela em i tel bilong wanpela yangpela dainaso, dispela 'sample' i soim gras bilong wanpela bikpela dainaso na i no gras bilong wanpela pikinini dainaso.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
Tok Pisin: U.S President George W. Bush i kamap long Singapore long moning bilong Novemba 16, long statim wanpela wik we em bai i raun lukim Asia.
English: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.
Tok Pisin: Dispela man we i bin winim gol medel (gold medal) i bai swim insait long 100m na 200m 'freestyle' na insait long tripela 'relay' long Commonwealth Games, tasol bikos long ol komplen bilong em long 'fitness' em i ol i no save sapos em bai pilai.
English: Virtual teams are held to the same standards of excellence as conventional teams, but there are subtle differences.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i ken i gat ol wankain stendet bilong mekim gut wok wankain olsem ol tim we i save wok wantaim long ofis, tasol i gat sampela liklik samting i narakain.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Box jellyfish occur near beaches and near river estuaries from October to April north of 1770. They can occasionally be found outside these times.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'box jellyfish' i save kamap olgeta taim arere long nambis na arere long ol maus wara long Oktoba i go long Epril long hap nat long 1770. Sampela taim ol i ken kamap autsait long ol dispela taim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'handicraft' em ol i kolim ol olsem ol 'antique', maski ol i no gat bikpela krismas wankain olsem ol narapela samting we fektori (factory) i mekim planti long wanpela taim.
English: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
Tok Pisin: Ol weda (weather) nogut bilong wanwan rijen o sisen em ol 'blizzard', 'snowstorm', 'ice storm', na 'dust storm'.
English: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
Tok Pisin: Murray i lusim namba wan 'set' bilong em insait long wanpela 'tie breal' taim tupela man wantaim i kisim olgeta 'serve' insait long dispela 'set'.
English: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War.
Tok Pisin: Infomesen we ol i mekim i go pablik, i bin toktok long ol kros i kamap long ol boda, we Palestine i bin laikim ol boda we i bin stap bipo long 1967 Mideast War.
English: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.

English: Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'mutation' we i kamap insait long ol 'germ-line cell' tasol em ol i ken i go long ol pikinini, tasol ol 'mutation' we i kamap long narapela hap i ken kamapim 'cell-death' o kensa.
English: Moreover, failure to do so has serious consequences: growth depression, malnutrition, and ultimately death.
Tok Pisin: Na moa yet, sapos ol i no inap long mekim dispela ol bikpela samting i ken kamap: 'growth depression', 'malnutrition', na bikpela tru em i dai.

Tok Pisin: Duvall, em i marit na em i gat tupela bikpela pikinini, na em i no mekim Miller i amamas, we dispela stori i toktok long en.
English: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela we tasol bilong salim samting hariap em long salim em olsem wanpela 'checked luggage', Ol lo bilong 'airline' bai i no inap long ol bek we i no gat pasindia, na dispela hap em yu bai helpim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: “'Personal involvement'” na “'continuing relationship'” em Eighmey and McCord (1998) i bin luksave olsem ol nupela samting we i kirapim bel bilong yumi long yusim intanet taim ol i mekim stadi long pasin bilong ol manmeri long ol websait.
English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'shooter' insait long dispela 'supplementary pest control' test em ol 'ranger' i was long ol, bikos dispela test em ol i monitarim (monitor) na skelim 'effectiveness' bilong em.

English: Neurobiological data provide physical evidence for a theoretical approach to the investigation of cognition. Therefore it narrows the research area and makes it much more exact.
Tok Pisin: Neurobiological infomesen i givim evidens (evidence) long wanpela 'theoretical approach' long investigesen bilong 'cognition'. Olsem na em i mekim eria bilong risets i kamap liklik moa na mekim em i kamap long 'exact'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: 'Boating' o pasin bilong raun long bot em i wanpela samting we olgeta manmeri long Finland i save laik long mekim. Ol i gat planti bot, wanpela bot em i inap long 7-pela o 8-pela manmeri.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.
English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain Egypt i bildim long 'third century' BCE, Great Pyramid em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela pyramid straksa we ol i wokim long givim ona long wanpela Pharaoh we i dai pinis.

Tok Pisin: Long olpela Medina em i isi long painim ol ples we i save salim ol samting bilong ol Morocco, kain olsem 'tagine', 'pottery', 'leather goods', 'hookahs', na ol kainkain 'geegaws', tasol olgeta dispela samting em i bilong ol turis long baim.

Tok Pisin: Antap bilong Moon em i gat ol ston na das (dust). 'Outer layer' bilong Moon em ol i kolim 'crust'.
English: Alloys are basically a mixture of two or more metals. Don't forget that there are many elements on the periodic table.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'alloy'em ol samting we i gat tupela o moa metel (metal) insait long en. No ken lus tingting olsem i gat planti elemen (element) insait long 'periodic table'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany.

Tok Pisin: Ol i yusim ol 'crossties' pastaim long holim ol dispela 'track' i stap long wanpela ples. Bihain, nau, ol i luksave olsem ol dispela 'track' bai kamap gutpela moa sapos ol i gat wanpela hap ain i stap antap long ol.
English: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.

English: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela man Filipino husat i bin wok olsem wanpela polis bipo i holimpasim ol turis bilong Hongkong taim em i kisim bas bilong ol long Manila, dispela bikpela siti bilong Philippines.
English: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
Tok Pisin: Maski dispela em i wanpela 'stereotype' we i no stret, nambawan we long stap long Paris em long mekim ol gutpela pasin, ekt olsem wanpela man o meri husat i "bien élevé" (papamama bilong em i skulim em gut). Em bai mekim isi long i go i kam long Paris.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Europe em i wanpela kontinen (continent) we i liklik, tasol em i gat planti indipenden kantri. Planti taim, long raun i go long planti kantri em bai min olsem yu bai go insait long planti 'visa application' na 'passport control' moa long wanpela taim.
English: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

Tok Pisin: Biahin long ol risalt i kam autsait, Gingrich i apim nem bilong Santorum, tasol em i gat ol strongpela toktok long Romney, husat i bin mekim ol negatif kempen edvetismen (campaign advertisment) long Gingrich long Iowa.

English: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
Tok Pisin: Maski wanwan kantri em i bin 'Scandinavian', i gat planti samting i narakain namel long ol manmeri, ol king, ol kastom na histori bilong Denmark, Sweden, Norway na Iceland.
English: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.
Tok Pisin: Wanwan tempel i gat wanpela ples bilong sindaun autsait na i gat ples insait we ol pris tasol i ken i go insait.

Tok Pisin: Ol sios we i save bihainim pasin bilong lotu long bipo i save holim wanpela Easter Vigil long Sarere nai long Easter wiken, i gat ol manmeri bilong lotu i save i kam bung na ol i save mekim selebresen (celebration) long biknait i pinis na moning i kamap long amamas long Krais i kirap long dai.

Tok Pisin: Apia em ol i bin kamapim em long 1850s na em i bin nambawan kapitol bilong Samoa stat long 1959 i kam inap nau.

Tok Pisin: Maski planti bilong ol kaiki bilong ol em mipela i ken save, ol Rom i gat ol kaikai we yumi i no save long en o ol save yusim long taim bilong bikpela bung kaikai, wanpela em wel pik, 'peacock', 'snail', na wanpela kain rat ol i kolim 'dormouse'.
English: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.

Tok Pisin: Dispela wok em ol i wokim long kamapim sampela as tingting, tasol ol i bin raitim dispela progrem long soim ol samting we ol i bin lukim long Sagittarius 'galaxy'.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'observatory' bilong taim bipo em ol i no yusim moa long tude, na nau ol i stap olsem ol 'museum', o ples bilong edukesen.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
Tok Pisin: Long planti narapela siti bilong Italy na long olgeta hap bilong graun, bikpela moa long Poland, ol i mekim ol wankain 'setup', na planti manmeri i lukim dispela funerel (funeral).
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.

Tok Pisin: Ol buk na megasin we i toktok long pasin bilong stap long ples nating i save stap long planti hap, tasol i no gat planti pablikesen we i save toktok long ol 'war zone'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti ol samting i kamap long 'society' na 'politics' kain olsem pasin bilong yusim 'metric system'. na senis long 'absolutism' i go long 'republicanism', na pasin bilong 'nationalism' na bilip long kantri em i samting bilong ol manmeri na i no bilong wanpela man tasol we i bosim ol.
English: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i planti ol lain i lusim skul i wok long mekim, dispela em i mekim ol i kisim wanpela yia long malolo bipo long ol i go long univesiti, na ol i no stopim skul bilong ol.
English: There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti French wain long dring, tasol ol wain bilong New Zealand na Australia em i isi moa long kisim ol.
English: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).
Tok Pisin: Yusim ol blog long gutpela na stretpela we "i ken mekim ol sumatin i ken skelim ol samting na save long wanem samting i no stret na wanem we bilong stret; taim ol wok wantaim ol meteriel long Internet, ol sumatin i ken save long wanem mak ol i stap long en taim ol skelim samting we ol narapela i raitim na tu ol i ken givim tingting bilong ol long ol samting we i wok long kamap (Oravec, 2002).
English: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
Tok Pisin: I gat tredisen (tradition) i bilong no ken slip long Easter nait na stap long wanpela ples klia long lukim san i kirap.

label: Ol 'cruise' i go long Saint Petersburg i save givim taim long raun long taun. Ol pasindia bilong 'cruise' i no nid long karim visa (lukim ol 'terms').

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim bai i gat skul fi long enrol long ol dispela edukesen progrem.

Tok Pisin: Long ol yia insait long 1980 em i bin wok long ol 'show' kain olsem Taxi, Cheers, na The Tracy Ullman Show.
English: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
Tok Pisin: Ol i tok olsem em i gat 20 samting krismas. Long wanpela tok save bilong Bieber, em i tok olsem "maski mi i no stap long dispela ples na mi no i stap insait long dispela eksiden, ol tingting na prea bilong mi i stap wantaim ol famili bilong dispela man husat i dai."
English: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken yusim boda-boda (motobaik teksi) long raun insait long Goma. Lokel prais bilong dispela em i ~500 Congolese Francs long ron long sotpela hap.

Tok Pisin: South Africa em i nambawan tim insait long dispela tonamen (tournament) na em i stat gut taim em i winim tim bilong Zambia we i stap namba 5 insait long tonamen 26 - 00.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
Tok Pisin: Ancient China i gat wanpela narakain we bilong soim ol kainkain time; wanwan 'stage' bilong China o wanwan famili we i holim pawa em i wanpela 'dynasty'.
English: The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain we i save kisim foto long kamera i kisim ples bilong wanpela bikmeri long wanem em i laik go long toilet. Ol i sutim Mendoza long gan na em i dai.
English: During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time.
Tok Pisin: Long taim bilong 'blizzard', inap sno (snow) we i ken mekim yu i pas i ken pundaun long sotpela taim tasol.

Tok Pisin: Curtis Cooper, wanpela 'mathematician' na 'computer science professor' long University of Central Missouri, i bin painimaut olsem bikpela 'prime number' tru long Jenueri 25.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu no save long draiv long ol rot autsait long siti, yu mas strongim yu yet: i gat ol ples we i sut i go daun o i kam antap, i gat ol liklik rot we i no gat spes long ron, na ol sap kona.
English: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
Tok Pisin: Izmir em i namba tri bikpela siti insait long Turkey wantaim wanpela populesen long kain olsem 3.7 milien, namba tu bikpela port bihainim long Istanbul, na em i wanpela bikpela senta bilong trenspot (transport).
English: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem oll 'comet' i bin kisim wanpela sampela samting we i kamapim wara graun wantaim ol narapela 'organic matter' we i ken kamapim ol 'protein' na sapotim laip.
English: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
Tok Pisin: Adekoya i bin stap long Edinburgh Sheriff Court na ol i sasim wm long kilim pikinini man bilong em.
English: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela kaikai bilong avinun we planti lain i save laikim, em ol i save laikim long mekim long taim bilong sama (summer), em i Pa amb Oli: Bret wantaim 'olive oil', tomato, na wanem samting i stap bilong givim fleiva kain olsem 'cheese', tuna pis na kain olsem.

English: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
Tok Pisin: Hamilton i tokaut olsem tru tru Howard University Hospital i kisim dispela sikman na em i stap long gutpela kondisen.
English: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.
Tok Pisin: Long yia 2002, hotpela paia bilong volkeno Nyiragongo i bin bagarapim Goma na karamapim planti bilong ol rot bilong dispela taun, dispela i kamap bikpela tru long namel bilong taun.
English: Due to the cluster/group of islands Japan has, Japan is often referred to, on a geographical stance, as an "archipelago"
Tok Pisin: Bikos long grup bilong ol ailan we Japan i gat, ol laini save kolim Japan olsem, long sait bilong 'geography', em i wanpela "'archipelago'"
English: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.
Tok Pisin: 'National football' bilong Italy, wantaim 'national football' tim bilong Germany em tupela namba tu tim we i gutpela tru insait long olgeta hap bilong graun na ol i bin sempion bilong FIFA World Cup long 2006.
English: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
Tok Pisin: Ol piksa we ol i kisim wantaim 'infrared' lait i soim olsem senis we i kamap long temprita (temperature) long de na nait i soim olsem dispela ol ples em ol hul bilong ston.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.

English: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol man i kam long Galapagos, planti 'mammal' we ol i bin kisim i kam em meme, hos, kau, rat, pusi na dok.
English: Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'winter sport' em planti lain long ol 'Northern regions' i save long en, na ol lain long Italy i save pilai insait long ol intanesinel geim (game) na ol Olympic events.
English: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela kos bai stap long 2-5-pela de na bai i gat 'role play', planti 'first aid' na sampela treining bilong ol samting bilong pait.

Tok Pisin: Chaco rijen i gat ol narapela grup bilong ol asples manmeri kain olsem ol Guaycurú na Payaguá, husat i save painim abus, pis na bungim ol kaikai ol i painim long bus.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
Tok Pisin: Cochamó Valley -nambawan hap bilong mekim 'climbing' long Chile, em ol kolim Yosemite of South America, em i gat ol kainkain bikpela 'granite wall' na 'crag'.
English: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
Tok Pisin: Del Potro i bin gat sans pastaim insait long namba tu 'set', tasol dispela tu em i nidim wanpela 'tie break' taim i kamap 6-6.
English: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
Tok Pisin: Nuclear agency bilong Japan i tok olsem, ol i painimaut olsem i gat 'radioactive caesium' na 'iodine' long dispela diwai.
English: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'foster care' i sapos long givim olgeta samting we ol i no bin gat long haus we ol i kisim ol long en.

Tok Pisin: Long 1683, ol soldia bilong Qing dynasty (1644-1912) i holimpasim na kisim 'western' na 'northern' nambis eria bilong Taiwan na tokaut olsem Taiwan em i wanpela provins bilong Qing Empire long 1885.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
Tok Pisin: Bilong wanem na ol 'transportation system' i save kamapim ol dispela kain komplen, bilong wanem na ol i no save wok gut long olgeta de? Ol 'transportation engineer' i no save long mekim wok bilong ol? O, i gat samting we i bikpela moa i wok long kamap?
English: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
Tok Pisin: "Mipela bai wok hat strong long daunim namba bilong 'carbon dioxide' we i save kamap long wanpela 'unit' bilong GDP long wanpela bikpela mak long yia 2020 long mak we em i bin i stap long en long yia 2005," Hu i tok.
English: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.
Tok Pisin: Tingim olsem maski musik long ol bikpela hap bilong bikde em i pinis, i gat sampela seksen bilong bikde we ol bai pilai musik i go inap long biknait.
English: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
Tok Pisin: Husat lain i mekim plen long go long wanpela kantri we woa i save kamap lng en i mas kisim treining (training) i kam long ol profesenol.
English: Before an organization can be innovative, leadership must create a culture of innovation as well as shared knowledge and organizational learning.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long wanpela oganaisesen i ken i gat ol nupela na narapela kain we bilong mekim samting, ol lida i mas kamapim wanpela kalsa bilong kamapim ol nupela na narapela kain samting na tu, i mas i gat pasin bilong serim save na lainim samting wantaim.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

label: Wanpela 'safari' bilong wokabaut (ol i save kolim tu olsem wanpela "'bush walk'", "hiking safari", o 'going "'footing'") em i pasin bilong wokabaut, long sampela aua o long sampela de.
predictions: Wanpela 'walking safari' (o 'bush walk', 'hiking safari', o 'footing') i gat wanpela 'hiking', o tasol long olgeta aua o tasol long planti de.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).

English: All these things and more highlight Ontario as what is considered quintessentially Canadian by outsiders.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain long autsait i tok olsem olgeta dispela samting na sampela moa i soim Ontario olsem em i ples we i soim tru tru kala bilong Canada.

Tok Pisin: Dispela namba bilong ol manmeri we i stap long dispela taim em i bikpela tru olsem na olgeta lain i no inap long go insait long dispela funerel we i wok long kamap insait long St. Peter's Square.
English: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Argentina is well known for having one of the best polo teams and players in the world.

English: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
Tok Pisin: Chambers, wanpela man we i no bilip long God, i tok pait olsem kot pepa bilong bilong em, em i "no bikpela samting" na "olgeta man i ken kisim narapela i go long kot."
English: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i laspela geim (game) bilong ol All Blacks, husat i bin winim pinis dispela 'trophy' long tupela wik i go pinis.

English: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, yu mas sekim olsem yu kolim 'r' na 'rr' narakain: 'caro' em i min olsem dia, na 'carro' em i min olsem 'chariot'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
Tok Pisin: Murray i lusim namba wan 'set' bilong em insait long wanpela 'tie breal' taim tupela man wantaim i kisim olgeta 'serve' insait long dispela 'set'.
English: Saltwater Crocodiles do not actively live in the ocean, their primary habitat is in river estuaries north from Rockhampton.
Tok Pisin: Saltwater Crocodiles i no save stap long solwara olgeta taim, nambawan ples bilong ol long i stap em long ol maus wara we i stap long hap not long Rockhampton.
English: The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sultan' bilong Morocco i bildim dispela siti gen olsem Daru l-Badya na ol treida (trader) bilong Spain i kolim em olsem Casablanca taim ol i mekim ol senta bilong ol long hap.
English: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
Tok Pisin: Ol piksa we ol i kisim wantaim 'infrared' lait i soim olsem senis we i kamap long temprita (temperature) long de na nait i soim olsem dispela ol ples em ol hul bilong ston.
English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong flai long balus em i ken wanpela ekspiriens wei mekim ol manmeri i gat kainkain krismas na i kam long kainkain ples i pret, bikpela moa em sapos ol i no bin flai bipo o i bin stap insait long wanpela samting nogut we i kamap long balus bipo.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Sapos yu bin makim taim bilong flai na ples bilong stap long 2020 bipo long ol i tokaut olsem ol i senisim taim, yu bai i stap long wanpela hatpela taim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast.
Tok Pisin: Ol Sundarbans em ol nambawan bikpela 'littoral mangrove belt' long olgeta hap bilong graun, sais bilong ol em i 80 km (50 mi) i go insait long Bangladeshi na ples i stap insait tru long India longwe long nambis.
English: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
Tok Pisin: Moa long wan tausen yia, dispela lotu bilong ol Kristen i bin bungim ol kantri bilong Europe wantaim, maski ol i gat wanwan tok ples na kastom bilong ol yet.
English: Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
Tok Pisin: Sampela 'atom' i gat 'unstable nuclei' na dispela em i min olsem ol i save bruk taim yu tasim liklik o i no tasim.
English: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'controller' i luk olsem wanpela 'remote controller' bilong televisen, dispela 'controller' i yusim tupela 'sensors' we i stap klostu long teleiven bilong dispela 'user' long mekim 'trangulate' long 'three dimensional space'.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'high winds', 'excessive precipitation', na 'wildfire' em ol sampela samtinng i ken kamap bikos long weda (weather) nogut, wankain tu em ol 'thunderstorm', 'tornado', 'waterspout', na 'cyclone'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol polisi bilong kenselim (cancel) ol samting i no wankain, tasol stat long pinis bilong Mas planti bilong ol polisi bilong kenselim ol samting we i kamap long koronavaires i no surik i go long Julai 2020, taim ol i bin makim Olympics long kamap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The term bug is used by entomologists in a formal sense for this group of insects.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'bug' em ol entomolojist (entomologist) i save yusim long toktok long dispela grup bilong ol binatang.
English: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
Tok Pisin: Ol pasin bilong ol lain long Paris bai senis hariap tru sapos yu soim sampela gutpela pasin.
English: Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
Tok Pisin: Israel i laikim olsem i mas i gat ol militeri (military) i stap long veli long tenpela yia taim ol i sainim dispela agrimen na PA i wanbel long lusim dispela kain pasin bilong yusim militeri long faivpela yia tasol.
English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
Tok Pisin: As tingting bilong sains (science) em long painimaut wanem we dispela graun i wok taim ol yusim ol 'scientific method'. Dispela metod (method) i save stiaim planti bilong ol 'scientific research'.
English: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'rip currents' em ol tait bilong solwara we i bruk long nambis na i wok long kam bek, planti taim long wanpela rip o kain samting olsem.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol i tok olsem planti bilong ol tiket bai i stap namel long ¥2,500 na ¥130,000, olsem na mak bilong wanpela nomol tiket bai i kost olsem ¥7,000.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'subculture' i save mekim ol lain i gat wankain tingting na i pilim olsem ol stendet bilong 'society' i no bilong ol na taim ol i bung wantaim ol i kamapim wanpela 'identity' bilong ol yet.
English: It states that the most effective place for the main subject is at the intersection of lines dividing the image into thirds vertically and horizontally (see example).
Tok Pisin: Em i tok olsem gutpela ples bilong wanpela sabjek (subject) long i stap long taim bilong kisim foto em long ples we ol lain i brukim piksa i go long tripela hap 'vertically' na 'horizontally' (lukim eksampel).
English: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
Tok Pisin: Ol leta bilong tingim em 'c' na 'g', bikos 'pronunciation' bilong ol i save senis bihainim 'vowel' we i kam bihain long ol.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'high winds', 'excessive precipitation', na 'wildfire' em ol sampela samtinng i ken kamap bikos long weda (weather) nogut, wankain tu em ol 'thunderstorm', 'tornado', 'waterspout', na 'cyclone'.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Pasin bilong ainim (iron) ol wet klos i ken helpim ol long drai. Planti ol hotel i gat ain na bod bilong ain i stap bilong yusim, maski sapos wanpela ain i no i stap ples klia insait long rum.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
Tok Pisin: Long ol liklik ailan na ol raunwara, yu bai no inap nidim wanpela 'yatch'.
English: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, draiva bilong kar i kisim ol bikpela bagarap long het.

Tok Pisin: I go i go, na bihain long sampela tausen o milien yia, dispela tupela populesen bai luk narakain olgeta bai ol lain i no tok olsem ol i wanpela 'specie'.
English: These theories suggest that people have certain needs and/or desires which have been internalized as they mature to adulthood.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela 'theory' i tok olsem ol manmeri i gat sampela samting ol i nidim na laikim we i stap insait long ol taim ol i kamap bikpela.
English: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'medical charity' Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres na the World Health Organisation i tok olsem dispela em i 'outbreak' we i stap long mak nogut tru insait long dispela kantri.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
Tok Pisin: Em i no makim wanpela namba bilong mak we dispela bai i kam daun long en, na em i tok olsem ol bai mekim dispela bihainim hamas mani China i mekim.
English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
Tok Pisin: As tingting bilong sains (science) em long painimaut wanem we dispela graun i wok taim ol yusim ol 'scientific method'. Dispela metod (method) i save stiaim planti bilong ol 'scientific research'.
English: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
Tok Pisin: Long presentesen bilong Fonde long Tokyo Game show, presiden bilong Nintendo Satoru Iwata i presentim wanpela 'controller design' bilong kampani long nupela geim (game) bilong em Nintendo Revolution.
English: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'high winds', 'excessive precipitation', na 'wildfire' em ol sampela samtinng i ken kamap bikos long weda (weather) nogut, wankain tu em ol 'thunderstorm', 'tornado', 'waterspout', na 'cyclone'.

Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em i kam long Chain we ol i save lukluk long ol 'plum blossom'.
