messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'courier' kampani em ol i save baim ol gut long bringim ol samting hariap. Planti taim, em i impoten long mekim dispela wantaim ol dokumen bilong bisnis, ol 'merchandise' o 'spare parts' long mekim wanpela ripea (repair) hariap.
English: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday.
Tok Pisin: Sampela lain i bin yusim ol kainkain 'hardware' na 'software' long stat nilong Febueri long sekim sapos dispela em i stret na ol i tokaut long dispela long Tunde.
English: Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
Tok Pisin: Israel i laikim olsem i mas i gat ol militeri (military) i stap long veli long tenpela yia taim ol i sainim dispela agrimen na PA i wanbel long lusim dispela kain pasin bilong yusim militeri long faivpela yia tasol.
English: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
Tok Pisin: Long 1956 Slania i muv i go long Sweden, tripela yia bihain em i stat wok long Swedish Post Office na kamap olsem 'chief engraver' bilong ol.
English: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain Egypt i bildim long 'third century' BCE, Great Pyramid em i wanpela bilong ol bikpela pyramid straksa we ol i wokim long givim ona long wanpela Pharaoh we i dai pinis.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: I gat ol kainkain we bilong mekim wara i kamap 'pure', sampela i save mekim wok bilong daunim sampela kain samting we i ken kamapim hevi.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela trupela “'invisible team'” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) em i wanpela narakain samting i stap insait long ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa.
English: Out on the savanna, it is hard for a primate with a digestive system like that of humans to satisfy its amino-acid requirements from available plant resources.
Tok Pisin: Long 'savaana', em i hat long wanpela 'primate' we i gat wanpela 'digestive system' kain olsem bilong ol man long inapim ol 'amino-acid' long ol plent (plant) i stap long hap.
English: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, lukaut long ol smel we i save pulim ol bea na ol narapela animal, olsem na no ken karim o kukim kaikai we i gat strongpela smel na mekim kem i stap klin.
English: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead.
Tok Pisin: Long September 17, 1939, ol difens (defence) bilong ol Poland em i bruk, na wanpela samting tasol bilong mekim em long go bek na bung gen long 'bridgehead' bilong Romania.
English: Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far.
Tok Pisin: Ol i kisim bek sampela bilong ol lain we em i holimpasim i stap na sikspela bilong ol dispela lain em ol i dai.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long sampela eria boilim wara long wanpela minit em i inap, long ol narapela eria yu bai nid long boilim wara long sampela minit.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In 1884, Tesla moved to the United States of America to accept a job with the Edison Company in New York City.
Tok Pisin: Long 1884, Telsa i muv i go long United States of America long wok wantaim Edison Company long New York City.
English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
Tok Pisin: Chaco rijen i gat ol narapela grup bilong ol asples manmeri kain olsem ol Guaycurú na Payaguá, husat i save painim abus, pis na bungim ol kaikai ol i painim long bus.
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting bilong bipo we i soim ol dispela 'sewage system' em ol i bin painim ol long ol haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan bilong Crete na Santorini long Greece.
English: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
Tok Pisin: Ol i kisim dispela kar i go longwe long ples we eksiden i kamap long em long kain taim olsem 1200 GMT long dispela de yet.
English: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wil (wheel) i senisim graun long kainkain we. Bikpela samting tru we wil i mekim long yumi em i givim yumi isipela 'transportation' we i save muv hariap moa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'filter' em strong bilong wanwan i narakain, na yu mas tingting, bihaim yu mas tingting long baim wara long wanplela botol long wanpela gutpela kampani.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, em i luk olsem dispela hap tok ol i bin raitim bihain bai em i ken i stap olsem wanpela 'label'.
English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting we ol i tok orait long en em ol tingting bilong Aristotle long sains (science), wantaim saikoloji (psychology).
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.
English: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
Tok Pisin: I no gat planti lain i sindaun long Greenland. Long ol tumbuna stori bilong ol Norway, ol i tok olsem Erik the Red em ol i bin rausim em long Iceland bikos em i bin kilim wanpela man, na taim em i travel i go long wes, em i painim Greenland na em i givim dispela nem long en.
English: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
Tok Pisin: Maski, 'project based learning' i mekim pasin bilong lainim samting i kamap isi moa na i kirapim intres (interest), 'scaffolding' em i mekim moa samting.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

label: Ol 'pest' i ken bagarapim kaikai, mekim skin i skrap, o nogut moa ol i ken kamapim ol 'allergic reaction', spredim 'venom', o mekim sik i kalap long wanpela man i go long narapela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.
Tok Pisin: Long mun i go pinis, wanpela komisen (commission) bilong presiden i mekim rekomendesen (recommendation) olsem CEP bilong bipo i mas risain (resign) olsem wanpela hap wok bilong kantri i muv i go long ol nupela ileksen.
English: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bilong ol metod (method) we planti lain i save yusim long soim olsem 'socialization' em i impoten em ol i save yusim stori bilong ol pikinini we i bin 'socialized' bikos ol papamama i no bisi long ol, ol samting nogut i kamap long laip bilong ol, o ol lain i mekim nogut long ol taim ol i wok long gro.
English: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
Tok Pisin: Ol Safari em ating ol i nambawan samting we i save kisim ol turis i go long Africa na ol i bikpela samting long planti ol visita.
English: At the other end of the spectrum, one morphs into an unrecognizable individual that feels he or she must change everything the team has been doing and make it their own.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait, wanpela meneja i senis i go na kamap olsem wanpela man o meri we ol lain i bo save long em na em i pilim olsem em i mas senisim olgeta samting we tim i wok long mekim na mekim olgeta samting long strong bilong ol yet.
English: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol dispela plen (plan) i bagarap long dispela nait, moa long 800,000 soldia bilong Rrd Army bilong Soviet Union i go insait na i kamapim wanpela 'front' long Belarus na wanpela 'front' long Ukraine bihain long ol i go insait na holimpasim ol 'eastern region' bilong Poland na dispela pasin em i no bihaibim Riga Peace Treaty, Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, na ol narapela intanesinel agrimen (agreement) we i kamap namel long tupela kantri na tu, i kamap namel long planti narapela kantri.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
Tok Pisin: Em i no i stap em yet, 'experimentation', na wanpela 'experiment' em i wanpela 'test' ol save yusim long rausim wanpela o moa bilong ol tingting we ol i bin kamapim, pasin bilong askim ol kwesten, na mekim stadi tu i save givim stia long 'scientific research'.
English: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
Tok Pisin: Schengen zone, em i narakain, sampela taim em i save stap olsem wanpela kantri bilong em yet.
English: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
Tok Pisin: Dispela hap tok 'safari' we planti lain i save yusim em i toktok long travel long graun long lukim ol narakain animal bilong Africa, planti bilong ol em ol animal bilong 'savanna'.
English: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save yusim wanpela jaient 'rocket' we longpela bilong em i winim 100 'feet' long putim wanpela 'telescope' long 'space'.
English: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
Tok Pisin: Ol gem i stat long 10:00am wantaim gutpela weda na maski i bin i gat liklik ren long moning, em i pinis hariap, dispela de em i gutpela tru long pilai ragbi 7's.

English: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol travela we i go long kantri we i gat bikpela takis sampela taim ol i ken seivim (save) bikpela mani, ol i ken seivim long ol prodak taim olsem ol 'alcoholic beverages' na 'tobacco'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
Tok Pisin: Dispela pasin em planti lain i save mekim, tasol em i kamapim 'wear' long plang wil bilong ol 'wagon'.
English: Twentieth century research has shown that there are two pools of genetic variation: hidden and expressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol risets i kamap long 'Twentieth century' i bin soim olsem i gat tupela 'pool' bilong 'genetic variation': wanpela em i hait na wanpela em i stap ples klia.
English: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
Tok Pisin: I bin no gat ol bikpela bus insait long graun bilong ol Canaan, olsem na plang em i ekspensif (expensive) tumas.

Tok Pisin: U.S President George W. Bush i kamap long Singapore long moning bilong Novemba 16, long statim wanpela wik we em bai i raun lukim Asia.

predictions: 'driving conditions' long ol 'Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway', pasim oltaim long ol 'isolated backwoods terrain'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Amazon em namba wan wara we namel bilong em i bikpela tru long Earth, na mak bilong namel bilong en em i sikspela 'mile'.

Tok Pisin: Long wankain taim, 'navy' bilong Germany, i yusim ol U-boat, na i wok long traim long stopim dispela long kamap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.

English: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.
Tok Pisin: Ol i save mekim planti raun i go long ol rip long olgeta taim insait long wanpela yia, na bagarap i kamap long bodi long ol dispela kain samting i save kamap wanwan taim tasol.
English: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
Tok Pisin: Narapela opsen (option) bilong 'biorhythm-based' em bai yu dringim planti wara (kain olsem wara o ti, wanpela 'diuretic') bipo long yu slip, dispela bai fosim yu long kirap na i go pispis.
English: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
Tok Pisin: Long hap, ol i painim bodi bilong Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, i karamap long ol blanket we blut i pas long en.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Tibetan Buddhism em i bihainim ol samting we Buddha i tisim, tasol ol i mekim em i go bikpela moa wantaim 'mahayana path of love' na tu wantaim planti ol teknik (technique) bilong Indian Yoga.
English: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela gutpela eksampel we i kamap i no longtaim em dispela kempen (campaign) bilong North Altlantic long WWII. Ol America i wok long traim long muvim ol kago na ol man long Atlantic Ocean long helpim ol Britain.
English: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
Tok Pisin: Adekoya i bin stap long Edinburgh Sheriff Court na ol i sasim wm long kilim pikinini man bilong em.
English: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'courier' kampani em ol i save baim ol gut long bringim ol samting hariap. Planti taim, em i impoten long mekim dispela wantaim ol dokumen bilong bisnis, ol 'merchandise' o 'spare parts' long mekim wanpela ripea (repair) hariap.
English: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela yia, wanpela man o meri we i sik wantaim dispela binatang i ken givim dispela sik i go long 10 o 15-pela lain we i save stap klostu long ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
Tok Pisin: Ol weda (weather) nogut bilong wanwan rijen o sisen em ol 'blizzard', 'snowstorm', 'ice storm', na 'dust storm'.
English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
Tok Pisin: Em i no samting bilong sem long en: em i no narakain long ol narapela samting ol manmeri i save pret long em na ol narapela samting ol planti manmeri i save les long en.
English: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong yusim vidio rekoding i mekim na ol saveman i painimaut long ol impoten samting long sait bilong mining bilong 'micro-expression', ol muvmen bilong pes we i save kamap insait long sampela 'millisecond'.
English: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".
Tok Pisin: Nambawan lokel bia em 'Number One', em i no wanpela narakain bia, tasol em i nais na i mekim man i pilim gut. Wanpela narapela lokel bia em i "Manta".
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting bilong bipo we i soim ol dispela 'sewage system' em ol i bin painim ol long ol haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan bilong Crete na Santorini long Greece.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
Tok Pisin: Yu mas lukaut long no ken larim laplap i kamap hot tumas (dispela i ken kamapim mekim klos i kamap liklik, o sapos em i hot tumas, klos bai i paia).
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.
English: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
Tok Pisin: Long 'twelfth century', velu (value) bilong em i go daun bikos ol Crusaders i bin kam bek na ol i karim ol presen kain olsem ol silk na spais. Velu bilong ol dispela samting i antap moa long velu bilong ol samting we i stap long ol maket bilong ol Byzantine.
English: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
Tok Pisin: "Mipela bai wok hat strong long daunim namba bilong 'carbon dioxide' we i save kamap long wanpela 'unit' bilong GDP long wanpela bikpela mak long yia 2020 long mak we em i bin i stap long en long yia 2005," Hu i tok.
English: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
Tok Pisin: Plis tingim olsem yu bai lukim wanpela bikpela matmat we ol i planim planti lain long en, tu dispela ples em i gat bikpela mining long planti manmeri long dispela graun.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Taim yu bin i go long narapela kantri long namba wan taim tru, yu bin isi na traim long lainim samting, yu save olsem ol travela i stap long narapela kantri i mas senisim tingting na pasin bilong ol.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'peacekeepers' bilong UN, husat i bin kam long Haiti bihain long bikpela guria bilong yia 2010, em ol lain i sutim tok long ol olsem ol i mekim dispela sik i go long ol manmeri na dispela sik i stat klostu long kem bilong ol.
English: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long sampela taim, dispela nupela populesen i stat long mekim senis na lainim long stap long nupela envairomen bilong ol, ol i stat long luk narakain liklik long narapela populesen.
English: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.
Tok Pisin: 'Up' em i min olsem yu mas stat long 'tip' na pusim 'bow', na 'down' em i min olsem yu mas stat long 'frog' (dispela em i ples we han bilong yu i holim 'bow') na pulim dispela 'bow'.
English: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
Tok Pisin: Taim wanpela liklik grup bilong ol animal (wanpela liklik namba) i lusim bikpela populesen (population) we ol i kam long en (sapos ol i muv i go antap long wanpela maunten o wanpela liklik wara, o saps ol i muv i go long wanpela nupela ailan na ol i painim hat long i go bek) ol bai lukim olsem ol i stap long wanpela narapela envairomen we i no wankain olsem bipo.
English: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
Tok Pisin: Danielle Lantagne, em i wanpela savemeri bilong UN long sait bilong sik, em i tok olsem dispela sik i mas stat wantaim ol 'peacekeepers'.

English: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.

Tok Pisin: Dispela park i karamapim 19,500 km² na em i bruk i go long 14-pela 'ecozone', wanwan bilong ol i sapotim narakain narakain 'wildlfie'.

English: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'scaffold' em ol i ken kamap long komputa o em i ken tru insait long klasrum, narapela we bilong tok em i olsem, wanpela tisa em wanpela 'scaffold', tasol wanpela 'paperclip man' insait long Microsoft Office em tu i wanpela 'scaffold'.

Tok Pisin: "'Thermal behavior' bilong ol i no stap wankain olsem ol bikpela hul bilong ston long Earth we i save i gat wanpela kain tempritsa (temperature), tasol ol i stap wankain olsem tempritsa bilong ol dip hol i stap long graun," Glen Cushing bilong United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team na bilong Northern Arizona University we i stap long Flagstaff, Arizona i tok.
English: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong makim spes bipo long travela i go long dispela ples bai mekim tingting bilong ol i stap isi olsem ol bai gat sampela hap bilong slip taim ol i kamap long hap.

Tok Pisin: Ol polis i tok, i luk olsem dispela bodi i stap insait long hap long kain olsem wanpela de.

Tok Pisin: Dispela 'show' em pastaim em ol 'voice actor' we i no gat planti save na ekspiriens (experience) i ektim, na ol i bilong East Texas.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.

Tok Pisin: Dispela guria i stap namel long 20 km (15 'miles) long 'north-northeast' bilong Dillion, na kain olsem 65 km (40 'miles') saut long Butte.
English: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
Tok Pisin: Long sampela manmeri, pasin bilong klia gut long wanem wanpela balus i save wok na wanem samting i save kamap taim balus i ron i ken helpim ol long daunim ol pret we i save kamap long ol samting we ol i no save long en o ol i pilim olsem ol i no kontrolim.
English: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
Tok Pisin: Ol i painimaut olsem Sun i save ol wankain bikpela tingting olsem ol narapela sta: Dispela ektiviti bilong olgeta sta long sistem em ol i painimaut olsem 'luminosity' na 'rotation' bilong ol i save mekim ol i tanim tanim, na i no gat narapela samting gen.

Tok Pisin: Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) bilong Japan i tok olsem em i bin save long 27-pela eksiden we i kamap bikos long dispela divais (device).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu no save long draiv long ol rot autsait long siti, yu mas strongim yu yet: i gat ol ples we i sut i go daun o i kam antap, i gat ol liklik rot we i no gat spes long ron, na ol sap kona.
English: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.
Tok Pisin: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard i tok olsem long taim bilong kempen (campaign) long 2010 ileksen bilong gavman em i bilip olsem Australia i mas kamap olsem wanpela 'republic' taim Queen Elizabeth II i pinis long bosim kantri bilong ol.
English: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
Tok Pisin: Ol liklik ailan long solwara na nambawan bikpela raunwara i inap long wanpela 'yatch' o liklik bot o 'kayak' we i ken givim ol narapela we bilong kisim amamas.
English: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
Tok Pisin: No gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami i bin kamap, na 'geophysics agency' bilong Jakarta i tok olsem, no gat tok lukaut bilong tsunami bai i kamap bikos dispela guria i no kamap long mak bilong 6.5 we i mak bilong givim tok lukaut bilong tsunami.
English: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
Tok Pisin: 'Skiing' em i wanpela ektiviti bilong raun we ol lain i save laik long mekim, ol i kolim "'ski bums'," ol i save plenim holide bilong ol long mekim 'skiing' long wanpela lokesen.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: If you find yourself resetting the clock in your sleep, it can be placed on the other side of the room, forcing you to get out of bed to turn it off.
Tok Pisin: Sapos yu lukim olsem yu mekim 'reset' long kilok namel long slip bilong yu, yu ken putim em long narapela sait bilong rum, dispela em bai mekim yu i kirap long bed long i go ofim em.

Tok Pisin: Dispela bris em ol i makim taim bilong em long op long Septemba 2017, taim ol i pinisim ol 'customs checkpoints' bilong ol Brazil.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
Tok Pisin: I gat ol planti 'fruit pastry', na i gat ol epol we ol i wokim 'pastry' long en i save stap long olgeta taim bilong yia, na ol 'cherry pastry' na 'plum pastry' em ol i save mekim long taim bilong sama (summer).
English: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti ol samting i kamap long 'society' na 'politics' kain olsem pasin bilong yusim 'metric system'. na senis long 'absolutism' i go long 'republicanism', na pasin bilong 'nationalism' na bilip long kantri em i samting bilong ol manmeri na i no bilong wanpela man tasol we i bosim ol.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
Tok Pisin: Planti manmeri i no ting olsem pasin bilong i stap isi na lainim samting em impoten long ol travela (traveller) taim ol i kam bek gen long haus bilong ol.
English: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
Tok Pisin: Germany em i stap olsem birua bilong planti lain long World War 2, dispela i mekim na wok bung i kamap namel long USSR na USA. Taim woa i pinis, bam i kamap namel long ol sistem, ol proses (process) na kalsa na dispela i mekim ol kantri i no wok wantaim.
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting bilong bipo we i soim ol dispela 'sewage system' em ol i bin painim ol long ol haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan bilong Crete na Santorini long Greece.
English: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i go pas long risets i lukim olsem ol dispela 'crystal' i kamap insait long pispis bilong pusi taim ol i putim 'melamine' na 'cyanuric acid'.
English: For example, each year students from Bennet School in North Carolina design a website about their trip to the State Capital, each year the website gets remodeled, but old versions are kept online to serve as a scrapbook.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, long wanwan yia ol sumatin long Bennet School long North Carolina i save disainim wanpela websait long raun bilong ol i go long State Capital, na long wanwan yia dispela websait i kisim nupela stail, tasol ol olpela 'version' i save stap yet 'online' olsem wanpela 'scrapebook'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.

English: It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World.
Tok Pisin: Em i bin wanpela ples we PBS progrem bilong Henry Louis Gates' Wonders of the African World i mekim wanpela bikpela stop na lukluk long en.

Tok Pisin: Giza Plateau, o "Giza Necropolis" insait long Valley of the Dead bilong Egypt i gat sampela pyramid (bikpela tru long olgeta em 'great pyramid'), sampela liklik 'tomb', sampela tempel, na 'great Sphinx'.
English: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'monastery' i save givim ol laplap long ol meri we i no redi na i kam, tasol sapos yu bringim laplap bilong yu, gutpela moa long bringim wanpela we i gat ol brait (bright) kala, yu bai kisim wanpela smail long wanpela 'monk' o wanpela 'nun' long dua bilong go insait.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
Tok Pisin: Bos bilong 'shuttle' progrem bilong NASA N. Wayne Hale Jr. i tok olsem ol 'foam' i bin pundaun "bihain long taim we mipela i wok long tingting planti long en."

Tok Pisin: Bipo long The Simpsons Simon i bin wok long kainkain posisen bilong ol sampela 'show'.

Tok Pisin: Ol i painimaut olsem Sun i save ol wankain bikpela tingting olsem ol narapela sta: Dispela ektiviti bilong olgeta sta long sistem em ol i painimaut olsem 'luminosity' na 'rotation' bilong ol i save mekim ol i tanim tanim, na i no gat narapela samting gen.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.
Tok Pisin: Long mun i go pinis, wanpela komisen (commission) bilong presiden i mekim rekomendesen (recommendation) olsem CEP bilong bipo i mas risain (resign) olsem wanpela hap wok bilong kantri i muv i go long ol nupela ileksen.
English: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany.
Tok Pisin: Insait long tupela wik tasol ol soldia bilong America na ol Free French i mekim hap saut bilong France i kamap fri na ol i wok long i go long Germany.
English: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.
Tok Pisin: Romanticicm i bin gat wanpela bikpela hap tingting bilong 'cultural determinism' insait long em, dispela tingting em i kam long 'writer' olsem Goethe, Fichte, na Schlegel.

Tok Pisin: Yu ken yusim ol British pound long olgeta hap bilong ailan na insait long ol Stanley credit cards na tu ol yu ken yusim United States dollar.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long Congress i kisim dispela pepa long Julai 4, wanpela kopi we ol i raitim long han na President of Congress John Hancock na Secretary Charles Thomson tupela i sainim, ol i salim i go long wanpela 'printing shop' bilong John Dunlop we i stap klostu.
English: Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately.
Tok Pisin: Oliver Sacks, insait long pepa we em i raitim The President's Speech, em i soim hau olsem manmeri i no inap long klia gut long mining bilong toktok bikos ol i gat sampela bagarap i kamap long brein (brain) bilong ol tasol ol i klia stret sapos man em i tok tru.
English: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
Tok Pisin: Em i tok moa olsem "ol i mas no ken askim ol long mekim ol wok we i antap moa long mak bilong divelopmen we ol i stap long em, mak bilong wok ol inap long mekim, na mak bilong save ol i gat."
English: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
Tok Pisin: Long 1976, em i givim edvais long Carter long 'foreign policy', na bihain em i kisim ples bilong Henry Kissinger na wok olsem National Security Advisor (NSA) long yia 1977 i go long 1981.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
Tok Pisin: No gat ripot i kamap yet long ol bagarap i go kamap long United States Geological Survey (USGS) na National Earthquake Information Center bilong em.

Tok Pisin: Dispela tupela 'compound' i save 'react' wantaim long kamapim ol 'crystal' we i ken blokim kidni long mekim wok bilong em, ol lain i go pas long risets long univesiti i tok.

Tok Pisin: Dispela em i gutpela sans bilong lukim Aurora borealis, taim skai bai tudak long klostu olgeta aua long kilok.
English: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
Tok Pisin: Dispela bai mekim ol pleiya (player) i ken kontrolim ol eksen na muvmen insait long ol 'video game' taim ol muv.

Tok Pisin: Pasin na tingting bilong ol lain long Europe na 'colonialism' i stat long '15th century', taim eksplora (explorer) bilong Portugal Vasco de Gama i painim Cape Route taim em i stap long Europe na i go long India.

English: For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995).

English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.

English: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'travel agent' i save givim ol offer' we i gat brekfas (breakfast), kar bilong kisim yu i go i kam long eapot o bungim tu ol prais bilong balus tiket na prais bilong hotel.
English: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong stilim ol samting long kainkain hap i kontinu (continue) long nait i kam inap long moning, na ol ofisa bilong lo i no stap long ol han rot bilong Bishkek.
English: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
Tok Pisin: 'Light pollution' i no bin wanpela problem long mak we em i stap long en tude, ol i save stap long ol siti o long ol skul, na i isi long go long en na i no olsem ol dispela we ol i bildim long tude.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
Tok Pisin: Perry i tok olsem em bai "go bek long Texas long skelim ol risalt bilong miting bilong dispela nait, na skelim sapos i gat rot i stap bilong mi long dispela resis", tasol bihain em i tok olsem em bai i stap insait log dispela resis na resis long Jenueri 21 South Carolina primary.
English: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.
Tok Pisin: Hershey na Chase i bin yusim 'phages', o ol vaires (virus), long putim DNA bilong ol yet i go insait long wanpela 'bacterium'.

Tok Pisin: Stat long taim ol i kamapim Asunción long 1537, Paraguay i bin larim planti bilong ol pasin na kalsa bilong ol asples grup i stap yet.
English: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks).

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Ol i stopim ol raun bilong ol bihain long 'lead singer' bilong ol Steven Tyler i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong em taim em i pundaun i kamdaun long 'stage' taim em i wok long singsing long Ogas 5.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.

English: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.
Tok Pisin: Sapos ol i brukim Northern Baltic long winta (winter), sekim lokesen bilong 'cabin', bikos taim em i go namel long ais em i kamap wanpela bikpela nois long ol hap we i bamim ais.

Tok Pisin: Em i kamap long US wantaim 4 cents, wanpela 'poetry' buk, na wanpela leta bilong rekomendesen i kam long Charles Batchelor (meneja bilong em long wok em i bin mekim bipo) i go long Thomas Edison.
English: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela gutpela 'athlete', taiga i ken klaim (em i no save klaim gut tumas), swim, kalap long bikpela mak na pulim ol samting wantaim strong we i faivpela taim moa long strong bilong man.
English: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela taim wanpela man insait long ol bikpela lain manmeri i apim na soim het bilong wanpela 'royal guard' we ol i bin kilim long Versailles long fran bilong Queen na em i pret nogut tru.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
Tok Pisin: Moldova em i wanpela 'republic' we i gat kainkain hauslain we i bin kisim taim nogut long kros na pait i kamap namel long ol hauslain.
English: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long sampela taim, dispela nupela populesen i stat long mekim senis na lainim long stap long nupela envairomen bilong ol, ol i stat long luk narakain liklik long narapela populesen.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
English: Everything in the Universe is made of matter. All matter is made of tiny particles called atoms.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta samting insait long Universe em ol i kamap long 'matter'. Olgeta 'matter' i gat ol liklik samting insait long ol we ol i kolim 'atom'.
English: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
Tok Pisin: Long sampela eria boilim wara long wanpela minit em i inap, long ol narapela eria yu bai nid long boilim wara long sampela minit.

English: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Yu ken lukim ol 'pyramid' long tudak na yu ken lukim ol tu bipo long 'show' i stat.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.
Tok Pisin: Long mekim 'traffic flow' i kamap gutpela moa, ol rilesensip i mas kamap namel long tripela bikpela samting: (1) 'flow', (2) 'density', and (3) 'velocity'.
English: In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly.
Tok Pisin: Bikpela moa, ol i tok olsem yumi i ken painimaut sapos wanpela man o meri i giaman taim yumi painimaut mining bilong 'micro-expression' bilong em long stretpela we.

English: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela we tasol bilong salim samting hariap em long salim em olsem wanpela 'checked luggage', Ol lo bilong 'airline' bai i no inap long ol bek we i no gat pasindia, na dispela hap em yu bai helpim.
English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i min olsem yu ken lukim siti we i gat histori bilong en long sampela de taim yu kam bek long nait na slip long sip.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Em i is long lukim olsem graun i senis tru bikos long ol nupela save bilong sains (science) na teknoloji (technology), na ol problem i wok long kamap bikpela bikos long planti manmeri na laipstail bilong manmeri long i gat ol kainkain bikpela samting.
English: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.
Tok Pisin: Aninit long ol em ol namel sais pusi we i save kaikai ol namel sais abus stat long rebit (rabbit) i go long entelop (antelope) na dia (deer).
English: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
Tok Pisin: 'Backpacking by ski': Dispela ektiviti em ol i save kolim tu olsem 'backcountry ski', 'ski touring' o 'ski hiking'.
English: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela we tasol bilong salim samting hariap em long salim em olsem wanpela 'checked luggage', Ol lo bilong 'airline' bai i no inap long ol bek we i no gat pasindia, na dispela hap em yu bai helpim.
English: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol i save yusim tok ples Spanish long ol pablik trenspot na ol narapela hap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The job of navies has traditionally been to ensure that your country maintains the ability to move your people and goods, while at the same time, interfering with your enemy's ability to move his people and goods.
Tok Pisin: Wok bilong ol 'navy' em i bilong lukim olsem kantri bilong yu em i inap long muvin ol kago na manmeri, na tu, stopim ol birua long muvim ol kago na ol manmeri bilong em.
English: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.
Tok Pisin: 34 pesen (percent) bilong ol lain insait long dispela 'poll' i gat dispela tingting, we ol i laik olsem Queen Elizabeth II i mas kamap laspela kwin bilong Australia.
English: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long Congress i kisim dispela pepa long Julai 4, wanpela kopi we ol i raitim long han na President of Congress John Hancock na Secretary Charles Thomson tupela i sainim, ol i salim i go long wanpela 'printing shop' bilong John Dunlop we i stap klostu.
English: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
Tok Pisin: Long 'twelfth century', velu (value) bilong em i go daun bikos ol Crusaders i bin kam bek na ol i karim ol presen kain olsem ol silk na spais. Velu bilong ol dispela samting i antap moa long velu bilong ol samting we i stap long ol maket bilong ol Byzantine.
English: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i soim olsem tru tru sampela bilong ol dinaso i gat gras bilong pisin, wanpela tingting we planti lain i gat, tasol dispela i givim ol infomesen we ol fosil i no inap long givim, kain olsem kala na 'three dimensional arrangement'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol wanwan hap bilong stori em ol i soim antap long o 'pyramid' na ol i save mekim lait i kamap long ol kainkain 'pyramid'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'satellite' em wanpela 'rocket' i bin salim i go long 'space'. Ol saintis i yusim ol 'telescope' long 'space' bikos 'atmosphere' bilong Earth i save tanim sampela bilong ol lait bilong yumi na hau yumi lukim ol samting.
English: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
Tok Pisin: I no gat as bilong askim long diskaun prais long bisnis klas o namba wan klas long ol 'direct flights', long wanpela ples i go long narapela ples.
English: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
Tok Pisin: Ol piksa we ol i kisim wantaim 'infrared' lait i soim olsem senis we i kamap long temprita (temperature) long de na nait i soim olsem dispela ol ples em ol hul bilong ston.
English: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta 'noun', we i stap wantaim dispela wod Sie bilong yu, ol i save stat wantaim wanpela kapitol leta, maski em i stap insait long namel bilong sentens (sentence).
English: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'Article' i nidim ol lain long tok orait long olgeta 'state' bipo long ol i ken mekim senis na ol 'state' i kisim 'central government' olsem na ol lain we ol i makim i no save stap.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
Tok Pisin:"}]

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Science’s main goal is to figure out the way the world works through the scientific method. This method in fact guides most scientific research.
Tok Pisin: As tingting bilong sains (science) em long painimaut wanem we dispela graun i wok taim ol yusim ol 'scientific method'. Dispela metod (method) i save stiaim planti bilong ol 'scientific research'.
English: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
Tok Pisin: Dispela stori em ol i soim long 'opera' bilong France, we Camille Saint-Saens i raitim, em i stori bilong 'artist' "we laip bilong em i bihainim laikim bilong em long ol drag (drug) na Japan."
English: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
Tok Pisin: Namel long 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, ol kalabus lain i statim wanpela paia long autsait bilong kalabus bilding.
English: After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long Congress i kisim dispela pepa long Julai 4, wanpela kopi we ol i raitim long han na President of Congress John Hancock na Secretary Charles Thomson tupela i sainim, ol i salim i go long wanpela 'printing shop' bilong John Dunlop we i stap klostu.
English: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday.
Tok Pisin: Sampela lain i bin yusim ol kainkain 'hardware' na 'software' long stat nilong Febueri long sekim sapos dispela em i stret na ol i tokaut long dispela long Tunde.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, yu mas sekim olsem yu kolim 'r' na 'rr' narakain: 'caro' em i min olsem dia, na 'carro' em i min olsem 'chariot'.
English: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
Tok Pisin: 'Scaffolding' em i no wanpela metod (method) bilong lainim samting tasol em i wanpela helpim we i save givim sapot long ol wanwan sumatin husat i wok long lainim wanpela nupela samting kain olsem yusim wanpela nupela komputa o statim wanpela nupela projek (project).
English: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
Tok Pisin: USA Gymnastics i sapotim wanpela investigesen we i ken painimaut long wanem we pasin bilong bagarapim narapela man o meri i kamap long dispela kain mak long longpela taim na nau ol lain i bin kisim dispela kain hevi long Larry Nassar i tokaut long en na ol bai mekim ol senis we i gutpela na i stretpela.
English: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
Tok Pisin: Ol Wagonways em ol i bin bildim long England taim bipo long '16th Century'.
English: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
Tok Pisin: South Shetland Islands, em ol i bin painim em long 1819, na moa long wanpela kantri i bin kisim em na em i gat planti senta, sikstinpela i bin ektif (active) yet long yia 2020.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
Tok Pisin: Danius i tok, "Nau yet, mipela i no wok long mekim wanpela samting. Mi bin ring na salim ol i-meil long man i save wok wantaim em na mi bin kisim ol gutpela bekim na dispela em i inap."
English: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
Tok Pisin: Hap not bilong Sentinel Range i gat ol longpela maunten tru bilong Antarctica, Vinson Massif, na Mount Vinson we longpela bilong em i 4892 m.
English: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.
Tok Pisin: Ol insek em ol namba wan animal long stap long win. Dispela pasin bilong ol long flai i helpim ol long abrusim ol birua bilong ol na painim kaikai na pren bilong ol isi tru.
English: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
Tok Pisin: Long 'twelfth century', velu (value) bilong em i go daun bikos ol Crusaders i bin kam bek na ol i karim ol presen kain olsem ol silk na spais. Velu bilong ol dispela samting i antap moa long velu bilong ol samting we i stap long ol maket bilong ol Byzantine.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Sapos wanpela ain i no i stap, o sapos yu no tingting long werim soks we ol i ainim, orait yu ken traim yusim wanpela 'hairdryer', sapos em i stap.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela tritmen we i yusim ol 'antibody', nem bilong em ZMapp, i bin soim olsem em i ken oraitim sik, tasol bihain long ol stadi i kamap, ol i painimaut olsem em i no inap long banisim ol manmeri long i dai long rot we ol i bin tingim long en.

Sampela i 'specialize' long sait bilong kolektim ol wok bilong em tasol.

Tok Pisin: Ol blog i ken kisim helpim sumatin long rait gut. Planti taim ol sumatin i statim blog bilong ol wantaim 'grammar' na 'spelling' we i no gutpela, na taim i gat lain bai i ritim ol bai i senis na i rait gut moa.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.

Tok Pisin: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels i tok olsem "Luna i save mekim ol kainkain samting olsem mi…ating em i winim mi…laikim em na misim (miss) em…mi bilip olsem em i stap long gutpela ples."
English: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Dispela haus sik i bihainim rot bilong banisim ol yet long binatang nogut, na ol i putim dispela sikman longwe long ol narapela sikmanmeri long banisim em long givim dispela sik i go long narapela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Box jellyfish occur near beaches and near river estuaries from October to April north of 1770. They can occasionally be found outside these times.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'box jellyfish' i save kamap olgeta taim arere long nambis na arere long ol maus wara long Oktoba i go long Epril long hap nat long 1770. Sampela taim ol i ken kamap autsait long ol dispela taim.
English: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
Tok Pisin: Ol spit bilong 802.11n i spit moa long ol narapela 'frequecy' we i bin stap pastaim na 'maximum' mak bilong 'theoretical throughput' em 600Mbit/s.
English: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i wankain long Norway, Sweden na New Zealand, tasol em i narakain liklik (eksampel long Netherlands, dispela namba em i 40).
English: The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side.
Tok Pisin: 'Crust' bilong em i kain olsem 70 km 'thick' long sait i stap klostu na 100 km 'thick' long sait i stap longwe.
English: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
Tok Pisin: Pleiya (player) bilong Poland insait long 'men's visually impaired' Maciej Krezel na 'guide' bilong em Anna Ogarzynska i pinis long namba tetin ples insait long Super-G. Pleiya bilong South Korea Jong Seork Park i pinis long namba twenti-foa ples insait long 'men's sitting' long Super-G.

English: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
Tok Pisin: 'Flat white' kofi em i narakain samting long ol lain Australia. Wanpela 'short black' em i wanpela ' expresso', 'cappuccino' we i kam wantaim krim (i no 'froth'), na ol i no save mekim ti we i gat milk insait long en.
English: The job of navies has traditionally been to ensure that your country maintains the ability to move your people and goods, while at the same time, interfering with your enemy's ability to move his people and goods.
Tok Pisin: Wok bilong ol 'navy' em i bilong lukim olsem kantri bilong yu em i inap long muvin ol kago na manmeri, na tu, stopim ol birua long muvim ol kago na ol manmeri bilong em.

Tok Pisin: Ol lain i mekim risets long Princeton University long United States na Uppsala University long Sweden i mekim ripot long wanpela nupela 'specie' we i kamap insait long tupela generesen (generation), tasol ol i ting long dispela proses (process) i kisim longpela taim moa, em i kamap bikos long 'breeding' i kamap namel long Darwin finch bilong dispela eria, Geospiza fortes, na cactus finch we i kam long narapela eria, Geospiza conirostris.
English: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta fotinpela skul long Hawaii we i stap long nambis o i stap klostu long nambis i bin pas long Trinde, maski ol i bin rausim dispela tok lukaut.
