messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wil (wheel) i senisim graun long kainkain we. Bikpela samting tru we wil i mekim long yumi em i givim yumi isipela 'transportation' we i save muv hariap moa.
English: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
Tok Pisin: Hap not bilong Sentinel Range i gat ol longpela maunten tru bilong Antarctica, Vinson Massif, na Mount Vinson we longpela bilong em i 4892 m.
English: In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down.
Tok Pisin: Long ol 'developed country' yu bai no inap long harim wankain mak bilong komplen long kwaliti bilong wara ol bris i pundaun.
English: Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins.
Tok Pisin: Ol kalsa bilong bipo tru na ol 'tribe' i stat long lukautim ol long mekim isi long kisim milk, gras, mit na skin bilong ol.
English: An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela eksampel em raun, kisim foto, na kisim save long ol 'orangatuang' taim yu go long Borneo.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Sampela bilong ol 'cruise' i save tok olsem ol i karim ol lain i go long Berlin, Germany insait long ol 'brochure' bilong ol. Olsem yu ken lukim long mep (map) i stap antap Berlin i no stap klostu long solwara na wanpela visit long siti em i no stap insait long prais bilong 'cruise'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wil (wheel) i senisim graun long kainkain we. Bikpela samting tru we wil i mekim long yumi em i givim yumi isipela 'transportation' we i save muv hariap moa.
English: Angel (2006), explains the Continuum approach as a method being used to help organizations reach a higher level of performance.
Tok Pisin: Angel (2006), i tok klia long Continuum approach olsem wanpela metod (method) we ol i yusim long helpim oganaisesen i kamap long mak we i antap moa long sait bilong pefomen (performance).
English: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
Tok Pisin: Ol plen bilong givim ol dispela sut marasin i go long ol eria we i gat histori bilong planti lain pik i sik long dispela yia i no bin kamap bikos i no gat inap mani na ol i no ting olsem em i wanpela bikpela samting taim ol i skelim em wantaim ol narapela sik.
English: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
Tok Pisin: I gat tredisen (tradition) i bilong no ken slip long Easter nait na stap long wanpela ples klia long lukim san i kirap.
English: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river.
Tok Pisin: Amazon River em i namba tu longpela wara na namba wan bikpela wara long Earth. Em i karim wara we mak bilong em i 8-pela taim moa long namba tu bikpela wara.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Pasin bilong flai long balus em i ken wanpela ekspiriens wei mekim ol manmeri i gat kainkain krismas na i kam long kainkain ples i pret, bikpela moa em sapos ol i no bin flai bipo o i bin stap insait long wanpela samting nogut we i kamap long balus bipo.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
Tok Pisin: Ol woklain bilong 'fire rescue' i kisim dispela paia long 11:35 pm.
English: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
Tok Pisin: Ol piksa we ol i kisim wantaim 'infrared' lait i soim olsem senis we i kamap long temprita (temperature) long de na nait i soim olsem dispela ol ples em ol hul bilong ston.
English: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
Tok Pisin: Televisen i givim ripot we i soim waitpela smok i wok long kam long dispela diwai.
English: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
Tok Pisin: Mitchell Gourley bilong Australia i pinis long namba ileven ples insait long 'men's standing' long Super-G. Pleiya (player) bilong Czech Oldrich Jelinek i pinis long namba sikstin ples insait long 'men's sitting' long Super-G.
English: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
Tok Pisin: Bipo, CEO bilong Ring, Jamie Siminoff, i tok olsem dispela kampani i stat taim em i no inap long harim belo bilong dua bilong haus bilong em taim em i stap long stua bilong em we i stap long ples bilong em long putim kar.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Em i no samting bilong sem long en: em i no narakain long ol narapela samting ol manmeri i save pret long em na ol narapela samting ol planti manmeri i save les long en.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Amazon em namba wan wara we namel bilong em i bikpela tru long Earth, na mak bilong namel bilong en em i sikspela 'mile'.
English: Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
Tok Pisin: Sampela senis o rikwes em yu mas tokim 'travel agent' pastaim na i no go stret long hotel.
English: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne.
Tok Pisin: Long ol dispela ol taim bikpela pait i kamap namel long ol planti bilong ol famili we i gat nem na namba i pait long sia king.
English: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait bilong dispela samting, ol kondisen bilong ais na sno (snow) em i nomol long planti kantri, na ol kar i save ron i go i kam gut long olgeta de bilong yia.
English: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'bill' em i tok olsem ol vidio geim (video game) bilong pait we ol i salim long Carlifonia em ol i mas makim wantaimwanpela 'decal reading' "18" na mekim ol lain i brukim dispela lo long baim $1000 long wanwan taim ol i brukim dispela lo.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Long sampela manmeri, pasin bilong klia gut long wanem wanpela balus i save wok na wanem samting i save kamap taim balus i ron i ken helpim ol long daunim ol pret we i save kamap long ol samting we ol i no save long en o ol i pilim olsem ol i no kontrolim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'outbreak' i mekim na gavman bilong India i mekim ol dispela samting kain olsem salim ol lain bilong holimpasim pik i go long ol eria we planti pik i sik na i stap, na givim tausen moskito keten (curtain) na spreyim (spray) ol 'pesticide'.
English: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
Tok Pisin: Ol weda (weather) nogut i ken kamap long kainkain hap bilong dispela graun, na i gat kainkain, dispela em bai bihainim ples, envairomen, na ol kondisen bilong 'atmosphere'.
English: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
Tok Pisin: I no longtaim bihain long Alonso Michael Schumacher i pinis long resis, bikos 'saspension' bilong em i bagarap taim em i wok long pait long winim spes insait long resis.
English: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
Tok Pisin: Paralympics bai i kamap long 24 Ogas i go long 5 Septemba 2021. Sampela ol samting bai kamap long ol narapela lokesen long ol narapela ples long Japan.
English: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela kos bai stap long 2-5-pela de na bai i gat 'role play', planti 'first aid' na sampela treining bilong ol samting bilong pait.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol 'courier' kampani em ol i save baim ol gut long bringim ol samting hariap. Planti taim, em i impoten long mekim dispela wantaim ol dokumen bilong bisnis, ol 'merchandise' o 'spare parts' long mekim wanpela ripea (repair) hariap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
Tok Pisin: Ol bikpela rot, ol bilding i gat glas long fran na ol stoa bilong tude em ol i gat ol 'red-tiled roof' we i tredisinel, '18th century' maket, na ol olpela 'mosque' na sios, tasol dispela siti em olsem wanpela siti bilong Mediterranean Europe na i no Turkey bilong bipo.
English: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
Tok Pisin: Sekim sapos ol bas (bus) yu tingting long kisim em bai go insait long Hebron na i no go klostu long setelmen (settlement) bilong ol Jewish long Kiryat Arba.
English: To understand the Templars one must understand the context that prompted the creation of the order.
Tok Pisin: Long klia gut long ol Templars yumi mas klia gut long stori i stap baksait we i mekim ol i kamapim dispela grup.
English: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.
Tok Pisin: 'National football' bilong Italy, wantaim 'national football' tim bilong Germany em tupela namba tu tim we i gutpela tru insait long olgeta hap bilong graun na ol i bin sempion bilong FIFA World Cup long 2006.
English: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
Tok Pisin: Wankain olsem ol narapela saveman, em i gat tupela tingting sapos ol i ken oraitim sik suga, em i tok olsem ol dispela samting we ol i painimaut long en, em i no bilong ol manmeri husat i gat Type 1 bilong sik suga.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Long wanpela 'route', ol bikpela kampani i gat ol balus bilong ol yet, tasol long ol narapela 'route' na long ol liklik bisnis i bin i gat wanpela problem.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.
Tok Pisin: Cuomo, husat i gat 53 krismas, i statim wok bilong em olsem gavana long stat bilong dispela yia na i sainim wanpela 'bill' long mun i go pinis we i mekim lo i tok orait long man i maritim man yet na meri i maritim meri yet.
English: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
Tok Pisin: Dispela tok pait i bin kamap bikos long ol lain i yusim planti mani tumas long givim helpim na mekim gen ol haus na ol samting we Hurricane Katrina i bin bagarapim; sampela bilong ol lain we i save was long hamas mani we gavman i save yusim i kolim dispela olsem "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
English: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, pesentes (percentage) bilong XDR-TB insait long wanpela grup manmeri wantaim sik 'tuberculosis' i stap daunbilo' 60,00 bilong 330,00 manmeri i save kisim dispela sik long wanpela taim insait long South Africa.
English: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife.
Tok Pisin: 'Nature-based tourism' em i save pulim ol manmeri we i intres long lukim ol eria bilong 'nature' na amamas long lukim ol ples, wantaim ol plent (plent) na animal bilong dispela eria.
English: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
Tok Pisin: Websait we i save givim nius long sait bilong 'entertainment' TMZ i save olsem dispela man bilong kisim foto i stopim kar bilong em long narapela sait bilong Sepulveda Boulevard na i wok long traim long kisim ol piksa bilong ol polis i stopim kar na bihain em i go long narapela sait bilong rot na i kontinu (continue) long kisim foto, dispela i mekim na California Highway Patrol polis ofisa husat i wok long stopim ol kar i givim oda long em tupela taim long em i mas go bek.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Sapos ol i salim samting long kago balus, long sampela 'route' em bai kisim planti de long go insait long 'unloading' na 'customs'.
predictions: Em bai ol i sanim samting long 'air freight', long sampela

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.
Tok Pisin: Teknoloji (technology) i givim ansa wantaim 'field trip' we i kamap long komputa. Ol sumating i ken lukluk long ol 'museum artifact', lukim wanpela 'aquarium', ol lukluk long wanpela naispela 'art' taim ol i sindaun insait long klas.
English: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
Tok Pisin: Ol tok save long mak bilong spit i stap daunbilo moa long ol narapela seksen — planti taim em i 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — na pasin bilong bihainim ol gut em i moa impoten long sakim tok.
English: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
Tok Pisin: Ol leta bilong tingim em 'c' na 'g', bikos 'pronunciation' bilong ol i save senis bihainim 'vowel' we i kam bihain long ol.
English: towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.
Tok Pisin: taim i go long pinis bilong ol Middle Ages 'western' Europe i stat long kamapim ol stail bilong ol yet. Wanpela bilong ol bikpela divelopmen we i kamap long dispela taim bikos long ol 'crusades' em ol manmeri i stat long yusim ol baten long pasim ol klos.
English: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
Tok Pisin: Dispela liklik ples Haldarsvík em yu ken stap long em na lukluk i go long ailan bilong Eysturoy we i stap klostu na em i gat wanpela narapela kain sios we seip (shape) bilong em i olsem 'octagon'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Wanpela we tasol bilong salim samting hariap em long salim em olsem wanpela 'checked luggage', Ol lo bilong 'airline' bai i no inap long ol bek we i no gat pasindia, na dispela hap em yu bai helpim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.
Tok Pisin: Ol mosasaurus i bin i stap olsem nambawan wel animal long dispela taim, no gat narapela animal i inap long kaikaim ol, olsem na ol i no pret long wanpela samting. Ol i save pret long narapela mosasaurus tasol.
English: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain ol pikinini em ol i save kolim ol olsem "'feral" o wel pikinini. Sampela 'feral' pikinini em sampela lain (planti taim em i papamam bilong ol yet) i save mekim ol i stap long haus tasol; long sampela taim ol papamama i no bisi long dispela pikinini bikos em i gat samting i rong long het bilong em o long bodi bilong em.
English: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
Tok Pisin: Websait we i save givim nius long sait bilong 'entertainment' TMZ i save olsem dispela man bilong kisim foto i stopim kar bilong em long narapela sait bilong Sepulveda Boulevard na i wok long traim long kisim ol piksa bilong ol polis i stopim kar na bihain em i go long narapela sait bilong rot na i kontinu (continue) long kisim foto, dispela i mekim na California Highway Patrol polis ofisa husat i wok long stopim ol kar i givim oda long em tupela taim long em i mas go bek.
English: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
Tok Pisin: Ol wok bilong painim dispela hap we 'crash' i kamap i bin bungim weda (weather) nogut na ples we i hat long man i go long en.
English: As a result, the process of an organization working together to overcome an obstacle can lead to a new innovative process to serve the customer's need.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, proses (process) bilong wanpela oganaisesen long wok wantaim na daunim wanpela hatpela samting i ken kamap ol nupela narapela kain proses bilong inapim nid bilong kastoma.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Isipela we bilong ron long balus insait long namba wan klas o bisnis klas em long yusim bikpela mani long kisim dispela naispela sevis (o, i gutpela moa, larim kampani bilong yu i yusim dispela mani long yu).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.
Tok Pisin: Hershey na Chase i bin yusim 'phages', o ol vaires (virus), long putim DNA bilong ol yet i go insait long wanpela 'bacterium'.
English: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
Tok Pisin: Stesin bilong dispela websait kolim dispela 'show' olsem "wanpela redio drama we i bihainim ol stail bilong bipo tasol i gat nupela na narapela kain kleva (clever) stail long em!"
English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.
English: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
Tok Pisin: 'Pyramid sound and light show' em i wanpela samting we ol pikinini i save laikim na em i stap long dispela eria.
English: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
Tok Pisin: Ol i luk olsem ol i no save gut long pilai wantaim ol sista bilong ol long hap saut, tasol taim tonamen (tournament) i wok long kamap, ol South Africa i wok long pilai gut moa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Tasol, dispela i no save kam long liklik prais: planti taim, yu ken baim prais we i go antap foapela taim moa long prais bilong ekonomi klas long kisim bisnis klas tiket, na yu bai baim prais we i go antap 11-pela taim moa long kisim tiket bilong namba wan klas.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Its renown for being an epicenter of luxury began in about 400 A.D. and lasted up until about 1100 A.D.
Tok Pisin: Planti lain manmeri i save long em bikos em i asples bilong gutpela laipstail na em i bin stat long 400 A.D na pinis long kain taim olsem 1100 A.D.
English: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wokabaut long tupela lek em ol i painim long fosil (fossil) bilong ol Australopithecus we i bin stap 4.2-3.9 milien yia i go pinis, tasol ol Sahelanthropus i bin wokabaut long tupela lek long kain taim olsem seven milien yia i go pinis.
English: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies.
Tok Pisin: Taim planti manmeri i gat kar, planti eksiden i ken kamap long ol rot, dispela bai i mekim na ol lain bai i kamapim ol nupela teknik insait long heltkea long stretim ol bagarap long bodi.
English: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wara i stap long han bilong yu bai i 'react' wantaim ol 'layer' we i stap autsait, we bai i pilim narakain na kamapim wanpela kain sel.
English: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
Tok Pisin: Dispela sikman i bin go long Nigeri, we i gat sampela 'case' bilong Ebola i kamap long en.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: I no gat as bilong askim long diskaun prais long bisnis klas o namba wan klas long ol 'direct flights', long wanpela ples i go long narapela ples.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Many common formats (APS family of formats, for example) are equal to or closely approximate this aspect ratio.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol fomet (format) we ol lain i save yusim (eksampel, APS famili bilong ol fomet) em i wankain o klostu wankain olsem dispela 'aspect ratio'.
English: Blogging is a tool that inspires collaboration, and encourages students to extend learning well beyond the traditional school day.
Tok Pisin: 'Blogging' em i wanpela tul (tool) we i save mekim ol lain i wok wantaim, na i strongim ol sumating long surikim samting ol i lainim i go autsait moa long wanem samting ol i save lainim long wanpela de insait long skul.
English: Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers.
Tok Pisin: Sikspela bilong ol lain we em i holimpasim, i gat ol pikinini na lapun i stap wantaim ol, em i lusim ol i go fri pastaim, wantaim ol Filipino we i save kisim foto long kamera.
English: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
Tok Pisin: Sapos kantri we yu bai go long en em ol lain i tok save long sampela samting we yu mas lukaut long en, sampela senis bai kamap long 'travel health insurance' o 'trip cancellation insurance' bilong yu.
English: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are no particular "rainy" and "dry" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year.

English: His research showed that if a hormone was administered it would speed up the baby's foetal lung maturation.
Tok Pisin: Risets bilong em i soim olsem sapos ol i givim wanpela 'hormone' dispela i inap long mekim 'foetal lung' bilong bebi i gro hariap.
English: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.
Tok Pisin: Ol blog i ken kisim helpim sumatin long rait gut. Planti taim ol sumatin i statim blog bilong ol wantaim 'grammar' na 'spelling' we i no gutpela, na taim i gat lain bai i ritim ol bai i senis na i rait gut moa.

Tok Pisin: I gat ol kainkain we bilong mekim wara i kamap 'pure', sampela i save mekim wok bilong daunim sampela kain samting we i ken kamapim hevi.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela marit i ken mekim disisen olsem em i no gutpela long ol, ol em i no gutpela long pikinini bilong ol, sapos ol i gat wanpela bebi.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
Tok Pisin: Weda (weather) nogut em i wanpela tok we i no tok klia tumas long ol weda we i ken kamapim bagarap, distebim laip bilong ol manmeri, mekim man i dai.
English: It was at this time that the transfer of the title of Fashion Capital from Constantinople to Paris was made.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela taim, ol i kisim dispela nem 'Fashion Capital' long siti Constantinople na givim i go long siti Paris.
English: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela tritmen we i yusim ol 'antibody', nem bilong em ZMapp, i bin soim olsem em i ken oraitim sik, tasol bihain long ol stadi i kamap, ol i painimaut olsem em i no inap long banisim ol manmeri long i dai long rot we ol i bin tingim long en.
English: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
Tok Pisin: Taim ol animal i lukautim ol dispela pikinini, ol dispela 'feral' pikinini save soim ol pasin (we ol inap long mek) we i wankain olsem pasin bilong dispela animal we i lukautim ol, kain olsem pret o i no save wanem samting bilong mekim taim em i stap wantaim ol narapela manmeri.
English: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'sport' we planti manmeri i save long en em 'football', 'basketball', 'volleyball', 'water-polo', 'fencing', 'rugby', 'cycling', 'ice hockey', 'roller hockey' na 'F1 motor racing'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
Tok Pisin: Three Kingdoms em i wanpela bilong ol taim bilong pait insait long histori bilong Ancient China we planti tausen manmeri i dai taim ol pait long sindaun long nambawan sia insait long 'grand palace' long Xi’an.
English: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, bihain long Revolution ol wok i op long olgeta man long larim ol man i gat driman na i save wok hat long mekim ol gutpela wok we ol i laik long mekim.
English: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
Tok Pisin: 'Spinx' em i stap long baksait na em i stap olsem man i wok long autim stori.
English: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday.
Tok Pisin: Sampela lain i bin yusim ol kainkain 'hardware' na 'software' long stat nilong Febueri long sekim sapos dispela em i stret na ol i tokaut long dispela long Tunde.
English: It isn’t alone though, experimentation, and an experiment is a test that is used to eliminate one or more of the possible hypotheses, asking questions, and making observations also guide scientific research.
Tok Pisin: Em i no i stap em yet, 'experimentation', na wanpela 'experiment' em i wanpela 'test' ol save yusim long rausim wanpela o moa bilong ol tingting we ol i bin kamapim, pasin bilong askim ol kwesten, na mekim stadi tu i save givim stia long 'scientific research'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Planti savemanmeri i lukim olsem ol 'rhythm' we i kamap long bodi na pasin bilong ol animal na manmeri i save bihainim ol 'cycle' bilong ol samting we i stap autsait long bodi na ol 'biological clock' bilong bodi.

Tok Pisin: Olgeta maus bilong hul bilong ston, we ol i kolim "The Seven Sisters", sais bilong namel bilong ol em ol i gat 100 i go long 250 mita (328 i go long 820 'feet') o moa.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

Tok Pisin: Long kainkain hap bilong United States of America, i gat kain olsem 400,000 'case' bilong Multiple Sclerosis (MS), mekim em i kamap olsem nambawan 'neurological disease' insait long ol bikpela manmeri.
English: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
Tok Pisin: I save i gat etinpela 'medal' tasol bilong winim long wanwan de, sampela kantri i no bin winim wanpela 'medal' na go long 'medal podium' long kisim.
English: It was at this time that the transfer of the title of Fashion Capital from Constantinople to Paris was made.
Tok Pisin: Long dispela taim, ol i kisim dispela nem 'Fashion Capital' long siti Constantinople na givim i go long siti Paris.

Tok Pisin: Taim bilong Huhne na Pryce long kamap long Westminster Magistrates Court em long Febueri 16.

label: Long hap not na i stap long ples we isi long go long en em dispela ol i kolim Sintra we i gat histori na i nais tru na planti ol lain long narapela kantri i save long en taim ol ritim toktok bilong Lord Byron long ol naispela samting i stap long em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: At the other end of the spectrum, one morphs into an unrecognizable individual that feels he or she must change everything the team has been doing and make it their own.
Tok Pisin: Long narapela sait, wanpela meneja i senis i go na kamap olsem wanpela man o meri we ol lain i bo save long em na em i pilim olsem em i mas senisim olgeta samting we tim i wok long mekim na mekim olgeta samting long strong bilong ol yet.
English: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'paleontologists' tude i bilip olsem wanpela grup bilong ol dainaso i stap laip yet long tude. Mipela i save kolim ol olsem pisin.

English: The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
Tok Pisin: Bikpela Amazon River em i 6,387 km (3,980 miles). Em i save kolektim ol wara i kam long planti tausen liklik wara.

Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong flai long balus em i ken wanpela ekspiriens wei mekim ol manmeri i gat kainkain krismas na i kam long kainkain ples i pret, bikpela moa em sapos ol i no bin flai bipo o i bin stap insait long wanpela samting nogut we i kamap long balus bipo.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Long kain olsem 3-pela minit long taim ol i salim em i go long 'space', wanpela kamera we i stap long em i soim olsem kainkain hap bilong 'insulation foam' i wok long bruk long 'fuel tank'.
English: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
Tok Pisin: Namba wan, planti ol 'rider' i save werim ol 'riding boots' we i gat wanpela 'heel' na wanpela 'sole' we i 'smooth' na longpela.
English: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.

English: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'mutation' i ken kamapim kainkain samting na ol i save kamap bikos long wanem kain 'mutation', impoten wok bilong dispela hap 'genetic material' na sapos dispela ol 'cell' em ol 'germ-line cell'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
Tok Pisin: Websait we i save givim nius long sait bilong 'entertainment' TMZ i save olsem dispela man bilong kisim foto i stopim kar bilong em long narapela sait bilong Sepulveda Boulevard na i wok long traim long kisim ol piksa bilong ol polis i stopim kar na bihain em i go long narapela sait bilong rot na i kontinu (continue) long kisim foto, dispela i mekim na California Highway Patrol polis ofisa husat i wok long stopim ol kar i givim oda long em tupela taim long em i mas go bek.
English: In an adoption, the birth parents terminate their parental rights so that another couple may parent the child.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela 'adoption', ol papamama we i kamapim dispela pikinini bai stopim 'right' bilong olsem ol papamama na narapela marit i ken lukautim dispela pikinini.
English: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
Tok Pisin: Long wanpela intaviu, em i tok olsem dispela nupela 'variant' i bin "kamapim bikpela hevi na pret bikos long planti manmeri i dai."
English: The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says.
Tok Pisin: Long taim bilong winta (winter) ples i ken kol nogut tru: ol tempritsa (temperature) i no save go daun aninit long mak we ais i save kamap, tasol i win na wara i stap long win i save bung wantaim long mekim ples i pilim kol moa long wanem samting 'thermometer' i tok.
English: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
Tok Pisin: Ol wanwan hap bilong stori em ol i soim antap long o 'pyramid' na ol i save mekim lait i kamap long ol kainkain 'pyramid'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.

label: I gat planti manmeri i stap laip yet husat i bin stap long dispela taim, na planti lain moa husat i gat ol lain we ol laikim i bin dai o ol i bin wok go na dai long hap, ol Jew na ol lain i no Jew wantaim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
Tok Pisin: Germany em i stap olsem birua bilong planti lain long World War 2, dispela i mekim na wok bung i kamap namel long USSR na USA. Taim woa i pinis, bam i kamap namel long ol sistem, ol proses (process) na kalsa na dispela i mekim ol kantri i no wok wantaim.
English: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
Tok Pisin: Kain olsem 60-pela ripot bilong ol iPods we i no wok gut biko ol i hot tumas i bin kamap, dispela i kamap sikspela paia olgeta na mekim paia i kukim foapela lain na ol i gat 'minor burns'.
English: Virtual team members often function as the point of contact for their immediate physical group.
Tok Pisin: Ol tim we i save wok wantaim long komputa i save wok stap olsem man o meri we i save bungim ol grup we i wok wantaim long ofis.
English: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'foster care' i sapos long givim olgeta samting we ol i no bin gat long haus we ol i kisim ol long en.
English: It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
Tok Pisin: Em i klostu long hat olgeta long senisim karensi (currency) bilong Falkland autsait long ol ailan, olsem na yu mas senisim mani bipo long yu lusim dispela ailan.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

Tok Pisin: Ol siti bilong Harappa na Mohenjo-daro i gat wanpela toilet we i yusim wara long klostu olgeta haus, naol i join i go long wanpela narapela kain 'sewage system'.

Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim em i kama bun na liklik nogut tru na stikim (stick) em i go long ol narapela metel (metal). Sampela taim ol i ken mekim em i kama bun nogut tru na yusim em long bilasim ol piksa we ol peintim (paint) long han na insait long buk we ol i kolim "illuminated manuscripts".
English: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela taim wanpela man insait long ol bikpela lain manmeri i apim na soim het bilong wanpela 'royal guard' we ol i bin kilim long Versailles long fran bilong Queen na em i pret nogut tru.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue.

Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela yia, wanpela man o meri we i sik wantaim dispela binatang i ken givim dispela sik i go long 10 o 15-pela lain we i save stap klostu long ol.
English: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
Tok Pisin: 'Backpacking by ski': Dispela ektiviti em ol i save kolim tu olsem 'backcountry ski', 'ski touring' o 'ski hiking'.
English: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
Tok Pisin: Moa long wan tausen yia, dispela lotu bilong ol Kristen i bin bungim ol kantri bilong Europe wantaim, maski ol i gat wanwan tok ples na kastom bilong ol yet.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.

Tok Pisin: I luk olsem bai i gat moa 'maria' long sait i stap klostu bikos 'crust' em i 'thin' moa. Em i isi moa long 'lava' long kam antap long autsait.
English: For news on tournaments and where to buy tickets for polo matches, check Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
Tok Pisin: Long nius long ol tonamen (tournament) na wanem hap bilong baim tiket long ol polo geim (game), sekim Asociacion Argentina de Polo.
English: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
Tok Pisin: Long ol nupela de bilong em, dispela 'show' i save kamap long redio bilong intanet TogiNet Radio, dispela em i wanpela websait we i save gat ol toktok bilong redio long en.
English: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
Tok Pisin: Tupelal singsing bilong dispela muvi, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) na City of Stars, em ol i makim olsem 'best original song'. Ol i makim Lionsgate studio 26-pela taim—dispela em i moa long olgeta narapela 'studio'.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.

English: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
Tok Pisin: Oyapock River Bridge em i wanpelad 'cable-stayed bridge'. Em i stap long Oyapock River na konektim ol siti bilong Oiapoque insait long Brazil na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock insait long French Guiana.

English: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, Ring i bin givim mani long wanpela sekuriti kampani, ADT Corporation, we i bin laik kisim em i go long kot.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler.
Tok Pisin: I gat planti ol samting i kamap long 'society' na 'politics' kain olsem pasin bilong yusim 'metric system'. na senis long 'absolutism' i go long 'republicanism', na pasin bilong 'nationalism' na bilip long kantri em i samting bilong ol manmeri na i no bilong wanpela man tasol we i bosim ol.
English: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
Tok Pisin: Dispela wok painimaut i givim sampela tingting tu long wanem we gras bilong pisin i save kamap.
English: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela gutpela eksampel we i kamap i no longtaim em dispela kempen (campaign) bilong North Altlantic long WWII. Ol America i wok long traim long muvim ol kago na ol man long Atlantic Ocean long helpim ol Britain.
English: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela tritmen we i yusim ol 'antibody', nem bilong em ZMapp, i bin soim olsem em i ken oraitim sik, tasol bihain long ol stadi i kamap, ol i painimaut olsem em i no inap long banisim ol manmeri long i dai long rot we ol i bin tingim long en.
English: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'pest' i ken bagarapim kaikai, mekim skin i skrap, o nogut moa ol i ken kamapim ol 'allergic reaction', spredim 'venom', o mekim sik i kalap long wanpela man i go long narapela.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
Tok Pisin: Dispela liklik ples Haldarsvík em yu ken stap long em na lukluk i go long ailan bilong Eysturoy we i stap klostu na em i gat wanpela narapela kain sios we seip (shape) bilong em i olsem 'octagon'.
English: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.
Tok Pisin: Long kisim ol gutpela hap bilong lukim Hong Kong, lusim ailan na go long fran bilong wara long Kowloon long hapsait.
English: You can also have alloys that include small amounts of non-metallic elements like carbon.
Tok Pisin: Yu ken i gat ol 'alloy' we i gat ol liklik mak bilong ol elemen (element) we i no metel (metal) kain olsem 'carbon' insait long ol.
English: Some people thought he was right but many people believed the opposite; that the Solar System moved around the Earth, including the Sun (and even the other stars).
Tok Pisin: Ol sampela manmeri i ting olsem em i tok stret, tasol planti manmeri i bilim long oposit (opposite); ol i bilip olsem Solar System i save muv raunim Earth, wantaim Sun (na ol narapela sta tu).
English: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'shooter' insait long dispela 'supplementary pest control' test em ol 'ranger' i was long ol, bikos dispela test em ol i monitarim (monitor) na skelim 'effectiveness' bilong em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
Tok Pisin: Bipo planti fama (farmer) i save mekim 'subsistence agriculture' na dispela pasin em i stap yet long planti kantri we i no divelop yet.
English: Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife.
Tok Pisin: Madagascar em i wanpela bikpela tru, na em i kain olsem wanpela kontinen (continent) bilong em, taim yumi lukluk long sait bilong 'wildlife'.
English: The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing.
Tok Pisin: Chaco rijen i gat ol narapela grup bilong ol asples manmeri kain olsem ol Guaycurú na Payaguá, husat i save painim abus, pis na bungim ol kaikai ol i painim long bus.
English: The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan samting we i soim olsem 'internal poisoning' i kamap em wanpela kontena bilong marasin o 'toxic chemical' bilong haus i op na i stap.
English: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'safari' bilong wokabaut (ol i save kolim tu olsem wanpela "'bush walk'", "hiking safari", o 'going "'footing'") em i pasin bilong wokabaut, long sampela aua o long sampela de.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report "truly regrettable."
Tok Pisin: Dispela ministri i autim tingting bilong em taim em i kolim dispela pasin bilong Apple long i no givim ripot hariap olsem "i no gutpela tru."
English: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
Tok Pisin: Ol i stopim ol raun bilong ol bihain long 'lead singer' bilong ol Steven Tyler i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong em taim em i pundaun i kamdaun long 'stage' taim em i wok long singsing long Ogas 5.
English: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
Tok Pisin: Ol plen bilong givim ol dispela sut marasin i go long ol eria we i gat histori bilong planti lain pik i sik long dispela yia i no bin kamap bikos i no gat inap mani na ol i no ting olsem em i wanpela bikpela samting taim ol i skelim em wantaim ol narapela sik.
English: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
Tok Pisin: Paralympics bai i kamap long 24 Ogas i go long 5 Septemba 2021. Sampela ol samting bai kamap long ol narapela lokesen long ol narapela ples long Japan.
English: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
Tok Pisin: Em tok long ol tok win olsem "ol maus wara bilong politiks na em i pasin bilong ol lain i no gat gutpela tingting".
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol pasin bilong ol lain long Paris bai senis hariap tru sapos yu soim sampela gutpela pasin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
Tok Pisin: Laspela nius bilong dispela i mekim ripot olsem, level bilong ol 'sea readings' i soim olsem wanpela tsunami i bin kamap. Tru tru i bin i gat sampela ektiviti bilong tsunami we ol i bin rekodim klostu long Pago Pago na Niue.
English: This type of manager has difficulty making unpopular decisions, performing disciplinary action, performance evaluations, assigning responsibility, and holding people accountable.
Tok Pisin: Dispela kain meneja em i save painim hat long mekim ol disisen we ol lain i no laikim, givim mekim save long ol lain i brukim lo, sekim wok pefomens (performance) bilong ol wokmanmeri, givim wok long ol wokmanmeri, na tokaut stret long ol wokmanmeri olsem ol i mekim rong.
English: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
Tok Pisin: Dispela guria i stap namel long 20 km (15 'miles) long 'north-northeast' bilong Dillion, na kain olsem 65 km (40 'miles') saut long Butte.
English: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).
Tok Pisin: 'Sleep interruption' em i pasin bilong kirap namel long slip na go bek long slip sotpela taim bihain (10–60 minit).
English: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'subculture' i save mekim ol lain i gat wankain tingting na i pilim olsem ol stendet bilong 'society' i no bilong ol na taim ol i bung wantaim ol i kamapim wanpela 'identity' bilong ol yet.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Plitvice Lakes nesinel park em i gat planti bikpela diwai, planti bilong ol dispela diwai em 'beech', 'spruce', na ol 'fir' diwai, na em i gat miks Alpine na Mediterranean plent (plant).

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
Tok Pisin: Bikos long dispela, tupela 'specie' bilong pis i pinis olgeta, na tupela narapela em klostu i laik pinis olgeta, wanpela bilong ol em i 'humpback chub'.
English: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).
Tok Pisin: Yusim ol blog long gutpela na stretpela we "i ken mekim ol sumatin i ken skelim ol samting na save long wanem samting i no stret na wanem we bilong stret; taim ol wok wantaim ol meteriel long Internet, ol sumatin i ken save long wanem mak ol i stap long en taim ol skelim samting we ol narapela i raitim na tu ol i ken givim tingting bilong ol long ol samting we i wok long kamap (Oravec, 2002).
English: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.
Tok Pisin: Ol mosasaurus i bin i stap olsem nambawan wel animal long dispela taim, no gat narapela animal i inap long kaikaim ol, olsem na ol i no pret long wanpela samting. Ol i save pret long narapela mosasaurus tasol.
English: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
Tok Pisin: Bihain, Lakkha Singh i go pas long singim ol bhajan.
English: For example, each year students from Bennet School in North Carolina design a website about their trip to the State Capital, each year the website gets remodeled, but old versions are kept online to serve as a scrapbook.
Tok Pisin: Eksampel, long wanwan yia ol sumatin long Bennet School long North Carolina i save disainim wanpela websait long raun bilong ol i go long State Capital, na long wanwan yia dispela websait i kisim nupela stail, tasol ol olpela 'version' i save stap yet 'online' olsem wanpela 'scrapebook'.

English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
Tok Pisin: 'Downhill skiing' olsem wanpela 'sport' em i go bek long kain olsem '17th century' o moa, na long 1861 ol Norwegians i opim namba wan 'recreational ski club' long Australia.
English: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
Tok Pisin: Displela nupela envairomen i gat ol kainkain risos na ol kainkain kompetisen, olsem na dispela nupela populesen (population) bai nidim ol narapela pasin long kamap strong moa long mak we ol i bin stap long en bipo.
English: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.
Tok Pisin: Tingim olsem maski musik long ol bikpela hap bilong bikde em i pinis, i gat sampela seksen bilong bikde we ol bai pilai musik i go inap long biknait.
English: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
Tok Pisin: Mausman bilong Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman i tok: "Angola i wok long go long mak we i nogut tru long dispela 'outbreak' na dispela hevi em i stap nogut tru long Angola," em i tok.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Dispela eria em i ples bilong ol kainkain animal na pisin.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
Tok Pisin: Maski Winfrey i wok long krai long taim ol i tok gutbai long em, em i tokaut klia long ol lain i save laik long lukim em olsem em bai i kam bek.
English: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
Tok Pisin: Bikos ol dispela eria i no gat planti manmeri, planti taim 'light pollution' em bai i no wanpela problem, yu bai inap long lukim ol sta.
English: All the ships were sunk, except for one British cruiser. Nearly 200 American and German lives were lost.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta sip em ol i bin sinlk, tasol wanpela 'British cruiser' i no sink. Klostu 200-pela laip bilong ol America na Germany i bin lus.
English: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
Tok Pisin: Dispela Report i skelim gut tru olgeta samting insait long dispela polisi bilong Executive i go long Iraq na em i tok strong olsem i mas i gat senis i kamap.
English: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela 'safari' bilong wokabaut (ol i save kolim tu olsem wanpela "'bush walk'", "hiking safari", o 'going "'footing'") em i pasin bilong wokabaut, long sampela aua o long sampela de.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol animal we i no stap long planti hap kain olsem 'European brown bear', 'wolf', 'owl', 'lynx', 'wild cat', na 'capercaillie' i stap long hap, wantaim ol narapela animal we i stap long planti hap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
Tok Pisin: I no longtaim, ol ofisa we i werim ol 'riot gear' i kam insait long dispela hap na i yusim ol 'tear gas' long mekim ol kalabus lain i no inap long ranawe.

Tok Pisin: Antap long dispela taua em sampela spesol ples bilong dispela god i stap.
English: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna.
Tok Pisin: Ol narapela lain we i save pilai restling (wrestling) i soim sori bilong ol long Luna.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'Article' i nidim ol lain long tok orait long olgeta 'state' bipo long ol i ken mekim senis na ol 'state' i kisim 'central government' olsem na ol lain we ol i makim i no save stap.
English: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
Tok Pisin: Wankain olsem ol narapela saveman, em i gat tupela tingting sapos ol i ken oraitim sik suga, em i tok olsem ol dispela samting we ol i painimaut long en, em i no bilong ol manmeri husat i gat Type 1 bilong sik suga.
English: A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon.
Tok Pisin: 20 pesen (percent) bilong wara we i save kamaut long ol wara bilong plenet (planet) i save kam long Amazon.
English: This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators.
Tok Pisin: Dispela i mekim na ol i gat planti liklik ples bilong hait long ol animal we i laik kaikaim ol.
English: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
Tok Pisin: Long ol yia insait long 1980 em i bin wok long ol 'show' kain olsem Taxi, Cheers, na The Tracy Ullman Show.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.

Tok Pisin: Dr. Tony Moll i painimaut long dispela Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) long KwaZulu-Natal rijen bilong South Africa.

Tok Pisin: Mak bilong bel isi i stap insait long wanpela man i gat koneksen (connection) tasol em i oposit (opposite) long mak bilong hevi we i stap insait long bodi na spirit bilong wanpela man.

Tok Pisin: Ol 35mm fomet (format) em ol, i ken mekim ol lain i paul, ol i gat 36mm long 'width' na 24mm long 'height'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta maus bilong hul bilong ston, we ol i kolim "The Seven Sisters", sais bilong namel bilong ol em ol i gat 100 i go long 250 mita (328 i go long 820 'feet') o moa.
English: In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen.
Tok Pisin: Insait long wanpela karis, ol i ron i go bek long Paris taim ol bikpela lain manmeri i belhat na i raunim ol na i wok long singaut na mekim ol kainkain toktok bilong pretim King na Queen.
English: Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment.
Tok Pisin: Crown Office, we i bosim olgeta 'prosecution', i bin tokim ol jenelis (journalist) olsem no gat narapela toktok bai kamap i go inap long 'indictment'.
English: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'mutation' i ken kamapim kainkain samting na ol i save kamap bikos long wanem kain 'mutation', impoten wok bilong dispela hap 'genetic material' na sapos dispela ol 'cell' em ol 'germ-line cell'.
English: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong wanwan gavman long givim ol paspot (passport) we ol i no makim (X) long man o meri o givim ol dokumen long soim senis long nem na man i go long meri o meri i go long man em i narakain narakain long wanwan gavman.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
Tok Pisin: Taim yu stap long narapela kantri na kam bek long haus bilong yu, yu senisim pasin bilong yu long bihainim nupela kalsa na yu lusim sampela bilong ol pasin bilong kalsa bilong yu yet.
English: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
Tok Pisin: Websait we i save givim nius long sait bilong 'entertainment' TMZ i save olsem dispela man bilong kisim foto i stopim kar bilong em long narapela sait bilong Sepulveda Boulevard na i wok long traim long kisim ol piksa bilong ol polis i stopim kar na bihain em i go long narapela sait bilong rot na i kontinu (continue) long kisim foto, dispela i mekim na California Highway Patrol polis ofisa husat i wok long stopim ol kar i givim oda long em tupela taim long em i mas go bek.
English: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
Tok Pisin: Faivepela minit bilong dispela 'display' na wanpela win i stat long blo, wanpela minit bihain, dispela win i kamap long mak bilong 70km/h... orait ren i kam, tasol em i pundaun strong nogut tru na sais bilong em i bikpela tru na em i paitim skin bilong yu olsem wanpela nidel (needle), orait bihain ais i pundaun olsem ston long skai, ol manmeri i pret na singaut na ran antap long wanpela narapela.
English: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela bom i stap long kar na i pairap long bikpela ofis bilong ol polis long Gaziantep, long Turkey aste moning na i kilim tupela polis ofisa na kamapim bagarap long bodi bilong moa long twentipela narapela manmeri.
English: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol manmeri husat i save liklik log Spanish i ken ting olsem Portuguese em i klostu wankain olsem Spanish na i no gat nid long stadi long em.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: 'Majorcan cuisine', kain olsem ol wankain eria insait long Mediterranean, i save yusim bret, ol gaden kaikai na mit (planti taim em mit bilong pik), na i save yusim 'olive oil' long olgeta samting.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
Tok Pisin: Bihain ol ripot i tok olsem dispela balus i kisim wanpela 'bomb threat' olsem na ol salim em i go bek long Afghanistan, na em i go daun long Kandahar.
English: Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
Tok Pisin: Bilong wanem na ol 'transportation system' i save kamapim ol dispela kain komplen, bilong wanem na ol i no save wok gut long olgeta de? Ol 'transportation engineer' i no save long mekim wok bilong ol? O, i gat samting we i bikpela moa i wok long kamap?
English: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
Tok Pisin: Em i kamap wantaim dispela laspela tingting bikos long planti gutpela toktok na 'encouragment' we ol meri na man i salim i go long em na i tokim em olsem marasin bilong spesim pikinini em i mas kamap olsem wanpela sevis we olgeta haus sik i mas givim.
English: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
Tok Pisin: Sampela taim i go pinis long dispela wik, wanpela helikopta (helicopter) i 'crash' na i kilim tripela lain na narapela tripela i kisim bagarap long bodi bilong ol.
English: It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
Tok Pisin: Em i gutpela long wanpela long baim wanpela Wild Card, we i save givim tok orait long i go insait long ol park insait long South Africa o olgeta South African National Parks.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Wanpela kaikai bilong avinun we planti lain i save laikim, em ol i save laikim long mekim long taim bilong sama (summer), em i Pa amb Oli: Bret wantaim 'olive oil', tomato, na wanem samting i stap bilong givim fleiva kain olsem 'cheese', tuna pis na kain olsem.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.

Tok Pisin: Dispela ol gutpela nambis i save pulap wantaim ol famili na i save i gat ol gutpela stua i stap long klostu long dispela nambis. Em i seif long swim long ol dispela nambis.
English: Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol insek i ken foldim wing bilong ol i kam pas wantaim bodi bilong ol na dispela em i gutpela samting.
English: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
Tok Pisin: Maski Winfrey i wok long krai long taim ol i tok gutbai long em, em i tokaut klia long ol lain i save laik long lukim em olsem em bai i kam bek.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.
Tok Pisin: Em i tok tu olsem ol dispela kain save bilong man long lukim mining bilong pasin bilong ol man em ol animal tu i gat kain olsem ol dok we yumi save lukautim long haus.
English: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).

English: Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
