Tok Pisin: Dispela wara i stap long han bilong yu bai i 'react' wantaim ol 'layer' we i stap autsait, we bai i pilim narakain na kamapim wanpela kain sel.
English: It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
Tok Pisin: Em i is long lukim olsem graun i senis tru bikos long ol nupela save bilong sains (science) na teknoloji (technology), na ol problem i wok long kamap bikpela bikos long planti manmeri na laipstail bilong manmeri long i gat ol kainkain bikpela samting.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Dispela pasin em i kam long Chain we ol i save lukluk long ol 'plum blossom'.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
Tok Pisin: Olgeta 'noun', we i stap wantaim dispela wod Sie bilong yu, ol i save stat wantaim wanpela kapitol leta, maski em i stap insait long namel bilong sentens (sentence).
English: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds.
Tok Pisin: Planti bilong ol 'paleontologists' tude i bilip olsem wanpela grup bilong ol dainaso i stap laip yet long tude. Mipela i save kolim ol olsem pisin.
English: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i min olsem yu ken lukim siti we i gat histori bilong en long sampela de taim yu kam bek long nait na slip long sip.
English: The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
Tok Pisin: Rom i bin go pas long lukautim wok bilong sios long tausen yia na planti pawa na moni i stap long Rom. Dispela i mekim na planti manmeri i wok long i gat tupela tingting sapos em i inapim dispela bilip, o nogat.
English: Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes "journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."
Tok Pisin: Professor Pamela Ferguson bilong University of Dundee i tok olsem "ol jenelis (journalist) i ken putim ol yet long birua sapos ol i pablisim ol foto na kain samting olsem bilong ol saspek."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Long Japan, empera (emperor) i save holim ol pati bilong ol namba wan 'cherry blossom' pati bilong em yet na ol memba bilong 'aristocracy' long Imperial Court.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
Tok Pisin: U.S Corps of Engineers i estimetim (estimate) olsem 6 'inches' bilong ren bai i bagarapim olgeta ol 'levees' we i bin bagarap pinis na i stap.
English: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
Tok Pisin: Ol sik we i save kalap hariap, o ol animal we i save bagarapim ol kilim ol manmeri wantaim fos, em ol i no kam aninit long dispela nem 'pest'.
English: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
Tok Pisin: "'Thermal behavior' bilong ol i no stap wankain olsem ol bikpela hul bilong ston long Earth we i save i gat wanpela kain tempritsa (temperature), tasol ol i stap wankain olsem tempritsa bilong ol dip hol i stap long graun," Glen Cushing bilong United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team na bilong Northern Arizona University we i stap long Flagstaff, Arizona i tok.
English: To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite.
Tok Pisin: Long kisim ol gutpela hap bilong lukim Hong Kong, lusim ailan na go long fran bilong wara long Kowloon long hapsait.
English: Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'periodic rhythms', em ol i no kamap bikos long ol samting we i stap autsait tasol, dispela em ol lain i bin stadi na lukim olsem em i kamap long planti ol samting we i gat laip, wantaim ol 'bacteria', 'fungi', plent (plant) na animal.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Ol plent (plant) i save luk nais tru insait long wel envaironmen bilong ol, olsem an no ken traim long rausim "wanpela tasol" na kisim olsem ‘specimen’.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
Tok Pisin: Long aste avinun, long La Plata, wanpela siti we i stap 50 kilomita (31-pela 'mile') long Buenos Aires, dispela senata (senator) husat em i Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kircher i tokaut olsem em bai i resis long kamap presiden.
English: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
Tok Pisin: Bikos ol dispela eria i no gat planti manmeri, planti taim 'light pollution' em bai i no wanpela problem, yu bai inap long lukim ol sta.
English: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
Tok Pisin: Bos bilong 'shuttle' progrem bilong NASA N. Wayne Hale Jr. i tok olsem ol 'foam' i bin pundaun "bihain long taim we mipela i wok long tingting planti long en."
English: Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber.
Tok Pisin: Dispela em i wankain long ol militeri (military) bikos nau ol i no kisim 'rank' we i bihainim 'class' bilong famili bilong ol, tasol ol bai i kisim 'rank' we i bihainim pasin bilong ol na wanem samting ol i inap long mekim.
English: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
Tok Pisin: Dispela 'strain' bilong 'bird flu' em i nogut tru long ol manmeri, H5N1, na ol savemanmeri i tokaut olsem trutru dispela sik i go long wanpela wail pato na em i dai, na ol i painim em long Mande, long ol ples tais klostu long Lyon long hap is bilong France.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Sapos yu go long wanpela gaden we ol i stretim bilong ol lalin i kam na lukim, pasin bilong kolektim ol "'specimen’" bai mekim na ol i rausim yu, na ol i no inap toktok planti.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: These theories look at what it is about certain people that make them want the things that they do and what things in their environment will make them do or not do certain things.
Tok Pisin: Ol dispela 'theory' i save lukluk long wanem samting insait long sampela manmeri i save mekim ol i laikim ol samting we ol i mekim na wanem ol samting insait long envairomen (environment) bai wokim na ol i mekim wanpela samting o i no mekim wanpela samting.
English: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
Tok Pisin: Long olpela Medina em i isi long painim ol ples we i save salim ol samting bilong ol Morocco, kain olsem 'tagine', 'pottery', 'leather goods', 'hookahs', na ol kainkain 'geegaws', tasol olgeta dispela samting em i bilong ol turis long baim.
English: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
Tok Pisin: Long 1994, dispela kros na pait i bin mekim na wanpela kantri ol i kolim Transnistria Republic i kamap long 'eastern' Moldova, we i gat gavman na karensi (currency) bilong em yet, tasol ol i no luksave long em olsem wanpela UN memba kantri.
English: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
Tok Pisin: Ol i bin tok olsem ol bai i katim em i go daun long Tunde, tasol wanpela imejensi kot 'ruling' i seivim dispela diwai.
English: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
Tok Pisin: Ol i kisim dispela kar i go longwe long ples we eksiden i kamap long em long kain taim olsem 1200 GMT long dispela de yet.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Singapore em i seif tru na isi long i go i kam, na yu ken baim kainkain samting taim yu kamap long hap.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
Tok Pisin: Dispela namba ten bikpela win na ren we ol i kolim long dispela Hurricane sisen (season) em, Subtropical Storm Jerry, na em i wok long stat long kamap long Atlantic Ocean long tude.
English: Naturalists and philosophers focused on classical texts and, in particular, on the Bible in Latin.
Tok Pisin: Ol lain i save stadi long 'nature' na ol 'philosophy' i save lukluk long ol 'classical texts', kain olsem, Bible long tok ples Latin.
English: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
Tok Pisin: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.
English: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong lukautim 'reindeer' em i wanpela impoten wok namel long ol Sámi na kalsa bilong dispela wok em i impoten tu long ol narapela lain we i gat narapela wok insait long komuniti bilong ol.
English: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
Tok Pisin: Chambers, wanpela man we i no bilip long God, i tok pait olsem kot pepa bilong bilong em, em i "no bikpela samting" na "olgeta man i ken kisim narapela i go long kot."
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
Tok Pisin: 'Technological determinism' em i wanpela hap tok we i gat planti kainkain tingting we ol manmeri i save prektisim, stat long 'technology push' o 'technological imperative' i go long wanpela tingting we i tok olsem pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong graun em long bihainim ol lo bilong sains na kamapim ol teknoloji we i save bihainim ol dispela lo bilong sains.
English: The most readily accessible plant resources would have been the proteins accessible in leaves and legumes, but these are hard for primates like us to digest unless they are cooked.
Tok Pisin: Dispela plent (plant) we i stap long dispela hap em ol 'protein' i save stap insait long ol lip na ol bin bilong en, tasol dispela em i hat long ol bel bilong ol 'primate' olsem mipela long brukim i go daun na ol i mas kukim ol pastaim.
English: The eathquake struck Mariana at 07:19 a.m. local time (09:19 p.m. GMT Friday).
Tok Pisin: Dispela guria i kamap long Mariana long 07:19 a.m lokel taim (09:19 p.m GMT long Fraide).
English: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
Tok Pisin: Oyapock River Bridge em i wanpelad 'cable-stayed bridge'. Em i stap long Oyapock River na konektim ol siti bilong Oiapoque insait long Brazil na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock insait long French Guiana.
English: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
Tok Pisin: Ol 'Article' i nidim ol lain long tok orait long olgeta 'state' bipo long ol i ken mekim senis na ol 'state' i kisim 'central government' olsem na ol lain we ol i makim i no save stap.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Na tu, i gat sampela bas (bus) i save go long hap not long Hebron, dispela em i ples we ol i planim ol papa bilong bilip insait long Baibel Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, na ol meri bilong ol.
predictions: Gat ol bus tu ol i go long not long Hebron, dispela ples i save stap long Baibel long ol 'patriarchs' Abraham, Isaac, Jacob

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
Tok Pisin: Em tok long ol tok win olsem "ol maus wara bilong politiks na em i pasin bilong ol lain i no gat gutpela tingting".
English: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
Tok Pisin: Olsem na, taim yu ritim dispela 'grammar primer' em bai helpim yu tru long grama (grammar) bilong tok ples Persia na yu ken save gut long ol hap toktok.
English: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
Tok Pisin: Gol em ol i ken mekim i go kama kainkain seip (shape). Na ol i ken rolim em na kamapim ol liklik liklik seip (shape).
English: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
Tok Pisin: Ol meme bilong we ol man i save lukautim em ol i save putim ol long grup we i save raun long ol liklik maunten o ol narapela hap bilong kaikai, planti taim ol 'goatherd' i save was long ol na dispela em ol pikinini ol bikpela man we ol i save kolim olsem 'sheperd'. Ol dispela ol pasin bilong lukautim ol meme em ol i wok long yusim yet long tude.
English: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
Tok Pisin: Siti bilong Casablanca long tude em ol man Berber we i save painim pis i kamapim long '10th century' BCE, na ol Phoenicians, Romans, na Merenid i bin yusim olsem wanpela impoten port we ol i kolim Anfa.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
Tok Pisin:'}]
label: Sekim sapos ol bas (bus) yu tingting long kisim em bai go insait long Hebron na i no go klostu long setelmen (settlement) bilong ol Jewish long Kiryat Arba.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Wagonways were built in England as early as the 16th Century.
Tok Pisin: Ol Wagonways em ol i bin bildim long England taim bipo long '16th Century'.
English: The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas.
Tok Pisin: Ol Sundarbans i karamapim wanpela eria mak bilong 3,850 km², na 'one-thrid' bilong en em wara/ples tais i karamapim.
English: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim bai i gat skul fi long enrol long ol dispela edukesen progrem.
English: The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived.
Tok Pisin: 25-pela Dunlop broadies em ol i stap yet na ol i olpela kopi tru bilong dispela dokumen. Dispela namba wan dokumen we ol i raitim long han em i bagarap.
English: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
Tok Pisin: Ol nambawan tok ples bilong Barcelona em Catalan na Spanish. Klostu hap namba bilong ol lain i stap long hap i save tok ples Catalan, bikpela namba moa i save long em, na klostu olgeta lain i save long Spanish.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Ol wara we i stap insait long ples em ol gutpela samting bilong mekim holide long en.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
Tok Pisin: Long ol 'extreme' bilong dispela 'poll', 29 pesen (percent) bilong ol dispela sevei (survey) i bilip olsem Australia i mas kamap wanpela 'republic' hariap, taim 31 pesen i bilip olsem Australia i mas no ken kamap wanpela 'republic'.
English: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
Tok Pisin: Mrs. Kircher i tokaut long tingting bilong em long resis long kamap olsem presiden long Argentine Theatre, long dispela seim (same) lokesen taim em i bin yusim long statim 2005 kempein (campaign) bilong em long Senate as wanpela memba bilong Buenos Aires provins 'delegation'.
English: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
Tok Pisin: Moldova em i wanpela 'republic' we i gat kainkain hauslain we i bin kisim taim nogut long kros na pait i kamap namel long ol hauslain.
English: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong sekuriti long sekim ol manmeri long ol 'checkpoint' i wok long kamap nogut moa bihain long Septemba 11, 2001.
English: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
Tok Pisin: Dispela bai mekim ol pleiya (player) i ken kontrolim ol eksen na muvmen insait long ol 'video game' taim ol muv.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Eksampel, taim yu go lukim ol kasol (castle) insait long Loire Valley, Rhine valley o kisim wanpela ‘cruise’ i go long ol naispela siti long Danube o ‘boating’ long Erie Canal.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
Tok Pisin: Wankain, taim yu gat wanpela Schengen visa, yu no nid long aplai long ol visa long wanwan bilong ol Schengen memba kantri, na dispela seivim taim, mani na pepawok.
English: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
Tok Pisin: Ol samting bilong bipo we i soim ol dispela 'sewage system' em ol i bin painim ol long ol haus bilong ol siti bilong Minoan bilong Crete na Santorini long Greece.
English: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
Tok Pisin: 'Boating' o pasin bilong raun long bot em i wanpela samting we olgeta manmeri long Finland i save laik long mekim. Ol i gat planti bot, wanpela bot em i inap long 7-pela o 8-pela manmeri.
English: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
Tok Pisin: 'Subsistence agriculture' em i wanpela sistem we i no yusim planti samting, i no yusim marasin, i yusim sit we ol i kisim long kaikai we i gro long dispela rijen na ol i bungim dispela ol pasin wantaim pasin bilong mekim 'crop rotation' o ol narapela isipela teknik (technique) bilong mekim kaikai i kamap planti.
English: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
Tok Pisin: Dispela sik em ol pik i save karim, na ol moskito i save kisim long pik na givim i go long ol manmeri.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Na tu, ol i save makim ol ‘route’ we planti lain i save go wokabaut o ‘cycling’ long em.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
Tok Pisin: Mrs. Kircher i tokaut long tingting bilong em long resis long kamap olsem presiden long Argentine Theatre, long dispela seim (same) lokesen taim em i bin yusim long statim 2005 kempein (campaign) bilong em long Senate as wanpela memba bilong Buenos Aires provins 'delegation'.
English: Had the Allies failed, Germany probably would have been able to conquer Britain as it had the rest of Europe.
Tok Pisin: Sapos ol Allies i no mekim samting ol i bin mekim, Germany ating bai holimpasim na kisim Britain olsem em i bin mekim long olgeta hap bilong Europe.
English: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
Tok Pisin: Arly Velasquez bilong Mexicoi pinis long namba fiftin ples insait long 'men's sitting' long Super-G. Pleiya (player) bilong New Zealand s Adam Hall i pinis long namba nain ples insait long 'men's standing' long Super-G.
English: There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.
Tok Pisin: I luk olsem bai i gat moa 'maria' long sait i stap klostu bikos 'crust' em i 'thin' moa. Em i isi moa long 'lava' long kam antap long autsait.
English: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.
Tok Pisin: Planti taim ol 'travel agent' i save wok wantaim wanwan hotel, yu bai lukim olsem yu ken yusim wanpela lokel 'agent' long makim spes bilong stap long o narapela hap, kain olsem ol 'camping ground'.
Please provide the translation for the following sentence. Do not provide any explanations or text apart from the translation.
English: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
Tok Pisin:"}]
label: Krismas em i wanpela bilong ol impoten holide bilong Christianity, na ol i save amamasim dispela de olsem bonde bilong Jisas.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
Tok Pisin: Dispela stori em ol i soim long 'opera' bilong France, we Camille Saint-Saens i raitim, em i stori bilong 'artist' "we laip bilong em i bihainim laikim bilong em long ol drag (drug) na Japan."
English: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
Tok Pisin: Ol i makim ol long 'category' bilong Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing na Original Screenplay.
English: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
Tok Pisin: U.S President George W. Bush i kamap long Singapore long moning bilong Novemba 16, long statim wanpela wik we em bai i raun lukim Asia.
English: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
Tok Pisin: Congress i stat long givim mani long 'obscenity initiative' long taim em i mekim bajet bilong em long 2005 na tok olsem FBI i mas givim 10-pela wokmanmeri bilong stretim ol 'case' bilong 'adult pornography'.
English: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
Tok Pisin: Madhya Pradesh Police i painim dispela leptop na mobail fon we ol i bin stilim.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
Tok Pisin: Europe em i wanpela kontinen (continent) we i liklik, tasol em i gat planti indipenden kantri. Planti taim, long raun i go long planti kantri em bai min olsem yu bai go insait long planti 'visa application' na 'passport control' moa long wanpela taim.
English: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
Tok Pisin: Planti ol 'research telescope' em ol i bikpela fesiliti (facilty) we i stap long ol longwe ples long ol gutpela 'atmospheric condition'.
English: They often have more autonomy than conventional team members as their teams may meet according to varying time zones which may not be understood by their local management.
Tok Pisin: Ol i ken mekim samting long laik bilong ol moa long ol tim we i save wok insait long ofis taim ol bung wantaim ol narapela tim memba long taim we i gutpela long ol kainkain 'time zone' na dispela em ol lokel meneja i no inap long klia long en.
English: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
Tok Pisin: Ol meri em ol i kam long wanpela famili, kain olsem wanpela bikpela famili bilong ol sista na ol pikinini meri bilong ol.
English: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
Tok Pisin: Ol stretim bek gen ol 'economic link' namel long dispela tupela hap bilong Moldova maski ol toktok bilong politiks i no kamap gut.

Tok Pisin: As tingting bilong sains (science) em long painimaut wanem we dispela graun i wok taim ol yusim ol 'scientific method'. Dispela metod (method) i save stiaim planti bilong ol 'scientific research'.
English: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
Tok Pisin: Pasin bilong lukluk long 'cherry blossom', we ol i kolim olsem hanami, em i pat bilong kalsa bilong Japanese stat long '8th century' na i kam.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.

English: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
Tok Pisin: Siminoff i tok olsem namba bilong ol samting we em i wok long salim i go antap taim emi kamap long wanpela episod bilong Shark Tank progrem we ol lain i stap insait long dispela progrem i no laik long givim em sampela mani bilong helpim bisnis bilong em.

Tok Pisin: Na tu, namel long wanwan 'dynasty' i gat taim we ol provins i stap ol yet. Wanpela bilong ol dispela taim we planti lain i save long en em taim bilong Three Kingdom we i stap long 60-pela yia namel long Han na Jin Dynasty.
English: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.

messages:
[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.
Tok Pisin: Maski ol 'wagonways' em ol plang we i stap sait sait long rot, ol i mekim ol hos we i pulim ol long spit moa na i pulim bikpela kago long ol rot we i no raf (rough) moa long mak bilong ol rot we i save stap long dispela de.
English: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
Tok Pisin: Bihain long resis we i kamap long Trinde, Carpanedo i pilai wanpis insait long tupela narapela resis long dispela Championships.
English: Machu Picchu consist of three main structures, namely Intihuatana, the Temple of the Sun, and the Room of the Three Windows.
Tok Pisin: Machu Picchu i gat tripela bikpela straksa (structure), nem bilong ol em Intihuatana, Temple of the Sun, na Room of the Three Windows.
English: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
Tok Pisin: Wanpela kaikai bilong avinun we planti lain i save laikim, em ol i save laikim long mekim long taim bilong sama (summer), em i Pa amb Oli: Bret wantaim 'olive oil', tomato, na wanem samting i stap bilong givim fleiva kain olsem 'cheese', tuna pis na kain olsem.
English: Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport.
Tok Pisin: Tude, Timbuktu em i wanpela taun we i no gat planti samting, maski em i gat gutpela nem we i save pulim ol turis, na em i gat wanpela eapot.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:

English: It also attacked anything that entered the water; even a giant dinosaur such as T. rex would be no match for it.

[{'role': 'user', 'content': "This is an English to Tok Pisin translation, please provide the Tok Pisin translation for these sentences:
English: In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly.

Tok Pisin: 'Duty free shopping' em i sans long baim ol samting we yu no inap long baim takis na 'excises' long sampela lokesen.

Tok Pisin: Ol 'pride' bilong ol laion i save ekt long wankain we olsem ol 'pack' bilong ol wulf o dok, ol dispela animal we i wankain long ol laion (tasol i no ol narapela bikpela pusi) long pasin, na tu ol i save kamapim bikpela birua long ol narapela animal we ol i save kaikai.
English: Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically.
Tok Pisin: Tasol, ol draiva i save mekim pasin long mak we i 'consistent', olsem na, ol 'traffic' i save i gat sampela samting i 'consistent' long ol na dispela em ol savemanmeri i ken soim wantaim ol namba bilong 'mathematics'.

Tok Pisin: Ol animal we i no stap long planti hap kain olsem 'European brown bear', 'wolf', 'owl', 'lynx', 'wild cat', na 'capercaillie' i stap long hap, wantaim ol narapela animal we i stap long planti hap.

English: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.

Tok Pisin: Wanpela man Filipino husat i bin wok olsem wanpela polis bipo i holimpasim ol turis bilong Hongkong taim em i kisim bas bilong ol long Manila, dispela bikpela siti bilong Philippines.
English: The High Middle Ages were preceded by the Early Middle Ages and followed by the Late Middle Ages, which by convention ends around 1500.
Tok Pisin: Bipo long High Middle Ages i bin gat Early Middle Ages na bihain long en i bin gat Late Middle Ages, dispela taim em i pinis long kain taim olsem 1500.
English: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
Tok Pisin: Na tu, U.N i laik mekim ol laspela wok bilong stretim wanpela 'fund' bilong helpim ol kantri we i wok long pilim ol hevi bilong 'global warming'.
English: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
Tok Pisin: Em i gat kainkain ol plent (plant), bikos long kainkain 'microclimate' bilong en, ol kainkain graun na level bilong graun em i stap long en.
